author: {'steamid': '76561198166686532', 'num_games_owned': 1418, 'num_reviews': 230, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1696087687}
review:
Такое впечатление, что вся игра, это не что иное, как приход американского деревенщины южанина, после знатной дозы метамфетамина. Этому впечатлению способствует буквально все, что есть в игре: враги, окружение, звук и сам геймплей, который, на самом деле хорош и не плохо затягивает. Не смотря на то, что эта аркада на первых уровнях выглядит довольно сложной, дальше все предельно просто. Игра проходится с ходу, за три с небольшим часа, а после победы над главным боссом, так и хочется не двусмысленно воскликнуть: "Мы, Южане, милостью Божьей!"

8 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112842009', 'num_games_owned': 463, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1710559674}
review:
The Culling of The Cows é um tower defense com uma temática bem humorada e peculiar. Nele, você assume o papel de um fazendeiro rabugento que se vê enfrentando uma invasão de ovnis nazistas que estão abduzindo seu gado e habitantes para dominar o mundo. A história se desenrola com um caipira determinado a salvar sua esposa e impedir a catástrofe.

O jogo oferece uma experiência divertida e desafiadora, combinando mecânicas de tower defense com elementos de jogos de tiro em plataforma. No entanto, alguns problemas afetam a jogabilidade, como a inconsistência na hitbox dos gados, o que pode resultar em frustração quando os tiros atravessam os inimigos sem causar dano.

Outro aspecto a ser considerado são os drops aleatórios de recursos, que podem ser obtidos através de quedas aéreas. Isso adiciona um elemento de sorte ao jogo, o que nem sempre é bem recebido pela comunidade de jogadores.

No geral, com alguns ajustes, o jogo poderia ser ainda mais envolvente e divertido. Ainda assim, é uma boa opção para os fãs de jogos de tiro em plataforma e tower defense.

author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1665081641}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561199212771804', 'num_games_owned': 545, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1703042859}
review:
Para ser de los mismos creadores de Pixel Puzzles, esta decente, aunque claro, eso no le quita de que se vuelva monótono pasado unos cuantos minutos, hasta me puedo atrever a decir que parece uno de esos juegos Flash que se encuentra en Minijuegos¸com o Y8, solo que la diferencia es que aquí te cobran para jugarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151293050', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1627851560}
review:
"The Culling of the Cows" ist ein ungewöhnliches Indie-Spiel, das von Decaying Logic entwickelt wurde. Es wurde erstmals 2014 veröffentlicht und bietet einen einzigartigen Ansatz für das Tower-Defense-Genre. Hier ist eine ausführliche Rezension des Spiels:

[b]1. Gameplay: 7/10 - Originelle Mischung aus Genres[/b]

Das Gameplay von "The Culling of the Cows" ist eine eigenwillige Kombination aus Tower Defense und Action-Elementen. Der Spieler übernimmt die Kontrolle über einen Bauern, der seine Farm vor anrückenden Horden von Kühen schützen muss. Die originelle Idee, Kühe als Gegner zu verwenden, verleiht dem Spiel einen einzigartigen Charme. Die Herausforderung besteht darin, taktisch platzierte Verteidigungsanlagen zu nutzen und gleichzeitig in Echtzeit gegen die angreifenden Kühe zu kämpfen. Allerdings kann die Wiederholbarkeit des Spielkonzepts auf lange Sicht begrenzt sein.

[b]2. Grafik und Design: 6/10 - Einfache, aber effektive Präsentation[/b]

Die Grafik von "The Culling of the Cows" ist einfach gehalten, aber sie erfüllt ihren Zweck. Die Umgebungen sind klar und gut erkennbar, und der Cartoonstil passt gut zum humorvollen Ansatz des Spiels. Obwohl die Grafiken nicht besonders anspruchsvoll sind, tragen sie dennoch zur humorvollen Atmosphäre bei.

[b]3. Sound und Musik: 5/10 - Durchschnittliche Audiounterstützung[/b]

Die Musik und Soundeffekte in "The Culling of the Cows" sind durchschnittlich. Die Hintergrundmusik passt gut zum Spielthema, aber sie ist nicht besonders einprägsam. Die Soundeffekte sind funktional, könnten jedoch mehr Vielfalt bieten, um das Spielerlebnis aufzuwerten.

[b]4. Einzelspielermodus: 6/10 - Solider Spielspaß für Zwischendurch[/b]

Das Spiel konzentriert sich auf den Einzelspielermodus, und obwohl es einen soliden Spielspaß für kurze Spielsessions bietet, kann die Langzeitmotivation begrenzt sein. Der Witz und die Originalität des Spielkonzepts tragen dazu bei, dass es eine unterhaltsame Erfahrung ist, aber es fehlt vielleicht an der Tiefe und Vielfalt, um dauerhaft zu fesseln.

[b]5. Technische Aspekte: 7/10 - Stabile Performance[/b]

In Bezug auf die technische Umsetzung bietet "The Culling of the Cows" eine stabile Performance. Es läuft auf verschiedenen Systemen stabil, und während meines Tests traten keine größeren technischen Probleme oder Bugs auf. Die Steuerung ist einfach und gut umgesetzt.

[b]6. Wiederspielbarkeit und Langzeitmotivation: 5/10 - Begrenzte Langzeitmotivation[/b]

Die Wiederspielbarkeit des Spiels könnte begrenzt sein, da das Grundkonzept nach einiger Zeit repetitiv werden kann. Obwohl es Herausforderungen und verschiedene Level gibt, könnte es an zusätzlichen Elementen fehlen, um die Spieler für längere Zeit zu fesseln.

[b]7. Community und Support: 6/10 - Engagierte Entwickler[/b]

Die Community rund um das Spiel mag nicht besonders groß sein, aber die Entwickler zeigen sich engagiert. Regelmäßige Updates und die Bereitschaft, auf das Feedback der Spieler einzugehen, zeugen von einer positiven Einstellung gegenüber der Spielergemeinschaft.

[b]Fazit: 6/10 - Kurzweiliger Spaß mit begrenzter Tiefe[/b]

"The Culling of the Cows" ist ein kurzweiliges Spiel, das mit seiner originellen Idee und humorvollen Präsentation punktet. Es bietet einen unterhaltsamen Zeitvertreib für kurze Spielsessions, allerdings könnte es an Tiefe und Langzeitmotivation fehlen, um langfristig zu fesseln. Für Spieler, die nach einem originellen Twist im Tower-Defense-Genre suchen, kann es jedoch eine interessante Wahl sein.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049823783', 'num_games_owned': 1712, 'num_reviews': 1265, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1695342828}
review:
Es un Shooter en 2D bizarro, estilo TD en el sentido de que los enemigos no tienen que entrar al granero porque te saca vidas y al matarlos todos ganas (cuando terminan las oleadas) Podes estar abajo caminando (y agarrando cajas y dinero) o fijo estacionario arriba disparando con alguna escopeta o metralleta
Caen del cielo cada tanto Cajas con algún poder random (ej. balas infinitas, explosivas, hacer los enemigos mas lentos, etc.)
Tenes también fijos por nivel Poderes de Ayuda (Ametralladoras, bombas, sierra en la puerta, fuego que cae del cielo y quema unidades, etc.) todos estos son poderes que tienen un tiempo muerto relativamente corto para volver a usarlos, pero es infinito.
En cada “escenario” (cambia la escenografía pero tiene el mismo formato) Hay Oleadas (distintos bichos) teniendo cada bicho sus propias características ej. mas lentos, mas rapidos, voladores, explosivos, saltarines, etc. 
Finalizas la batalla contra un OVNI Aleman Nazi re bizarro y ganas.
El juego esta muy bueno, sonidos copados, musica, jugabilidad, duracion, tiene logros, Cloud y CROMOS que le mejoran mucho el valor al titulo.

Es una pena que no tenga workshop, ya que agregaria muchisima rejugabilidad, tanto de oleadas, como de Bosses y nuevos enemigos. Lo otro que es un pecado es que la musica este vendida por separado

8/10 - Si te gusta el genero es un Must play sin dudas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027782034', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1698141899}
review: An arcade-style shooter game that evokes something of the energy that the original Postal did, but 15 years too late. The core game play loop is tight, but there are issues with the perspective line of fire, with projectiles frequently sailing past enemies that should have taken the hit. There are similar shortcomings in some levels like a late-game onslaught level where you're given a rapid-fire rocket launcher where the projectiles sail off the edge of the screen rather than hitting the ground. There is a little bit of splash damage like you might expect, but the projectiles can only ever contact enemies and not the environment, making the splash damage a bit perfunctory. The controls are a struggle, with a keyboard-dominant control scheme that derides the player for trying to use a controller (the scheme for which is not fully implemented). Ultimately, CotC is not a bad game, but it's old-soul energy spoils a lot of the fun that could otherwise have been had with it. The game might be good for a giggle if you got it as part of a bundle, but I can't recommend an outright purchase.

author: {'steamid': '76561198995387103', 'num_games_owned': 6507, 'num_reviews': 3379, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1697148186}
review:
农夫大战僵牛（后来发现还有僵尸，僵鸟），这种玩法挺多的，特别是手机上，没什么出彩的。胜在有入库三要素吧，2内推荐入库。融合了站桩射击，岔路选择，上弹要一颗一颗的上算有丢丢新意，一颗颗上弹增加了紧迫感。三星还是满有挑战的，但是米和成就关联，就不挑战了lol 一周目大概3小时，最后头目战有点意思。

画面：**
音乐：**
剧情：*
演出：*
玩法：**
创意：***
手感：**
难度：***
丰富：**
耐玩：**
优化：*
更新：*
热情：*
细节：*
打磨：**
诚意：**

不足，bug，建议等：chinese need. 无中文可玩。如果画风音乐更q萌点，受众会更多吧。有的关的弹无虚发要求，即使有红外瞄准的情况下，仍旧难瞄准易射偏，希望有所改善，比如加影子，参照线等。有三星要求的关卡，没有和成就关联，降低了想获得三星的欲望。

202304，steam，steam掉卡抵扣，t a o宝，支付宝红包，humble，indie gala，daily indie game，fanatical，杉果，它处自定义包入的本体约4元。爱人如己，目前就这，看以后追评。有中文的游戏请耐心自研体验乐趣，攻略指南尽量不用。不建议使用外挂，插件，作弊之类的，游戏都要这样搞，那现实里那更是如此了。兄弟萌，强烈建议不要第三方平台的小店买y u额，通过饰品等挂steam市场转的，高概率red信乃至封号，且行且珍惜。

author: {'steamid': '76561198087984728', 'num_games_owned': 626, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1689435385}
review:
哪怕是14年发售的游戏，游戏性和画面都糟糕的不行，虽然不是什么大制作，只是个小品级的小游戏，但这也不是拉胯的理由
游戏操作简直让人血压拉满，子弹判定诡异，明明打中实际却没打中，站位设定也稀烂，不花钱买激光瞄准就得步步为营，眼睛去判断站在哪会打中，游戏不会清理牛的尸体，导致越往后尸体堆积直接影响你的判断，甚至激光瞄准都不一定好使，更别提堆积后的卡顿

author: {'steamid': '76561198037295108', 'num_games_owned': 1249, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1689297242}
review: Y'all listen up now! "The Culling Of The Cows" is one heck of a game! It's a wild 2D shooter with some fancy side-scrollin' fights. Ya take on the role of an old, wise farmer protectin' his precious barn from them Zombie Cows and any other critters tryin' to bust through. Lucky for ya, ya got yerself a kickass gun that ya can upgrade over time, along with some mighty special goodies and a supply pack to help ya stomp them Zombie Cows flat. And believe it or not, there's even a bad-to-the-bone Nazi Ufo to reckon with!

author: {'steamid': '76561198121771843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1683453936}

author: {'steamid': '76561198037345945', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1676098786}
review:
This game was really enjoyable to play and complete 100%. It took me around 3 hours to get all the achievements. Be prepared to use your memory and pattern recognition skills to succeed. Overall, it's a quick and fun game to play for a night of gaming.

If you're interested in getting this game, I recommend waiting for a discount or trying to find a free copy or code like I did. If it's priced around $1-2, it's definitely worth considering.

author: {'steamid': '76561198343525179', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1686534767}
review:
"The Culling Of The Cows é um bom jogo de arcade com seus altos e baixos, assim como qualquer outro jogo. Sua jogabilidade é simples e agradável, tornando-o fácil de pegar e jogar. O jogo oferece três modos diferentes, o que adiciona alguma variedade às fases potencialmente repetitivas.

Em The Culling Of The Cows, você assume o papel de um fazendeiro que deve defender seu gado de ondas de zumbis atacantes. O conceito pode parecer incomum, mas funciona bem dentro do gênero de arcade. Os gráficos do jogo são encantadores e peculiares, adicionando apelo geral.

Uma das forças de The Culling Of The Cows é sua acessibilidade. Os controles são diretos, permitindo que jogadores de todos os níveis de habilidade entrem e comecem a jogar rapidamente. A mecânica do jogo é fácil de entender, tornando-o adequado para jogadores casuais ou aqueles que procuram uma experiência de jogo rápida e agradável.

No entanto, como qualquer jogo, The Culling Of The Cows tem seus pontos fracos. A natureza repetitiva das fases pode se tornar cansativa depois de um tempo, pois você pode se encontrar enfrentando desafios e inimigos semelhantes repetidamente. Essa falta de variedade pode diminuir o apelo a longo prazo do jogo para alguns jogadores.

Apesar dessa desvantagem, a inclusão de três modos de jogo diferentes ajuda a mitigar a repetitividade em certa medida. Cada modo oferece uma experiência de jogo ligeiramente diferente, adicionando uma camada de variedade e replay ao jogo. Isso garante que os jogadores tenham diferentes opções para se manterem envolvidos e entretidos.

Em conclusão, The Culling Of The Cows é um bom jogo de arcade que oferece uma jogabilidade simples e agradável. Embora possua alguns elementos repetitivos, a presença de vários modos de jogo ajuda a compensar esse problema. Se você é fã de jogos no estilo arcade e não se importa com um pouco de repetição, definitivamente vale a pena experimentar The Culling Of The Cows."

author: {'steamid': '76561198059825119', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1684240630}
review:
Simple, humoristic and most importantly entertaining base defence game. 
You must defend your farm from variouos types of zombies, infected cows and a final alien boss. 
This game is very rough around the edges, don't expect something of a high quality. 
In the beginning it seems hard, hectic and frustrating, but when you get the hand of it it's a good few hours of fun. 
It's all about realizing which upgrades to buy and which to ignore. 
For some reason it wasn't possible to take screenshots. 
Buy if you like base defence games.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198201246082', 'num_games_owned': 3232, 'num_reviews': 1499, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 388, 'last_played': 1666973855}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows, ilginç bir oyun deneyimi sunan benzersiz bir yandan kaydırmalı nişancı ve kule savunma oyunudur. Oyuncular, çiftliğini yayılan bir hastalıktan kurtarmayı kendine görev edinmiş Sammy adında şizofrenik bir çiftçinin rolünü üstlenirler. Güvenilir av tüfeği ve Tanrı'dan gelen ilahi bir görevle donanmış olan Sammy, enfekte olmuş yaratık dalgalarını savuşturmak zorundadır.

Oyun, stratejik oynanışla karışık hızlı tempolu aksiyon içeriyor. Oyuncular çeşitli silahlar ve taktikler kullanarak çiftliklerini enfekte sığır ve zombi ordularına karşı savunmalıdır. Oyun, oyuncular için iyi bir meydan okuma sunan 40 artan zorluk seviyesi içerir.

The Culling Of The Cows'un öne çıkan özelliklerinden biri de benzersiz öncülü ve hikayesidir. Oyunun kahramanı Sammy unutulmaz bir karakter ve iç monologları oyuna ilginç bir derinlik katıyor. Oyunda ayrıca tam kontrolcü desteği, Steam başarımları ve hile konsolu bulunuyor.

Genel olarak, The Culling Of The Cows, kule savunma türüne benzersiz bir bakış açısı sunan keyifli ve zorlu bir oyundur. Hızlı aksiyonu, stratejik oynanışı ve unutulmaz karakterleriyle bu oyun, türün hayranları için kesinlikle görülmeye değer.

author: {'steamid': '76561199282833173', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1679480919}
review:
Not the type of tower defense game i'm hopping for, it not fun at all. Again, steam user review can't be trusted!!

I start dying on stage 2 (after the tutorial) then it got worst on stage 3 and even worst on stage 4, i can't remember the times i'm death!!! WTH

Out of 10 shots, you will mostly miss 1 or 2 shots, the alignment is terrible, but the mobs have no issue attacking you even its not alight with it.

It is not fun keep pressing the "R" key for reload, and the reload is damn slow! Its really sux!

Since it only cost ARS$ 6,79 (USD 0.033) and it comes with a free (aka. useless) DLC for Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw - T.C.O.T.C , i guess i just keep it and not refunding it, but still I don't recommended even at this price -90%.

review:
システムは昔のゲーセンみたいな感じ
難易度も昔のゲーセンみたいな感じ

襲ってくる牛をひたすら迎撃する爺になって戦うゲーム

積み重ねた経験値や武器て無双みたいなゲームではなく
毎回毎回強化していく形なので

基本的にプレイヤーの腕前が要求される

数回ならまだしもある程度いくとパターン化が激しく
作業感を不快に感じる人にはきついかもしれない
初見殺し的なというか音ゲーに近い雰囲気すらする

author: {'steamid': '76561198987204504', 'num_games_owned': 436, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1676066216}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows ist ein großartiges Aktions- und Strategiespiel, das Spieler in den Bann zieht. Das Indie-Spiel wurde von Pixel Puzzles entwickelt und veröffentlicht und ist Teil der gleichnamigen Franchise. Seit seiner Veröffentlichung im Mai 2014 hat es sich einen Namen gemacht und begeistert Spieler weltweit.

Das Spiel bietet eine hervorragende Kombination aus strategischem Denken und schnellem Handeln, was es zu einem einzigartigen Erlebnis macht. Die Grafik ist atemberaubend und die Soundeffekte sind einfach fantastisch.

Ich würde das Spiel jedem empfehlen, der nach einem Herausforderung sucht und eine Menge Spaß haben möchte. Mit einer Bewertung von 8/10 bei GAMERamble, kann ich sagen, dass The Culling Of The Cows definitiv einen Platz auf Ihrer Spieleliste verdient hat.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979961681', 'num_games_owned': 1195, 'num_reviews': 227, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1673928039}
review:
[h1]SUMMARY[/h1]
Gory wave-shooter not quite up to snuff.

The comedic underpinnings are there; a farmer forced to defend his farm from zombie cows instead of the usual zombified humans. There are even some variations in the gameplay where you fight bosses, and also shoot from a fixed position, while the main game mode offers supply drops, alternate ammo types, and upgrade paths. Ultimately it just feels...kind of meh.

The animations are okay, the art style is appropriately goofy-yet-gritty, and it has entertaining death scenes for each enemy type, showing a certain level of polish that you don't typically see here. And yet, it ultimately fails to produce a compelling push to get you to finish it.

[h1]OVERALL SCORE[/h1]
Somewhat Not Recommended

[h1]REPLAY VALUE[/h1]
Above Average

author: {'steamid': '76561198091808820', 'num_games_owned': 1159, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1660614439}
review:
it doesn't take much for a game like this to be good fun on a sunday afternoon.
but this one fails horribly. no cardinal sin in the book has been left out. gotta commit them all!

there is one weapon and one weapon only. 
you can't move and shoot / reload at the same time.
you will wear out your R key even more because you need to reload every single shell individually. there are upgrades for that later though. still a pain in the #ss.
hitboxes are messed up and so is the background / foreground logic. sometimes you can't hit enemies right in front of you with your shotgun but they can touch and kill you no problem. you always need to look at the enemies' feet like some sort of fetish boy to hit them properly.

after 2 minutes i got sick and tired of this game already but i kept going for the 100% and it took me 2.5 hours to get it all done.

a complete no fun zone and a waste of a perfectly fine evening.
i would not play this game again even if it was the last game on earth.
any free browser game from 20 years ago is better than this.
also you need like 4 hands to manage movement, combat, upgrades and power ups.
a terrible experience from start to finish.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017903948', 'num_games_owned': 1907, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 1263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1263, 'last_played': 1669417340}
review: I am a 48 year old father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my son, who is now 15. My son downloaded The Culling Of The Cows and in less than a week, he had already played for over 20 hours. This was terrible for me, as it was already hard enough for me to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching videos on Tiktok. So I decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, did the tutorial but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought my son and I closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971838196', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 356, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1663087518}
review:
Spielwertung: 6/10
Spielzeit: ca. 3 Stunden
Spieldurchläufe: 1 (Ende)

Schnell, klobig, unfertig, aber dennoch für einen einzigen Run spaßig und wohlwollend aufgenommen

+ Graphik: Sehr hübsch
+ 5 Erfolge, die man nebenbei sammeln kann

+/- 3 "unterschiedliche" Levelmodi, aber seid nicht zu aufgeregt. Die meisten Level sind "Waves". Dann gibt es noch "kill all" (in einem Rutsch) und "Onslaught", wo man endlos Munition hat und quasi Scharfschütze spielt, aber keinerlei Boni/Skills/Drops etc. besitzt. Gerade Letzterer ist UNGLAUBLICH LANGWEILIG. Alles, was man macht, ist Maus1 zu halten und minimal zu bewegen, ohne Unterbrechung. 
+/- Story/Humor/Snippets: Im Grunde existiert das alles nicht, muss ja auch nicht bei einem solchen Genre, aber hier und da muss man mal grinsen oder horcht kurz auf. 
+/- Upgrades/Waffen: Ja, es ist schön, eine Wahl zu haben. Leider läuft es in jedem Map auf dieselbe Wahl raus (Standardwaffe meh, Penetration nutzlos, also, je nach Gusto, immer 6 oder 8, ich habe durchweg 6 genommen. Bei den Upgrades dasselbe: Munition, wichtig, Nachladen, superwichtig, Schussrate nice, aber Bonus, Laser völlig nutzlos. 
+/- Die Skills sind teilweise massiv unterschiedlich vom Nutzen her, aber sobald man sich etwas dran gewöhnt hat, kann man gut rotieren. Die Sache ist die: Einerseits kann man am Ende die Skills fast durchweg anhaben, wobei einer schon reicht, um alles dichtzumachen, andererseits kann man auch "nur" mit der Waffe alles regeln, sobald man wenigstens die meisten Upgrades gekauft hat. Die Skills sind teilweise so sehr Ablenkung, dass man eher "versagt", als wenn man sich "nur" aufs Schießen konzentriert.
+/- Der Sinn der Karte: Es gibt mehrere Wege, die zum selben "Endziel" führen. Es gibt aber weder einen Grund die Level zu farmen für Erfolge noch für Spielökonomie. Was also soll das? Ich habe zwar alle Level gespielt, aber der Sinn ist mir schleierhaft, warum sich vieles einfach "verdoppelt".
+/- Der Sinn der "Herausforderungen". Jedes Level (zumindest alle "Waves") hat zusätzlich 3 "Challenges". Diese einfach zu ignorieren ist aber der beste Ratschlag, denn wenn man sie "befolgt" wird das Spiel nur schwerer, aber sonst bringt einem das nichts. Vielleicht schaltet man damit ja irgendetwas frei, vielleicht die Extras? Die Sache ist nur die, dass durch die Herausforderungen das Spiel nicht mehr, sondern weniger Spaß macht, weil es einem ständig zwingt Dinge "nicht" zu tun (Skills, Upgrades) oder zu schaffen (keinen Schuss verfehlen, was fast unmöglich ist).

- Der Sound (wahnsinnig monoton/nervend, gerade bei "Onslaught", lieber maximal runterpegeln)
- Die "Drops": Das einzig Nützliche ist GELD. Alles andere ist Quatsch. Wie können diese Drops denn manchmal bis in die Mitte fliegen? Dort rauszugehen ist meistens Selbstmord, vor allem, weil kein einziger Nicht-Geld-Drop es wert ist. KEINER. Vor allem "Unsterblichkeit" ist völlig schlecht designed. Man sollte wenigstens einen Timer oder einen Sound-Q haben, wann das Ding abläuft. 
- Movement: Der Alte bewegt sich furchtbar, deswegen auch häufig unnötige Tode. Selbst mit dem Drop "Speed" ist das schaurig. Im Grunde tut man gut daran sich aufs Schießen zu konzentrieren, um nie etwas in die Nähe kommen zu lassen. 
- Im Menü unter "Extras" findet sich: Nichts.
- Die Spielzeit von 3 Stunden (ohne zusätzliche Routen eher 2 Stunden oder weniger): Für 3.99 finde ich das zu wenig, andererseits gibts das Spiel sicher im Sale oder in Bundles für unter 1 €, dafür ist es auf jeden Fall in Ordnung. 

Fazit: Für einmaliges Zombie-Gemetzel anständig, danach darf es aber auch gerne wieder für immer vergessen werden. Ich hatte mit dem gleichnamigen Puzzle von Pixel Puzzles mehr Spaß, aber hey ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198063511072', 'num_games_owned': 273, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1657069897}
review: Francamente não recomendo esse jogo, eu só tenho ele porque peguei num Humble Bundle aí da vida ou peguei de graça mesmo, mas como não me lembro ao certo como foi que eu o adquiri não vou marcar a caixa "Marque esta caixa caso tenha recebido este produto de graça". Ele não é um jogo ruim mas é simples demais e tenta ser engraçado mas não é. Pra ser sincero mesmo só joguei ele por causa das cartas, que eram baratas e me renderam 500xp por causa das insígnias e também pra pegar o jogo perfeito, pois só são 5 conquistas, porém a última é pra finalizar o jogo e está sendo um saco chegar lá pois o jogo realmente é muito chato. A jogabilidade e o sistema de power ups são bons e você tem que treinar seus reflexos pra avançar nas fases mas não passa disso. Jogabilidade e fases totalmente repetitivos. Por isso eu vou, jogo um pouco, passo alguns meses pra voltar e tô fazendo isso pra ver se em algum momento eu termino ele. Enfim, se eu tivesse que pagar pra jogar esse jogo... Eu não pagaria! Vale mais pra fazer volume na sua biblioteca Steam e por causa das insígnias.

review: I don't really think this is worth purchasing but if you happen to get it free, it's worth to check out. The sound effects are very repetitive and the upgrade section for your weapons is neither original nor comprehensive. One positive side is however that it's easy to get to 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194961654', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1626071247}
review:
I personally find this to be a take-it-or-leave-it type of game you might stumble upon in an arcade, but it's not something worth paying for. You stand there while obnoxious alien/zombie bulls and undead humans race towards you in an attempt to infiltrate your barn... for some reason? The music is obnoxious, the sound effects are obnoxious, and the hit-boxes are especially obnoxious. 

It's also obnoxiously fun though, if you're in the mood for an old fashioned arcade style shooting platform. I'll pick it up for some mindless fun while waiting on the rest of my group to decide what actual game to play, sound muted of course. 

I think I picked this up in a grab-bag type thing of game codes so while I didn't get it for free, it was pretty close to such. I definitely wouldn't pay anything more than $1 for it otherwise.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129728862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1647731040}
review:
Neste maravilhoso jogo você é um manifestante anti-vegano brasileiro que não consegue mais manter sua fazenda devido aos altos impostos, tomado em revolta, você decide extinguir todas as suas cabeças de gado. Ele atrai o gado escondendo sua neta que é uma E-Girl dentro de um celeiro. No jogo você conta com suporte aéreo, bombas, artilharia anti aérea e uma quantidade de munição que faz inveja ao comando vermelho. Toda essa aventura obviamente terminaria com uma batalha frenética com um OVNI nazista.

Gráficos: Filet Mignon
Armas: Picanha
Level Design: Maminha
Gameplay no geral: Contra filé (meu corte favorito)
9/10, pra ser 10/10 só faltou um equilíbrio na dificuldade do jogo. Com os upgrades o jogo é casual, extremamente fácil. Sem os upgrades você precisa ter em mente todos os frames de todas as animações do seu personagem e noção de mira milimétrica.

author: {'steamid': '76561198962733287', 'num_games_owned': 2773, 'num_reviews': 255, 'playtime_forever': 1110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1644026509}
review:
Dieses Spiel habe ich im Sale für gerade mal 0,30€ gekauft. Ich weis zwar nicht warum, aber ich habe es getan. Endgültig habe ich es installiert und gestartet, um die 5 Errungenschaften zu bekommen.

The Culling Of The Cows ist ein klassischer Tower Defense - Side roller, bei dem man als alter Farmer gegen mutierte Zombiekühe kämpfen muss. Das Spiel ist grafisch gesehen für ein Tower Defense Spiel okay. Die Musik ist größtenteils passend zum Gameplay. Es gibt wie bereits erwähnt 5 Errungenschaften, welche relativ schnell erreichbar sind. Das Gameplay selbst wird leider sehr schnell langweilig, da das Prinzip jedes Levels immer gleich ist.

Ich persönlich muss leider sagen, dass ich kein Gamer bin, welcher diese Art von Spielen feiert. Für richtige Kenner, ist es bestimmt eine schöne Abwechslung für zwischen durch. Ich selbst werde es, wie einige andere meiner Spiele, nur solange spielen, bis ich alle Errungenschaften freigeschaltet habe.

👑 [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/43242924/]Weitere Spielbewertungen[/url] 👑

author: {'steamid': '76561198194680793', 'num_games_owned': 3045, 'num_reviews': 1947, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1642941735}
review:
Забавная экшен-стрелялка по сдерживанию волн врагов. Если поконкретней, то вы играете за бедного фермера, оказавшегося в мире зомби-апокалипсиса. На протяжение достаточно большого количества уровней, вам предстоит уничтожать многочисленные орды зомби и зомбированной живности. Помогать вам в этом будут различные перки и разнообразное оружие. Вы даже боевой вертолёт можете призвать.
Уровни представляют из себя небольшие участки, на большинстве из которых, за вашей спиной стоит амбар, из которого можете создать своеобразный форпост. Зомбаки же рвутся почему-то именно в этот амбар, а не сожрать вас (если вы, конечно, не окажетесь у них на пути. В этом случае быть вам разорванным на части, съеденным заживо, растоптанным в кашу и т.д. Расчленёнка здесь неплохая).
Врагов в игре хватает. Помимо традиционных зомбаков, это разнообразная живность. Да блин, даже зомби-нацисты на летающей тарелке есть! Вот это треш:-)
В общем, любите расчленёнку и много крови, можно и повеселиться. Звёзд с неба игра не хватает, но вполне играбельна, затягивая своим игровым процессом. Есть сюжет и конечная цель. За полный ценник брать не рекомендую, но по скидке игра сносная. Например, сейчас она стоит 19р.

review: Si, es repetitivo - te aturde y asquea de tanta horda - PERO DIOS no hay que negar cuanto amor le metieron a este titulo. Es variado, tiene su humor, desde que vas a opciones ya sientes una personalidad propia del juego, esta muy bien. Incluso el trailer muestra cosas que ni salen y eso habla de la dedicación que hay en el. No es un candidato a GOTY ni de suerte, pero si que dejaron alma sus creadores en el y eso se nota.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138169177', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1635793077}
review:
Давным-давно эту игру можно было получить бесплатно на какой-то раздаче. В тот момент халява была упущена, но я побывал на странице игры и отметил для себя пару интересных факторов. А именно TD и зомби:)
И вот, вспомнилась повторно! Когда искал на что потратить целых 15 рублей…
За 3 часа, прошёл всё, что только можно и остался доволен! Игра проста как два пальца, проходится легко. И даже финального босса, можно победить с божьей помощью…

author: {'steamid': '76561198078711399', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1634405662}
review: Ehh should have been a flash game but that's not a thing anymore. It's not bad if you're into going up and down shooting at things coming from the right side of the screen. There are upgrades and assists to help you and they feel pretty fun. However, having to mash R to reload isn't a fun mechanic. There is a lot of unpolished things that don't make me want to play this game again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050237511', 'num_games_owned': 222, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1626075960}
review:
No hay mucho más de lo que te muestra acá. Es un juego casual tipo defense of the castle. Es simple y hasta que se puede jugar con control, lo hace más entretenido. El juego se vuelve difícil muy rápido y está la necesidad de usar los power ups que tenés cuando empezás pero se gastan rápido y comprarlas con dinero se siente un desperdicio. 
Para la fecha el precio de AR$ 70 más compras dentro del juego me parece caro. Pero para alguien que disfrute este tipo de juegos creo que está bien.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172925593', 'num_games_owned': 14023, 'num_reviews': 4533, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1626330252}
review:
一款横向的防御射击游戏
大概说的是一位农夫阻挡各种僵尸牛以及僵尸攻击自己的农场吧
每关都有限定的金钱数量，用来购买强化，比如子弹上限、单次上膛数量等
以及还有一些有CD的特殊的防御技能，比如机枪扫射、锯齿防御等

总体难度较高，主要是敌人数量较多，而你不但需要不停上下移动去瞄准，还要在空隙时上膛

author: {'steamid': '76561197985797360', 'num_games_owned': 790, 'num_reviews': 389, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1624808433}
review:
Juego básico al estilo defensa de torres. Tendrás a un granjero con una escopeta y tu objetivo es repeler los ataques de vacas mutantes, zombies y algun que otro enemigo. Cada partida tienes algo de dinero para incrementar la capacidad del cargador, velocidad de disparo y la recarga aun mas rapida entre otras cosas.
Dispones de varias habilidades que se sacaran de mas de un problema cuando se acumulen muchos enemigos como torretas automaticas, bombas, cortinas de fuego... 

Se trata de unos 20 mapas aproximadamente del mismo estilo. la mision mas comun es defender varias oleadas sin que tus puntos de vida lleguen a cero, es decir, que no muchos enemigos traspasen tu puerta del rancho o cobertizo (como todos los juegos de este estilo). El otro mapa que hay es defenderte de una sola ola de enemigos bastante mas grande con un solo punto de vida. Y por ultimo, un mapa que dispararas con una ametralladora por norma general desde una ventana y tendrás que repeler todos los enemigos con un maximo de 3 vidas.

A tener en cuenta que tu personaje no puede recibir daño, con que te toquen estas muerto y volverás al inicio.

Un juego rapido, entretenido para varias horas (unas 3-4h). Malo no es, por lo tanto lo recomiendo si lo pillais a precio de risa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068074539', 'num_games_owned': 493, 'num_reviews': 856, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1501691697}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows, yandan kaydırmalı bir nişancı / kule savunma oyunudur. Çiftliğine yayılan hastalığı çöpe atmak için kendinden kehanet edilen şizofrenik bir çiftçi olan Sammy rolünü üstleneceksiniz.

Yanında tozlu, 12 kalibre ve arkasındaki tanrıyla Sammy, büyük şehrin vahşi ülkeye sızmasının yarattığı bulaşıcı kaosa pek de nazik davranmayacaktır. Bütün delilik başladığında, Sammy ne yapması gerektiği konusunda Tanrı'ya danıştı ve cevap oldu. ÖLDÜR ONLARI! HEPSİNİ ÖLDÜR!!!!
Özellikleri:
Tam Kontrolör desteği.
Steam Başarıları.
Stratejik oyunla karışık hızlı tempolu aksiyon.
İyi bir kasaplık gerektiren 40 seviyeli yaratık.
Hile Konsolu.
Shamblers ve açgözlü sığır sürülerinin arasından ilerleyin.
Anlaması ve oynaması kolay, ancak oldukça zorlaşıyor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198994796062', 'num_games_owned': 227, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1616698794}
review:
This game saved my life.

I am 43.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiralling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068873944', 'num_games_owned': 464, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1613819121}
review:
[h1] Sammy老爷爷的农场保卫战 [/h1]
通关啦 并达成了全成就hehe
本只是真的无聊又点开了这个很久没碰过的小游戏
没想到打着打着就停不下来了 还忍不住连关都通了

这是一款非常非常简单的平面塔防游戏
你扮演的是农场主老爷爷Sammy
在丧尸末日启示录里奋力保卫你最宝贵的农场
此时的世界已经变得满目疮痍
所有生物都可能会被病毒感染而成为丧尸变种
其中最多的就是牛牛了
它们不仅会变异 还有着各种样式的来攻击你
像是冲刺的异常快的 巨型的 会螺旋走位的 甚至是身上会背着一堆雷管的都有hhh
然后除了牛牛之外呢 还有各种你的同类 也就是正宗的丧尸了
它也不例外 也有着各种各样的款式
有男有女 有胖有瘦
除了它们之外 甚至是乌鸦都会来攻击你
平时和他们是宿敌的农场主们放的稻草人就是为了对付它们的
可现在它们死了之后变异回来还是要和农场主们作对
实在是冤家路窄 天生的冤家一对呀：）

游戏的操作真的非常简单
你只需控制你的上下左右移动再加上扣动扳机就好了
所有会动的也就只有老爷爷你还有那些如潮水般的怪兽了
其实也就是两点一线 连三点一线都没有
因为又是2d又没有场景或视角上的转换
简直就是有手就行hh

除了不断的走位开枪之外
你还可以升级你的猎枪 
例如它使用的弹药类型 像是独头弹又或是散弹或是软尖弹等
也可以升级它的弹匣大小 你每次能填装的颗数 你扣扳机的速度
甚至可以为它装上一个红外镭射指示器

然后除了升级枪以外
每一关都会有天生不同的各种技能可以使用
无需花费 只有cd
而且都非常的爽快
但也会让游戏变得特别简单就是了 
使用我一般都是到了迫不得已时又或是不小心恍了神时用的

关卡的模式有好几种
有的甚至连路都不用走
因为Sammy老爷爷直接爬到了谷仓的二楼窗口去
拿着他的打机枪哒哒哒地在哒哒哒呢
还戴着带网的钢盔 不知他是不是越战老兵呢hh

对了还有boss关
没记错的话应该有三种boss
都很有创意 且的确带有一些难度
挺有挑战性的 非常有趣

总的来说
很打发时间很简单爽快的一款小游戏
就像4399的那种
打折了可以买了闲时玩玩
噢对了忘了说 它的画风还是挺诙谐重口的
不过我喜欢hh：）

author: {'steamid': '76561198075462976', 'num_games_owned': 616, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1613474672}
review:
Gioco d'azione che sembra voler rappresentare un misto tra tower defense e Metal Slug, ma con scarso successo.
I comandi non sono neanche chiari né mappati decentemente (non si può usare la levetta analogica per muoversi), e non si possono personalizzare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198994064783', 'num_games_owned': 1174, 'num_reviews': 260, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1613268359}
review:
Guten Tag meine Lieben,

The Culling Of The Cows ist ein Side-Scrolling Shooter / Tower Defence Game.
Ihr spielt den alten Farmer Sammy, welcher, ausgerüstet mit einer Flinte, seine Farm vor Zombies, verschiedenen Arten von Zombie-Kühen und anderen Monstern verteidigen will.

Es gibt genug verschiedene Level um sich dort austoben zu können. Auch eigent sich dieses Game um seinen Tiltfaktor zu trainieren, da einige Level echt herausfordernd sein können.

The Culling Of The Cows hat zwar nur 5 Achievements, um aber 100% in diesem Game zu erreichen, müsst ihr den Endboss besiegen (Ein Nazi-Ufo...), das heißt ihr müsst das Game komplett durchspielen.

Ich habe dafür ca. 4h gebraucht, den Rest der Zeit war ich mit fluchen beschäftigt.

Ich würde zwar warten, bis es im Sale ist, aber ansonsten ist das ein nettes Minigame für zwischendurch.

Lg SyS

author: {'steamid': '76561198098131656', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1609756536}
review:
This game is like... Really bad?
To all the completionists and card grinders out there, do not get lured by "only" five achievements, and a rare badge to earn.
This game has so many game design flaws, that even if it would be a student project, it would fail miserably. There is nothing "hilarious" about it, there is nothing "challenging" nor "strategic" about it. Whoever wrote this, was probably on something like Crystal Meth.

Do not buy it. If you receive it for free, just delete any knowledge about the key. This is a bad example of a video game, and if future civilisations would see this, it'd be just a bad example for our current (gaming) culture in total.

Really bad.

review: В этой игре нам предстоит в роли фермера с дробовиком оборонять своё ранчо от коров-зомби. Геймплейно это смесь side-scrolling shooter и tower defence. Как и в серии Plants vs. Zombies, тут можно устанавливать защитные барьеры. Одновременно с этим нужно перемещаться по локации и в ручном режиме отстреливать наступающие орды дохлых коров. Игра очень на любителя, зайдёт далеко не всем. Тем не менее, смело можно рекомендовать любителям добротного треша. 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198002506911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 415, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1606460057}
review:
The Culling of the Cows is just not a great game.  It's quite simple.  You're an old farmer with a shotgun, you have zombie cows, zombies, baseball players, and more throughout the whole game that try and take over your farm.  You have to kill them before they get in your barn.  Some are slow, some are fast, and some take extra shots to put down.  You must reload manually, which makes it quite frantic, and the old man...well he's old and he's a bit slow on the walking around to better position himself to fight.

The graphics are decent for this type of game, but could definitely be better.  The sound effects are horrendous, they just end up annoying you especially as you repeat levels, and you'll repeat them often.  The music is not helping either, it's not bad, but it doesn't build any enthusiasm to want to fight.

What is wrong with the game is the feeling that it's been made difficult just by making you slow.  If the farmer was quick and agile and the enemies were strategically difficult that's one thing, but they are not, it's truly because of slow walking speed and slow reload speed that you die more times than not.

It was fun for a minute, but quickly got old especially once I hit those tough levels where I needed to replay them again and again.  Sorry, just can't recommend a grind fest game where there is not much thought put into making the game (UFO Nazis?) and not much thought into playing the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974313479', 'num_games_owned': 1211, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1602802971}
review:
It a very fun little game.
Like you see in the video, you move around a small area (it won't strafe, just the map changes) and you are shooting several zombie enemies.

You can upgarde your ammunition (4 different types), your weapon (max ammo, reload "speed", shooting speed and laser pointer) and you can call up to 4 different assists (like helicopter shooter) that will last a while and then will have a cool down.

Each level starts with nothing thou, you level up by credits during the level and then will decide what to upgrade best for this level. Also you can unlook ingame "badges" by not using certain upgrades.

There are 2 boss levels and a couple of levels where you shoot with a rifle from the barn.

For getting the 100 % you will have just to play the game throu, but the final boss is a bit more difficult than the rest of the game.

I played roughly 3 hours but will finish the ingame badges. I guess that will make it 4 or 5 hours then.
Fun game if you like what you see in the videos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031617164', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1598788542}
review:
더 컬링 오브 더 카우

2D 사이드스크롤 슈팅 디펜스 게임.
농부 할아버지가 좀비화된 소들과 사람들로부터 농장을 지키는 스토리이다.
한 화면에 갇혀서 미친 듯이 몰려오는 소들을 잡으면 된다.

사실 싸구려 인디게임에 뭘 기대하는 것 자체가 실례이긴 하지만,
이건 싸구려도 너무 싸구려지 않냐...
일러스트는 대충 갈기고, 효과음은 무료 사이트에서 긁어온 것 같다.
떠돌아 다니는 무료 플래시 게임이나 모바일 게임보다 못하다.

별 생각 없이 하면 그리 나쁘지만은 않은 게임이긴 하지만...
별 생각 없이 플레이하게 하고 싶으면 차라리 난이도를 더 쉽게 해주지.
난이도가 그렇게 쉽지도 않다.

조작이 뻣뻣하고 이상해서 움직이는 것이 힘들고, 쏠 때마다 장전하는 것은 정말 짜증난다.
가끔 총이 쏴지지도 않고, 히트 판정은 어이가 없다.
한 대 맞으면 해당 맵을 처음부터 다시 해야 하는 것은 덤.

그리고 스팀에서 분명히 '컨트롤러 완벽 지원'이라고 써져 있었는데,
뭔 씁... 전혀 아니다. 절대 패드로 하지 마라.
조작은 십자패드로 해야 하고 특정 커맨드는 조작이 불가능하다.

플레이 타임은 엔딩까지 2시간 정도.
전체적으로 너무 구리다.
비추.

진행도: 엔딩 봄.
스팀 도전과제는 전부 깼는데, 게임 내부의 도전과제는 다 안 깸.

플레이 날짜: 2020.8.30.

author: {'steamid': '76561198317780297', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1680876224}
review: Grę otrzymałem jako darmowy klucz na dogry kilka lat temu i jakoś nigdy nie byłem przekonany co do tego typu gier, ot zapełniacz biblioteki steam. Natomiast po rozegraniu  kilku minut jestem w stanie stwierdzić, że gra jest warta do zagrania. Co prawda cena za jaką sprzedaje ją steam jest lekko zawyżona biorąc pod uwagę kontent jaki się w niej znajduje, lecz mimo wszystko z czystym sercem grę mogę polecić każdemu kto chciałby się odstresować po pracy. Motyw zabijania krów zombie jest przekomiczny i mimo wszystko dość relaksujący. Dochodzi także system zręcznościowy wymagający od gracza nieco więcej co również jest zdecydowanie na plus! Polecam

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11207, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1596365076}
review:
This is a simple 2D hand drawn soldier-defense game where you control a redneck farmer and shoot various alien infested/diseased cows that attack your farm.  Move between different attack lanes and shoot your enemies with your upgraded weapons and ammunition.

This really feels like a flash/browser game.  The hand drawn art is mediocre but kind of passable.  Resolution and controls are fixed, so the technical implementation falls below minimum standards.  Despite the low quality, tablet-esque gameplay, the developers are charging $7.50 for this, the same price as older AAA games like Deus Ex: Human Revolution or Cities in Motion.  It's just not possible to recommend this when you can play Plants vs Zombies for free.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054436697', 'num_games_owned': 3211, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1592925240}
review: Продолжаем шествовать по играм прошлого! The Culling Of The Cows - это 2D Defence экшен про самые жуткие кошмары рэнднеков связанные с нацистами, НЛО и ЗОМБИ. Игра пробегается быстро и за раз без всяких затруднений. Врагов много, набегают скопом и не дают расслабиться, много абилок и бонусов, обязательно советую использовать Улучшенную дробь (зелёный дробовик) + модификаторы с правой стороны, лазер (он 4 из модификаторов справа) не советую использовать, так как он просто бесполезен, также как и 3 с 4 виды дробовиков. По акции купить и скоротать вечерок в самый раз, для любителей игр по типу Plants and Zombies.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117296458', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1590546923}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows é um shoot em' up com alguns elementos de tower defense, aonde você controla um fazendeiro que deve proteger a sua fazenda de vacas zumbis e outras criaturas.

O que mata este jogo é o controle, você controla o fazendeiro com WASD mas ele apenas atira em duas direções, frente em linha reta ou atrás com alt-fire, o que não seria tão ruim se as os inimigos não fossem 10x mais rápidos que você e as todas as hitboxes são extremamente inconstantes e o fazendeiro morre com apenas um hit, o que gera várias situações em que você erra o alvo que está bem na sua frente, só pre morrer e ter que refazer o round,

O jogo permite que você compre upgrades de munição e arma e personalize o seu arsenal e poderes extra, mas devido a falta de precisão. o único upgrade que você precisa é o birdshot que fragmenta o seu tiro. o resto não presta, o jogo tem alguns desafios para terminar os rounds sem usar upgrades ou poderes, mas não há nenhum incentivo para completar estes desafios.

No geral. o jogo parece um desses jogos mal-feitos de flash, dá pra se divertir um pouco, mas é muito frustante para recomendar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118213076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1416416001}
review: The Culling Of The Cows es un Indie Tower Defence con algo de Estrategia en el que adoptamos el rol de Sammy, un granjero en medio de un apocalipsis zombie que debe proteger su granja con todo el arsenal que tenga a su disposición. Enfrentaremos oleadas de zombies, vacas zombies, gordas zombies y hasta un Ovni Nazi. Es un juego entretenido pero corto, de aproximadamente 5 horas en el que podemos upgradear nuestra arma principal y desbloquear habilidades especiales  para detener las hordas de zombies durante 40 niveles que cada vez son más feroces. Un juego recomendado para pasar el rato si te gusta eliminar oleadas de zombies sin sentido, además en ofertas llega a costar $0.99.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132503739', 'num_games_owned': 601, 'num_reviews': 548, 'playtime_forever': 362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1587013716}
review:
[b]My playtime:[/b] 6h (based on steam, 100% achievements, 100% completion).
[b]Grindy Achievement:[/b] No.
[b]Optional Achievement:[/b] Yes (3 achievements).
[b]Difficult Achievement:[/b] No.
[b]Developer Response:[/b] No (last response is in 17 Nov, 2016).

[h1]Intro[/h1]
[i]The Culling Of The Cows[/i] is a side-scrolling shooter game where you shoot zombie cows and humans to defend them from entering your barn. There are 41 levels with 3 different modes in total.

Pros:
- 41 levels
- 3 different modes
- You can adjust the difficulty yourself
- Upgrades
- Assists

Cons:
- Hard to see the text in the main menu
- Hard to listen to the tutorial voice
- Enemy hitbox isn't calculated in 3D location

[h1]Should you buy this game?[/h1]
[b]Yes.[/b]
[i]If you like to shoot zombies, you should buy this game.[/i]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[h1]In-Depth Review[/h1]

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
This game uses 2D graphics with different backgrounds in each level. I like the fact that the background in each level matches with the background in the overworld. The zombies are also drawn beautifully - even after you've killed them. However, the main menu isn't as great as the game. The texts are hard to see and I don't see any value in the screen before the main menu since there's only the game title and "press <space> to continue" text in it.

[h1]The game[/h1]
As I said before, the game has 3 different modes: [i]Waves[/i], [i]Onslaught[/i], and [i]Kill them all[/i]. [i]Waves[/i] is a mode where you have to kill zombies in 2-7 waves depending on the level. [i]Onslaught[/i] is a mode where you use a gun with unlimited ammo to shoot enemies from the second floor of your barn. [i]Kill them all[/i] is similar to [i]Waves[/i] except that there is only one wave with more zombies in it and you can't let any zombies enter your barn.

This game also has one tutorial level. The rules of the game will be explained by a voice. I'm not sure if it's because of my bad listening skills or not but I couldn't seem to understand what was said. Luckily, there are also some texts that will explain the game mechanics in more detail.

You'll have a gun and some money in [i]Waves[/i] and [i]Kill them all[/i] modes to upgrade your weapon and/or ammo. The weapon upgrade consists of increasing the ammo count, reload count, and both shooting and reload speed. There is also an upgrade that gives an infra-red like thing to your gun to make it easier to aim.

You can also upgrade your ammo to give it more damage. There is ammo that is split into 3 different directions, ammo that can pierce through enemies, and ammo that can explode right into the target which will also kill enemies nearby. The amount of money that you can spend depends on each level though so you have to choose each upgrade wisely.

This game also has [i]Assists[/i] and [i]Supply drops[/i] features. [i]Assists[/i] is like a skill that can be activated to help you kill enemies. The [i]Assists[/i] that you get in each level are different and you need to wait for a while before using them again. On the other hand, [i]Supply drops[/i] is a powerup that can help to increase your speed or money. The tutorial said that it also has a cooldown like [i]Assists[/i] although I never used it that much to try it out.

The game itself is quite easy to beat if you use all of the upgrades and [i]Assists[/i] available. However, if you want to add some challenges, the game also offers 3 different optional objectives that you can aim for. [i]Waves[/i] usually has objectives to not let any zombies reach your barn, upgrade your weapon, and miss any shots while [i]Kill them all[/i] has objectives to not buy weapon upgrades, use [i]Assists[/i], and buy ammo upgrades. If you think that doing all 3 at once is too difficult, you can always do them one by one. Note that doing this is not necessary for obtaining 100% steam achievements so you can skip it if you want.

However, I think that the "not missing any shot" objective is bugged. I always got it as long as I upgraded my ammo even though I missed a lot of shots. It somehow fixed itself on one level though.

This game also has cheat codes that you can use to fool around. I haven't tried it out myself but I'm sure you can have fun with it if you like that kind of thing.

There are a lot of unique enemies in the game. There is a zombie that can dash super fast, a zombie that carry explosives, and so on. You'll need to think which one to prioritize and watch your step because although enemies usually come from the right side of the screen to the left side (where your barn is located), there is also an enemy that comes from top to bottom. However, the game doesn't seem to differentiate the hitbox in 3D since you'll still get hit if your head is in their landing spot.

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
It's a fun game where you shoot zombies. You can upgrade your ammo and weapon and use [i]Assists[/i] to finish the game. You also can adjust the game difficulty yourself by completing objectives and/or using cheat codes.

[quote][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/23741321]Follow our curator page[b] Alexander's Club Curations[/b], if you like and want to see more reviews like this one.[/url][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198083736752', 'num_games_owned': 526, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1589653136}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows is [b]the best example[/b] of a great idea but executed poorly. Not everyone can stomach that weird clunky control & the horrible enemies that came in rainbow colors. People were complaining about rock and roll tower defense being ugly and all that. here, this is a master-level of shit looking stuffs. intentionally or not, we'll never know.

[list]
    [*]I was rudely taken by surprised that I was not able to move my character's aiming. I can only shoot horizontally and my enemies could move in zig zags. Is this design intentional ?
    [*]I was also shocked to find out that I had to be reloading constantly, all throughout the campaign non-stop. 24 fucking 7 all day long.
This is the ultimate game challenge. Not the bloody cows/zombies. The fucking shotgun that can only hold 8 bullets without upgrades.
[/list]

This product reminded me of another product which i reviewed not too long ago. A run and gun 2D game that suffers from major hit box issue. stupid horde mode. same shit for over xx maps. Well at least here we have mini-bosses/boss. For all the interesting and creative ideas, the controls pulled this product down. Badly. I feel like the entire experience, i am gimping myself .. this game isn't hard. It's hard because of its fucking controls + cheap running horde mode. Which ultimately leads to a horrible gaming session.

*face palm. rips hair* I can't do this. 

No. Just fucking no. At this price, anyone who loves tower defense games like can look for better options in the current market. No hit box issue. no clunky controls. no cheap running horde mode.

Take back the nazi ufo and all this rainbow crap. Go back to farm simulator. It's much more rewarding. and fuck that giant finger too.

review:
Un granjero de campo ha descubierto el porque del virus de la vaca loca, entonces decide ir a un programa de televisión a contarlo.
Se presenta el hombre de campo en el programa
_adelante caballero, y bueno... ,¿que hacemos acá?  _dice la conductora con tono de que ya le cayo mal el granjero
_he descubierto el mal, el virus de la vaca loca y le voy a dar alguno datos para que usted entienda.
_ah! bien, ¿y ?....
_bueno por ejemplo , en primer lugar la vaca se aparea con el toro una sola vez al año.
_ ah!,  ¿y ? ....
_ bueno en segundo lugar ordeñamos a la vaca en el campo 4 veces al día
_ si!,  ¿y ? ...
_ como ¿ y ?, como ¿ y ? _dice el granjero enojado _ si a vos te manoseo las tetas 4 veces al día y te garcho una sola vez al año como no te vas a volver loca vieja cajetona.

review: It's a wave defense type game. Gameplay can be frustrating and a bit bland. You walk and shoot cows. There are a few power-ups, but you start with cash at the beginning of each level and can't earn more to buy more upgrades. You then have to rebuy upgrades every level. It's basically the same game each level with some enemy variants. I don't recommend this game unless you're pretty bored.

author: {'steamid': '76561198282020349', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 392, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1575813896}
review:
EMERGENGY:
All Farmers in the Area must Leave, the COWS are mutating and are dangerous, nooooo,
(explanation none!!!!).
Only an armed Farmer decides to stay and Eliminate the terrible contaminated animals.
THIS IS MY FARM, DYING MONSTERS.
Help the old man eliminate WAVES of enemies.
Weapons and Military Aid available.
Good music, sound effects (Punches and Voices) Image Quality and much more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050472614', 'num_games_owned': 1285, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1569148109}
review:
[h1]Запуск игры под SteamPlay/Proton[/h1]
[b]
Такое себе, смесь защиты башен и бокового шутера,  остреливаем зомби-коров под стрёмную музычку и однотипные звуки выстрелов и вытья коров. Рисовка жуткая, игра надоедает быстро, отчасти из своей однотипности так как
уровней много и тупо увеличивается количество волн и противников. Разработчики добавили консоль читов, чтобы не так было нудно играть.
Ачивки получить легко.
Плохой отзыв не поставлю, игра нейтральная, не плохо и не хорошо.
[/b]


Тестировалось всё на Ubuntu Mate 18.04.3 и ноутбуке:
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2540M @ 2.60GHz
RAM: SO-DIMM DDR3 12Gb 1333MHz
SSD:SAMSUNG EVO 850 120Gb
Video: Intel HD 3000 + Nvidia GeForce GT 540M(Fermi)
Версия proton 4.11-5

author: {'steamid': '76561197998289421', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1568947743}
review: Le jeu est rigide, on ne peut pas modifier ses touches, aucune des manettes que j'ai essayé de faire fonctionné n'a été reconnu pour ce jeu dont une xbox 360 , la même que montré dans le menu des contrôles!!! (et je les avais toutes essayé sur rogue legacy toutes marchaient). En plus le jeu est en qwerty de base c'est chiant mais il y a pire.  Le principe de vague est répétitif à souhait sachant que les bonus sont pas incroyables. Je ne voulais pas prendre le temps de laisser une évaluation, mais comme pour la première fois je ne finirai pas un jeu commencé je me suis dit que le temps de jeu non utilisé au final servirait à cette évaluation. Et le pire c'est le prix. C'est honteux.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135371703', 'num_games_owned': 999, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1562880565}
review:
Выживание в условиях зомбикоровофермоапокалипсиса. Не сложное, если покупать улучшения для дробовика и разлетающиеся патроны. Ещё менее сложное, при вызове дополнительной защиты. Но невыносимо сложное, если все это не использовать. Не обязательно так проходить, но для получения трех "звезд" придётся. В некоторых уровнях точно. 
Картинка в игре интересная. Хорошая рисовка фона, врагов. Сюжет странный, но с юморком в конце. Геймплейно интересно, но только при улучшенном оружие. И то, однообразная стрельба по врагам быстро надоедает.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067090064', 'num_games_owned': 804, 'num_reviews': 372, 'playtime_forever': 500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1578854317}
review:
Простая в своей сути, но великолепная игра!

Фермер просто защищает владения на протяжении кучи уровней.
Однако, здесь очень приятный дизайн, драйвовая музыка, разнообразные уровни и разнообразные враги.
Геймплей кажется простым, но на самом деле продуманный. На каждом уровне нужно решить какие улучшения покупать, когда использовать защитные механизмы, когда перезаряжать ружьё, и при этом ваша сноровка тоже важна!
Всё очень похвально.

10 мясных шутеров из 10!
Если любите с юморком потратить время отстреливая зомби.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034617281', 'num_games_owned': 242, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1432256578}
review: meh

author: {'steamid': '76561198037839153', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 297, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1424582743}
review:
[h1]RECENZJA RETROSPEKCYJNA[/h1]

[b]Pokonaj je wszystkie[/b]
Życie w czasach apokalipsy zombie nie jest łatwe ale może być zabawne. Możesz się o tym przekonać biorąc giwerę w dłonie i jako rolnik chroniący swoją farmę przed zarazą, stanąć na przeciw hordzie nieumarłych. Gra polega na eliminowaniu wszystkiego co się próbuje wedrzeć do twojej stodoły.
[b]Najlepszą obroną jest atak[/b]
Twórcy dobrze wiedzieli że samo strzelanie do nadchodzących przeciwników mogłoby szybko znużyć więc zapewnili graczom masę różnych udogodnień. Po pierwsze strzelba. Poza podstawowym rodzajem amunicji możemy załadować ją trzema dodatkowymi oferującymi trafienie za jednym wystrzałem kilku przeciwników czy to przebiciem czy dodatkowym wybuchem. Samą strzelbę usprawnić możemy również wykupując modyfikacje szybkostrzelności, wielkości magazynka czy celownik laserowy. Gdyby tego było za mało to każdy etap ma tak zwane "asysty" czyli wzywane na życzenie specjalne ataki pozwalające co jakiś czas zrzucić bombę, zesłać nalot, zablokować wejście do szopy piłą czy podpalić drogę napalmem. No czego więcej można chcieć?
[b]To robi różnicę[/b]
Etapy zachowują pewien schemat. Przeciwnicy nadchodzą falami których powstrzymujemy wymyślnymi zasobami. Przy okazji zbieramy zrzucane nam paczki zwiększając fundusze na ulepszenia i amunicję lub otrzymując np. czasowo nielimitowaną amunicję. Dzięki przemyślanemu zróżnicowaniu przeciwników (jedni są szybsi, inni wybuchają itd.) kolejność eliminacji nie może być przypadkowa. Żeby nie było zbyt monotonnie standardowo chodzone etapy przeplatane są ze statycznym strzelaniem (rakietnicą czy CKM-em) i oczywiście przez walki z Bardzo Osobliwymi Stworami Specjalnymi. Cała rozgrywka jest odpowiednio wyważona a kolejne etapy dobrze przygotowują do pojawiających się wyzwań.
[b]Wyzwanie do zdobycia[/b]
Dodatkowym atutem gry dla zainteresowanych kończeniem gier "na 100%" jest system osiągnięć. Zakończenie fabuły jest niemal równoznaczne ze zdobyciem wszystkich wyzwań a "suche" przejście nie powinno zająć więcej niż 3 godz.

review: This game is really frustrating. It's a shame coz the graphics and sounds are on point but the gameplay itself is garbage. author: {'steamid': '76561198012362002', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 295, 'last_played': 1559453468}
review:
[quote=Wasterbull] Indie Game [/quote]

[i]Zombie cows and an old man willing to defend his home from the most surreal invasion[/i]

[h1]	PLOT	[/h1]
[h1] [i] [code] You're an old man, that you must defend your home against zombie cows that are much more dangerous than zombies. Because the cows are kamikazes.[/code] [/i] [/h1] 


[h1]	GAMEPLAY	[/h1]
Easy to play, although at first you have to understand the system but it's easy. I think it's fun 'cause of the surreal thing about having to kill zombie cows and the weirdest final boss I've ever seen as player.

You can play with keyboard and mouse or joystick, it has many buttons like to recharge, buy and upgrade weapons, use special attacks. It's a decent game, at least it's fun.

The difficulty starts easy and as you advance each level, increases its difficulty and I think that the design of the levels are super basic, despite that it has some good challenge.

[h1]	GRAPHIC	[/h1]
Well, it's premise is simple and that's why it has a decent visual work, it's 2D and there's not much to say, it's just fun to see the zombie cows and an angry old man willing to kill anyone who invades their property.

[h1]	MUSIC	[/h1]
It's decent.

[h1]	NOTE 5.5/10	[/h1]

[h1]	MY OPINION ABOUT THE GAME	[/h1]
This caught my attention 'cause its absurd plot and interesting gameplay, I think it's fun game and it also has easy achievements.

[h1] PRO +[/h1]
[list]
    [*]A fun game and simple gameplay[/list]
    [*]5 Achievements for those who like to add more games completed at 100%[/list]

[h1]CONTRA -[/h1]
[list]
[*]The gameplay is a bit rough[/list]

    [*]I think the game is expensive because it's so short the duration[/list]

[code]I laughed a lot and it's a challenging game, if you are looking to kill time, it is a good option to play.[/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198402657498', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1555980919}
review:
Culling of the Cows 🐮 🧟‍♂️ 👴 🔫 

Довольно привлекательная 2D "мини-игра" в духе всеми известных Plants VS Zombies

Сюжет : Дед фермер с дробашом отстреливается от зомби быков. Точка...

Геймплей: Бегаем по полю, стреляем в бычар и прочую фермерскую дичь, получаем павер-апы, короче ничего нового. 

ПЛЮСЫ

Хороший музон
" Эпичные" сцены смерти игрока 
Качественная 2D анимация 
Разнообразие противников

МИНУСЫ
Всё остальное довольно однообразно. Сюжет, Геймплей, это уже в скором времени начнёт надоедать. Больше ничего о минусах сказать не могу. 

В итоге я поставлю этой игре 8/10
Несмотря на свое унылое однообразие, она является довольно неплохой причиной убить время, если пасьянс уже надоел.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030516476', 'num_games_owned': 5534, 'num_reviews': 465, 'playtime_forever': 905, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 905, 'last_played': 1554740764}
review:
Petit jeu de tir et plus ou moins tower defense. Le but est de dégommer des vaches et des zombies et de les empécher d'entrer dans votre grange.

S'il est humoristique et bien fun au départ, il fini par taper sur le système à cause de ces meuglements qui continueront à vous hanter une fois que vous aurez quitté le jeu.

J'ai hésité à le recommander, mais en fait il accumule trop de points négatifs, à commencer par son côté trop vite répétitif,  ses graphismes qui font penser à un jeu flash, une hit box pas toujours au top et un prix beaucoup trop élevé.

Même si dans un premier temps il est bien marrant et amusant de faire un carnage avec toutes ces pauvres petites vaches zombifiées, il devient ensuite redondant de toujours exécuter la même tâche sans aucune variante.
Bien que le décor et le bestiaire changent un peu, le gameplay quand à lui reste identique du début à la fin, il n'y qu'une seule et unique arme on aurait apprécié pouvoir varier les plaisirs et en avoir d'autres sous la main.
Le son ambiant est juste une horreur qui vous prend la tête...

A ce pris là on peut trouver beaucoup mieux ailleurs.


[code]Si vous avez apprécié cette évaluation et souhaitez découvrir d'autres jeux venez suivre ma [url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/indepgames/curation]page de curation[/url].[/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198182683579', 'num_games_owned': 520, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1489320921}
review:
eloo
Jak widać w tytule gra The Culling Of The Cows opowiada o krowach. Nie zwykłych krowach, lecz krowach zombie. Ciekawy pomysł nieprawdaż? Otóż gra opowiada o tym, że krowy zostały zarażone jakimś wirusem i chcą nas jak to zombie zabić. Jesteśmy starszym panem ze strzelbą, więc w sumie wygryw. Za każdym razem stoimy na strychu swojej stodoły i strzelamy do krów, które biegną żeby nas zabić. Jedno jest dziwne. Dlaczego w każdym poziomie jesteśmy w tej samej stodole, mimo iż się przemieszczamy. Gra posiada system ulepszania. Ulepszamy bronie, postać i chyba tyle. W sumie nie pamiętam. Grałem kilka miesięcy temu. Gra ma nie najlepszą grafikę, aczkolwiek to do niej pasuje, więc grafika jest na +. Kolejnym + tej gry są karty. Głównie dla nich zacząłem w nią grać. W sumie nie jestem w stanie znaleźć jakichś -, co nie zmienia faktu, że daję tej grze jedynie 6/10.

review:
[h1]Review #44 [/h1]
[b]TL;DR[/b] 4 cows injured in the making of this process out of 10
[b]Pros[/b]
[list]
    [*] Character controls responsive
    [*] Generic old man voice is always welcome
 [/list]
[b]Cons[/b]
[list]
    [*] Sometimes the hit detection felt a bit off
    [*] Felt like there was a lack of variety 
    [*] Price point
[/list]
[b]Impressions of the game[/b] In all likelihood if you own this game chances are you didn’t play much of it. No offense to the creator but, there was little in the first hour of so that would make it stand out amongst its peers. I would however, like to say that overall the game is pretty responsive and works as it should. That being said, the price point of $10 is much too high for something that is more akin to a flash game than a full-fledged title. Good luck on future works and hope that this was helpful.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082765157', 'num_games_owned': 9993, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1550970401}
review:
This is a simple shoot em up, with some mild elements of tower defence.  However, I had a blast while playing and my interest was held right to the conclusion.

The premise of the game is ridiculous:  You are a farmer whose land has been overrun by zombie cows and other unholy terrors.  As a God fearing Southerner, you take it upon yourself to rid the world of these monstrosities with the aid of your trusty 12-gauge.

The game is a wave shooter, and it takes place from a side perspective.  Each level takes place on a single static screen.  You begin on the left hand side, outside your barn which you are protecting.  The beasts spawn on the right hand side, and try to make it past you and into the barn (presumably to feast upon your own animals).

To help you in your bovine killing mission, you have an upgradeable shotgun and a number of assists.  You start each level with a limited amount of cash which can be spent on various types of ammo or on certain aspects of the gun such as fire rate or capacity.  The assists are unlimited, but have a cool down rate.  They come in many forms, from a sentry gun to a nuclear bomb.  The upgrades and assists provide a small amount of strategy to what is otherwise just a blast em up.

There is a great deal of humour throughout; obviously a game about killing zombie cattle isn't going to take itself too serious.  This is clear through the visuals and the audio.

The graphics are colourful and cartoony.  The assets appear to be hand drawn for the most part, perhaps with the exception of the boss characters.  There can be quite a lot of characters on the screen at any one time, and I did notice some slowdown when the bodies (which do not disappear) began to pile up.  I'm sure most modern systems can handle it though.

The audio is similarly cartoon like.  The opening developer's logo splash screen is very telling on the quality of audio.  The logo features a cow jumping over the moon, and the "moo" which it emits is clearly not that of a bovine.  The farmer also has some very witty lines of dialogue, but it can be difficult to hear him over the constant blasting of the shotgun and the frantic music.

The soundtrack is very limited.  In fact I only noted two or three different tunes.  The music that accompanies each level is on a fairly short loop and it does get repetitive, but there are independent sliders for sound, music and dialogue.

I enjoyed my playthrough of this game, but I would suggest waiting to pick it up on sale.  The game reminded me of an old Flash game that was on the Mars Attacks website wayyy back when that movie released.

Probably not for animal rights activists or for anyone who may hold the cow sacred!
