author: {'steamid': '76561197967419832', 'num_games_owned': 1365, 'num_reviews': 193, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1448531238}
review:
It's surprisingly fun, Culling of the Cows. Barn on the left, Zombies come from the right, kill them before they get to the barn. Survive multiple waves to beat the level, but be careful, since if the Zombies touch/hit you, you will die instantly. To compare it to another game, its a lot like the "The Last Stand" Flash game, and I'm talking about the [i]first[/i] 'The Last Stand'. Also one of the more difficult parts about shooting is that you can only shoot strait ahead of your character, as in you can't use the mouse to angle his gun to the upper/lower rows.

Other than the basic shooting, with your Shotgun, there are 4 other aspects in fighting.
[list]
[*] [b]Ammo -[/b] There are 4 ammo types: Normal, Buckshot, Piercing, and Explosive. You need to pay for these.

[*] [b]Supply Drop -[/b] When you press the Supply Drop button, a crate will fall from the air, a delivery strait from God(seriously). It can contain various temporary powerups like 10 second invincibility, Unlimited Ammo(10sec), or even basic Cash Drops. When a Drop is called, the ability is placed on cooldown, and can be pressed again when it goes off the cooldown. This is free to use.

[*] [b]Assists -[/b] This is where God himself, I'm serious here, helps you out. Like placing a giant saw in front of your barn door to kill advancing zombies, or a turret that randomly shoots, or a wall of fire in the middle of the screen. They are brief, like 10 seconds or something, and go on a cooldown after used, but they're useful. These are Free to use.

[*] [b]Upgrades -[/b] These are 4 simple upgrades for your Shotgun, they are: Clip Size, Reload Speed, Shoot Speed, and a Laser Pointer. You need to pay for these.
[/list]

Each level you start out with a certain amount of cash. These can be used on the Ammo or Upgrades. You can get more cash from Supply Drops. The higher the level, the more you start with. And for the record, Ammo and Upgrades to not transfer to other levels.

I definitely recommend this game to anyone who enjoyed The Last Stand, or anyone who likes this type of game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067004017', 'num_games_owned': 495, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1452667026}
review:
The Culling of the Cows is a game about a redneck farmer going crazy from bad moonshine and starting to shoot the livestock around the place, hallucinating them to be zombies. Further hallucinations include, but are not limited to, a Nazi UFO.

10/10 would shoot the drooling bastards again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066645918', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 302, 'last_played': 1449106865}
review:
这款游戏就像游戏界的B级片，剧情简单，画面粗劣，造型奇葩，充满了各种重口味的元素和（也许并不好笑的）黑色幽默，但是假如你能够适应这些因素的话，它着实能够让你爽上一段时间。
详细说来，这是一款移动式的塔防游戏，就是那种主角在固定画面里走来走去把所有冲过来的敌人都干掉的类型。
整体来讲这款游戏做的还可以
在玩法上，有守一波，车轮战，boss战，固定射击四种关卡模式交替进行，前期不上手的时候比较烦，后期各种关卡交替比较频繁，相对来说轻松一些。
武器除了固定射击关卡有三种之外，其他关卡都是霰弹枪，但是有四种子弹[spoiler] 虽然个人认为只有6号散弹好用[/spoiler]，四种升级和五种支援，还算多样化
敌人的类型也有好几种，会随着游戏进程不断解锁，多少也是一种玩下去的动力
[b]但是，这款游戏也有一个最大的缺点r[/b]，那就是瞄准系统实在很差，像《植物大战僵尸》里，每一条路都有明显的分界，而这款游戏没有，所以有时候敌人撞一下你的脚，你就gameover，而你对着敌人的头猛射，系统偏偏认为你打偏了，这在前面的游戏流程还算可以忍受，但是到了最后一关的boss战就会变得超级烦人。
此外这款游戏有个让人哭笑不得的设定，这游戏一共五个成就，你打了第一关就能解锁四个，而最后一个则要打完最后一关才行，真是逼死强迫症啊。
如果说要给出一个总评的话，这款游戏属于那种有一定乐趣，但同时也存在缺陷的类型，能玩，甚至一定程度上还算好玩，但也只能属于那种实在没什么想玩的游戏时拿来打发时间的类型。
---------------------------------------------------------------
附录：最终boss简易打法
[spoiler] 最终boss共有三个阶段：
 第一阶段，boss会浮在空中放出炸弹牛，但是你只需要躲在最右上角或右下角的地方，它们就炸不到你。放完牛之后，飞碟落地，三枪之后第一形态结束。
第二形态，boss会先放激光，这个激光打到身上不会死的，炸开之后才会死，绕地图转圈慢慢躲开就行。
然后boss会放冲撞牛，同样躲在右上角就可以了。注意这里右下角会被撞死的。
然后boss落地，最好在落地前你就开始后退，因为这个阶段要打五枪，别被他碰到。
 第三阶段没什么好说的技巧，只能说尽量靠近上方，牛很少到上面，激光打到了别慌，慢慢躲。这个形态只有黑色的獾有威胁，会朝你直冲过去，所以必须杀死。
然后是最后一个阶段了，要打七枪，所以前一个阶段的牛能躲就躲，一定要给自己留下子弹，打完就可以看完结局动画全成就了。[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198030705477', 'num_games_owned': 661, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1448066049}
review:
Crappy graphics (they should've gone to retro style instead), jerky animation, repetitive gameplay but somewhat strangely good. Think of it like the classic Crimsonland, but the enemies only come from the right side of the screen. It's hard to hit the cows, but when you do, it feels satisfying. Great for short burst of fun. 

I'm not sure about the later levels since I haven't spent too much time on it, but I can see it can become very chaotic.

I got it for free. Do I recommend a purchase of this game? Yes, but only in discount and if you don't have any other games to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142279336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1418973164}
review:
Идеальная залипака на пару часов, особенно если вы в дороге или на работе и у вас есть возможность (свободная минутка) поиграть. Ключик на игру предоставил один из моих подписчиков (спасибо ему большое), я совершенно не собирался долго в неё играть, садился на 10 минут посмотреть, что да как, в итоге смог оторваться только через два часа после полного прохождения и получения всех достижений! 

А на деле это юморной 2D тир, где мы в роли бравого дедушки фермера пытается выжить от нашествия зомби-коров. Конечно на нашем пути повстречаются и другие противники, например, заражённые бейсболисты, птицы убийцы и даже НЛО! Суть проста, мы отбиваем волну за волной уничтожая толпы заражённых врагов большинство из которых коровы. С каждым следующим этапом сложность и количество нападающих повышается, плюс, прибавляются новые: с повышенным здоровьем, более быстрые, взрывающиеся и так далее. Это практически tower defence, но с минимальной тактикой. У игры очень низкой порог вхождения, мы лишь двигаемся вверх-вниз и изредка влево-вправо и отстреливаем настырных супостатов, мешающих мирно жить. На выбор 4 типа патрон и несколько апгрейдов, вроде быстрой перезарядки и лазерного прицела. Концепция, как и геймплей очень просты, однако не думайте, что сама игра лёгкая, особенно на поздних этапах придётся попотеть. Весь сок кроется во внимательности и быстрой реакции. Причём конкретное сочетание апгрейдов и патрон проявляются в каждой миссии по-разному. Где-то нужно уничтожить лишь одну волну, но усиленную, где-то наоборот отбиваться в течении пяти волн и нужна хорошая скорострельность. Периодически выпадают уровни с возможностью только стрелять, в такие моменты игра превращается в 100% тир, а количество врагов возрастает этак втрое. 

После прохождения каждого задания на душе приятное чувство, а главное, хочется ещё, т.к. это банально весело и местами очень хардкорно. Стоить упомянуть, что иногда нам дают использовать ловушки, и если на начальных этапах это всего лишь поджечь поле чтобы враги сами себя уничтожали, то в середине можно вызывать вертолёт с пулемётом на борту, а ближе к концу устраивать ядерные взрывы! В общем градус безумия отличный, авторы явно высмеивали свой продукт, зато в итоге получили превосходную стрелялку-залипалку. Ну а сражение с финальным боссом потребует от вас быть очень внимательным и дико быстро реагировать. 

И весь этот чёрный юмор приправлен очень милой и добротной рисовкой, да и пойдёт игра на любом компьютере даже десятилетней, а то и пятнадцатилетней давности! К тому же 80% ачивок (4 из 5) можно получить за 5 минут, а вот ради последней придётся пройти игру до конца! Лишь цена слегка высоковата, по умолчанию - 289р, идеальный ценник был бы 100 рублей, а уж в сезон скидок, думаю будет стоить ещё дешевле. Обязательно возьмите в коллекцию хорошего инди!

author: {'steamid': '76561198038967349', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1447363629}
review:
I've just cleared "The Culling Of The Cows" and before you read any further, I will tell you, it's an okay game, but I wouldn't buy it myself (I got it in a gift :))

The game is about a farmer, who needs to clear his way through sick cows and fat goths. And by clearing, I mean shooting everything and everyone in his way. In the end you even get to kill a mtherf*cking Nazi Ufo, so that's kinda cool.
But the game takes about 3-4 hours to clear, maybe less and it's kinda easy once you get into it. I started bored and kinda scared of the dead cows running towards me. But once I got the upgrades and the "help" it got more and more "brutal" but also intresting. The ending does kinda suck, but that doesn't play a big role..

So If you like to shoot, old-school graphics/retro and zombies, I guess it's something worth.
I would rate it.. 5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025095151', 'num_games_owned': 1052, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1445560044}
review:
You defend your barn from Zombie cows, fat ex girflriends, and other crazy ... things?  I don't feel like I can recommend the game.  The game isn't bad, but the price tag is way to high for what you get.

Pros:
Good humor
Final boss is a Nazi UFO
Challenging
Tons of levels

Cons:
Feels like a flash game
Really hard to play with a controller.
Not the best bang for your buck

author: {'steamid': '76561198140044816', 'num_games_owned': 1238, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1447153154}
review:
A very simplistic side-scrolling survival game. It's really fun and perfect for when you want to kill some time. Some of the levels can be more than challenging but you have the choice to let "God" assist you in different ways; also, there are cheat codes provided by the game developers, if that's something you're into ;)

The achievements are fairly easy to achieve, although to get the very last one you need to complete the whole game.

According to me, it's not worth €11 (current price), so I advise you to get it during a sale!

Rednecks > cows

author: {'steamid': '76561197967069225', 'num_games_owned': 1513, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1452984854}
review:
Apparently I got this for free at some point along the way, or maybe as part of a humble bundle or similar. 
I like the part where they don't claim the farmer suffers from mental illness and uses it as an excuse for violent behaviour </sarcasm> (despite the fact that people with mental illnesses are more likely to be *victims* of violence, than perpetrators.)

Maybe it has good gameplay. Maybe the steam trading cards will be worth installing this thing and running in the background for a couple hours. 
But this is not the sort of game I would want to buy, and I cannot in good conscience recommend it in any way whatsoever. 

(Edit: Turns out I need to have run it for at least 5mins to post a review. So...)


- Arrow keys (up, down, etc) don't work on main menu screen. Had to rely on controller/mouse to go down to the options screen.
- On a fresh install 'Continue' is what you have to click in order to begin, rather than 'New Game'. A minor annoyance, but a very simple thing that should have been in the game.
- Tutorial failed to inform me that I could shoot backwards, and skips forward to the next tip if you accidentally press A rather than showing the hint text first, even if you've never run the game before. 
Got insta-killed three times trying to do the first level because I was attempting to move back far enough to protect the barn from cows that managed to run past me, and found out accidentally when trying to select a different action bar option.
- Spelling error on the text for the very first level after the tutorial. "Surly" this could have been fixed before release, or in any of the 3 updates during the year and a half since it appeared on Steam.

This could have been a good game, and there's potential there... but a little bit of quality control goes a long way, and is something this game is lacking.

review:
爛遊戲~其實難度很高~那些說簡單的~恩~修改器開無敵吧
尤其是遊戲牛衝的速度快~一關裡面階段太多~根本是疲勞轟炸
例如:某關裡面有十個等級的關卡~然後每一個等級的關卡給你一百頭牛~呵呵~你玩得下去~你破得下去(很多時候牛都是同時間往你方向衝~除非機關無限擋)
建議拿卡片就好~掛一掛拿一拿~遊戲就可以刪了
唯一的優點是~卡片好看~就這樣

author: {'steamid': '76561198127314221', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1695617318}
review:
As many of us are aware, the "indie developer" scene is exploding as of late when it comes to game creation. With so many independent companies trying to stake their claim in the gaming world, it's tough to keep track of games that are truly worthy of attention, versus those that are... well... just white noise. Among these developers is a company by the name of Decaying Logic, and they have created a unique take on the sidescrolling shooter with "Culling of the Cows."

     "Culling of the Cows" is game that is based around, you guessed, killing hordes of livestock that seem to have been infected or otherwise possessed by some strange force. Rather than feeding on hay or grass like their "more alive" brethren, the cattle of CotC prefer the taste of meat. Thankfully though, "God" and his newly appointed tool of destruction, Sammy, have something else in mind: to eliminate the existence of these flesh-craving, ravenous bovine zombie hordes. The entire game revolves entirely around this idea and it is very well executed in doing so.

     Through each level, the player is given the option to choose between several different types of ammo that range from the typical 12 gauge buckshot, all the way up to exploding rounds. These ammo types can be purchased with the in-game credits that are given to Sammy at the beginning of each level. Not only does Sammy old boy get credits at the start of each stage, but he also has the chance to earn more by supply drops. Supply drops give the player a random chance to get certain temporary upgrades, such as the aforementioned credits as well as ammo reloads or speed boosts just to name a few. On top of these supply drops (if the level permits) Sammy can call upon God to rain down various "miracles" which, in all honesty, is pretty much a full military arsenal to rain down death upon the infected livestock. The fun doesn't stop there though!

     Aside from all of the neat little upgrades and quirky buffs given to the player, there is also quite the selection of enemies. Some easy to kill like the typical black cow, while others... well... they need a little more "convincing" in order to admit defeat at the hands of our hillbilly protagonist. The levels are numerous and the entertainment value can be described as somewhat worthy. At times, the game will seem to get redundant, but it's definitely a must-have if you are in the mood for getting your hands dirty with a little mindless arcade "shoot to kill" action.

     As far as true replay value goes, there might be some to be considered. Given the short nature of the game, speed runs can most definitely be considered. Or... if you wanna try your hand at a perfect run on every level, that is most certainly an option as well!

   Overall, Culling of the Cows makes its unique mark on the Indie Dev world and although it is rather short in gameplay length, the features that are included make it well worth the price. Whether you are looking for a time killer, or wanting a new "speed run" challenge to compete with friends with, or even just looking for a good challenge to achieve that perfect score, CotC definitely delivers.

For more information on Culling of the Cows, or to download the game for yourself, please visit:
http://decayinglogic.com/the-culling-of-the-cows/




Be sure to check out my other content!

author: {'steamid': '76561197973786715', 'num_games_owned': 1942, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1445233577}
review:
I have over 500 games in my Steam account, and the vast majority of them are still unplayed. So now I'm dedicating an hour to each of these games and writing a series of One Hour Reviews. An hour isn't very long to judge a game on, so think of this as more of a first impression, and take this review in the spirit in which it's given. Be sure to read other reviews from players who have spent more time in the game. 

One Hour Reviews #36 - The Culling of the Cows

The game description notes that this is a combination side-scrolling shooter/tower defense game.  But I wouldn't put much emphasis on tower defense.  Really the focus of this game is on the shooting.  The gameplay primarily consists of you shooting at cows which charge at you from the right side of the screen.  You have to be lined up vertically with the cow in order to hit it when you shoot.  This is a fair bit trickier than it sounds, as the side scrolling perspective works against you here.  I had a lot of cases where I was sure I was lined up, only to see my bullet miss.

In addition to shooting at cows, you also have to dodge them as they charge you.  If a cow touches you, then you are immediately gored to death.  There's no health bar or second chance here, so you have to be careful.  This was another case where I found the perspective difficult to deal with, as my bullet would miss the cow, but it had no problem goring me.

There isn't much of a tower defense aspect to the game, other than the fact that you are limited in how many cows you can let pass.   Let too many pass and you'll lose.  So you have to be pretty quick, and missing a shot will cost you valuable time reloading.  Some games you can reload your entire magazine at once when you run out of bullets.  But in this game, you reload a single bullet at a time, and it takes some time, so every missed shot counts.

This is where the strategy comes in, although I use that term lightly.  The game gives you money to spend on upgrades.  So for instance you can buy an upgrade that gives your gun a laser sight, to help you line up your shots (it didn't help me at all).  Or you can buy an upgrade that lets you load an additional bullet at a time (far more useful).  You can also upgrade your ammunition.  Since money is limited, the strategy comes in wisely spending what you have on the right items.

The other bit of strategy comes in the form of a parachute that drops a care package with something random that's useful.  It takes a while to recharge so the trick is deploying it when you start getting overwhelmed.

The graphics are pretty simplistic, but I did like the art style.  I wasn't as impressed with the animation, particularly for the player.

Overall I found the game to be more difficult than I expected, due to the one 'one touch and your dead' mechanic.  In fact I never made it past the 4th stage in the time I played.  But I figure if the game is already that hard for me, I'm probably not missing that much other than even harder enemies to kill and more variety in weapons, etc.

When you add in the $12.99 price tag, I really can't justify that for a game that I had so little fun with.  There are far better shooters, far better tower defense games, and far better games in general for the money.  Culling of the Players would be a more accurate title for this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137968891', 'num_games_owned': 293, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1445125489}
review:
[b] TLDR: ONLY BUY THIS ON SALE [/b]  
Who knew killing cow's could be so deeply satisfying? Or so intensely frustrating? At it's core this game is a shooting gallery, but instead of shooting smiling yellow ducks, you're faced with angry rampaging zomby-cows. It's easy to get the hang of but as the difficulty starts to ramp up, so do the games flaws. Each level adds a new and tougher type of cow, as well as a new "Divine Intervention" ability. 
It is beyond annoying to reach the end of the level only to be gored by a green bull streaking across the screen. This is largely due to the poor movement controls, which are painfully unresponsive and make aiming tough. 
It is undeniably satisfying to litter the farmyard with cow corpses, but it's simply not worth a whole $12 (I got it from a giveaway some time ago, so I really shouldn't complain) 
[b] I would recommend this game only if you can find it under $2 [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198010189355', 'num_games_owned': 762, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1445210154}
review:
Juego puro arcade. Dispara, dispara y espera.... dispara otra vez.

Trata de sobrevivir a hordas de diferentes tipos de vacas zombies. Tu controlas a tu ganadero con tu escopeta y aguanta hasta que acabes con el ultimo zombie.

 Es un juego flash, no se le puede pedir grandes graficos, pero cumplen su cometido.

Tiene una curva de dificultad media, aunque con paciencia se acaba el juego.

Recomendado si te gustan las vacas, los juegos arcades y te gustan nuevas experiencias... Juego recomendado.

Nota: Juego caro al precio que lo venden, no pagaria mas de 2 euros para las casi 5 horas de juego que ofrece.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037482629', 'num_games_owned': 301, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1445264823}
review:
Un "giochino" in linea con la moda zombie; la storia non esiste, ma in questo tipo di giochi non credo faccia molta differenza.

Ho trovato il livello di difficoltà leggermente in calo, una volta capito come funzionano i potenziamenti e trovato il proprio stile, diventa giusto un premere il mouse per sparare, ricaricare e utilizzare gli aiuti forniti dal gioco. (Sempre che non si voglia ottenere tutte le medaglie per completismo, in quel caso forse la sfida diventa più complessa)

Se volete passare qualche ora senza pensieri fa al caso vostro. L'assenza di trama o di meccaniche complesse lo rende un gioco perfetto per chi ha poco tempo o per staccare da giochi più impegnativi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104194390', 'num_games_owned': 785, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1451816734}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198038604011', 'num_games_owned': 914, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1444095462}
review:
The Culling of the Cows is... well bland.

I’m not sure exactly what the genre would be called; you are an old farmer with a shot gun taking out mutant/zombie cows before they can reach the barn behind you. It’s the kind of goofy flash game you would see on Newgrounds back in the day, but not one you would ever be expected to pay for. The movement is a little stiff and the shots don’t actually seem to register correctly about 1/3 of the time, which is exacerbated by the flat south park-esque characters giving you no good indication of depth down range. I played it for around 20 or 30 minutes and was quite bored, then booted it back up when I noticed an announcement on the Library page: Cheat Codes Added. Generally cheat codes end up ruining the fun of a game, but in a game like this maybe skipping to the excitement would keep me engaged for at least a while longer. I activated God Mode, unlocked all the upgrades, and added an MG nest to the top of the barn; awesome right? Except it wasn’t. There wasn’t any big spectacle, the MG was anemic at best, and God Mode only lasted roughly 15 seconds.

I don’t know if I’m missing something or if there are some shady things going on because the overall consensus is Very Positive at the time of writing this. I got this as a free key from some bundle website a while back and I almost regret having it in my library. It functions enough to be acceptable on a flash game website but I’ll be hiding it in my Steam library and never touching it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017330590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 558, 'last_played': 1421766842}

author: {'steamid': '76561198044116231', 'num_games_owned': 517, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1444761083}
review: I got this game for free some time ago, and I have to admit that it is some of the most fun I've had in quite some time. The game is farily straightforward... survive waves of zombies (mainly cows) and complete the game. While playing, you do get all sorts of abilities and upgrades that you can make use of. The only negative critic that I have towards this game is that it's incredibly easy and can be completed in under two hours. In that sense I don't think paying $12.99 is quite worth it, also since at this stage there are only five achievements who are also very easy to accomplish. Other than that, this game is really fun to play, and I would definitely recommend anyone giving it a shot, especially if you can get the game for free :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197984594035', 'num_games_owned': 541, 'num_reviews': 284, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1443648843}
review:
[h1]ОТЛИЧНО![/h1]

Идеальная залипака на пару часов, особенно если вы в дороге или на работе и у вас есть возможность (свободная минутка) поиграть. Ключик на игру предоставил один из моих подписчиков (спасибо ему большое), я совершенно не собирался долго в неё играть, садился на 10 минут посмотреть, что да как, в итоге смог оторваться только через два часа после полного прохождения и получения всех достижений! 

А на деле это юморной 2D тир, где мы в роли бравого дедушки фермера пытается выжить от нашествия зомби-коров. Конечно на нашем пути повстречаются и другие противники, например, заражённые бейсболисты, птицы убийцы и даже НЛО! Суть проста, мы отбиваем волну за волной уничтожая толпы заражённых врагов большинство из которых коровы. С каждым следующим этапом сложность и количество нападающих повышается, плюс, прибавляются новые: с повышенным здоровьем, более быстрые, взрывающиеся и так далее. Это практически tower defence, но с минимальной тактикой. У игры очень низкой порог вхождения, мы лишь двигаемся вверх-вниз и изредка влево-вправо и отстреливаем настырных супостатов, мешающих мирно жить. На выбор 4 типа патрон и несколько апгрейдов, вроде быстрой перезарядки и лазерного прицела. Концепция, как и геймплей очень просты, однако не думайте, что сама игра лёгкая, особенно на поздних этапах придётся попотеть. Весь сок кроется во внимательности и быстрой реакции. Причём конкретное сочетание апгрейдов и патрон проявляются в каждой миссии по-разному.  Где-то нужно уничтожить лишь одну волну, но усиленную, где-то наоборот отбиваться в течении пяти волн и нужна хорошая скорострельность. Периодически выпадают уровни с возможностью только стрелять, в такие моменты игра превращается в 100% тир, а количество врагов возрастает этак втрое. 

После прохождения каждого задания на душе приятное чувство, а главное, хочется ещё, т.к. это банально весело и местами очень хардкорно. Стоить упомянуть, что иногда нам дают использовать ловушки, и если на начальных этапах это всего лишь поджечь поле чтобы враги сами себя уничтожали, то в середине можно вызывать вертолёт с пулемётом на борту, а ближе к концу устраивать ядерные взрывы! В общем градус безумия отличный, авторы явно высмеивали свой продукт, зато в итоге получили превосходную стрелялку-залипалку. Ну а сражение с финальным боссом потребует от вас быть очень внимательным и дико быстро реагировать. 

И весь этот чёрный юмор приправлен очень милой и добротной рисовкой, да и пойдёт игра на любом компьютере даже десятилетней, а то и пятнадцатилетней давности! К тому же 80% ачивок (4 из 5) можно получить за 5 минут, а вот ради последней придётся пройти игру до конца! Лишь цена слегка высоковата, по умолчанию - 289р, идеальный ценник был бы 100 рублей, а уж в сезон скидок, думаю будет стоить ещё дешевле. Обязательно возьмите в коллекцию хорошего инди!

Оценка [b]9[/b]

+ Если вам понравился обзор, подписывайтесь на мою кураторскую страничку, где я постоянно пишу и рекомендую самые разные игры! Вступайте в группу Вконтакте, там публикую заметки об игровых новостях и кино. А также присоединяйтесь к каналу на YouTube, читайте, смотрите, комментируйте и зовите друзей!

author: {'steamid': '76561198159004501', 'num_games_owned': 730, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1443095931}
review:
[h1]Gutes Spiel mit viel Frustpotential[/h1]

Dieses Spiel ist ein 2D Arcade Shooter der sich ums Thema Zombies handelt. Man spielt einen Farmer der Horden von Zombies, sowie an einige Stellen auch Bossgegner, besiegen muss. Dabei setzt man seine Schrotflinte sowie auch Unterstützungen ein die einem das Level erleichtern können. Die Schrotflinte lässt sich Upgraden wodurch sich spezialmunition verwenden lässt, die Munikapazitäten größer werden, schnelleres Nachladen oder einfach schnelleres Schießen. Dabei muss man taktisch vorgehen denn die Waffe lässt sich nur in dem jeweiligen Level mit Geld upgraden was ziemlich wenig vorhanden ist. Das bringt den Spieler manchmal vor schwierige Entscheidungen und machen das Spiel dadurch lebendiger und schwieriger. Die Gegnertypen sind zahlreich und treten in Horden auf sodass einem nie die Gegner ausgehen werden. 
Wer das Spiel durchspielen will (alle Steam-Errungenschaften) sollte ohne Cheats seine Zeit brauchen (20+ Level bis Endboss) Mit Cheats geht es aber bedeutent einfacher sodass man 1-1,5h brauchen wird. Für die hohe Anzahl an Level ist der Preis von 11€ ok, dennoch empfehle ich, es sich während einer Rabattaktion zu holen. 

[b]Edit:[/b] während eines Levels ist es nicht möglich zu speichern sodass man beim mitunter letzten Gegner sterben kann und dann ganze Level wiederholen darf (als kleine Warnung ;) )

author: {'steamid': '76561197988819715', 'num_games_owned': 976, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1443094364}
review:
Игра в которой старый пердун выживает в зомби апокалипсисе перебегая от одного амбара к другому, защищаясь от толп наступающих коров зомби и прочих прелестей зомби апокалипсиса.
Не ожидал что скажу это, но игра сделана качественно) На фоне играет приятная рок музыка, а так же голос на фоне тоже сделан очень даже в тематику игры, анимация и рисовка так же не оставляет равнодушным, выполнено в деревенском стиле и тёмных тонах, на фоне то и дело летают НЛО или плавают мёртвые зомбари, утонувшие в болоте)
Динамики в игре хоть отбавляй, разнообразие в игре так же присутствует, почти каждый новый уровень вы будете встречать новые виды зомбей) Анимация так же выполнена очень качественно, если вдруг какая-то корова окажется слишком близко, то скорее всего она нас просто порвёт в клочья (У каждой коровы своя анимация убийства).
В общем 10 из 10))) Даже если вы просто захотите собрать карточки из игры, то советую всё-таки сыграть в неё)

author: {'steamid': '76561198061249750', 'num_games_owned': 1173, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1438458512}
review:
There is something infinitely rewarding about slaughtering so many zombie cows that you can't see the ground texture anymore. COTC is simple and harkens to the classic flash game setup, but one thing that most can't deny is that it's downright polished, and lovingly polished at that. 

You have a shotgun. God supports you with farming equiptment and artillery strikes. There is a nazi UFO flying around. There are cows. Zombie cows. There are also some normal zombies sometimes. No one cares about those. You shoot them til they're all dead, as of God's urging. 

This is all you need to know, and honestly, it's not for everyone. The insanely cheap pricetag demands some respect, and there is a surprising amount of content to be had, with a wide variety of levels and challenges, on top of some badge challenges that, while have no incentive, are a fun thing to try and aim for. There are multiple shell types, and each are fun to mess around with, but the buck shot is usually your best bet. You get the point.

The artstyle is absolutely lovely, and the voicework, while obnoxious after a point, is surprisingly competant and hammy.
There is an ending, and an overall plot, which has a kind of sweet if you can get past the final boss (it's a doozy, trust me), but for basic stupid arcade slaughter, you'll absolutely get your money's worth. 

Not for everyone, and arguably not worth the full price.

Definitely looking forward to whatever the developers do that isn't a bunch of jigsaw puzzles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053754931', 'num_games_owned': 2188, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1441937904}
review:
Debo decir que originalmente lo saque gratis de una promo y nomas por las cromos lo instale, pero lo estuve jugando y la verdad es un juego MUY COMPLETO.
A que me refiero ? 
1-Vamos desbloqueando nuestro camino por cada granero, pero podemos elegir graneros que defender dependiendo del camino que tomemos, esto hace que no sea tedioso cuando encontramos uno que no podemos pasar
2-EL sonido y música es muy competente, acompaña de forma perfecta al juego realmente haciendolo muy vistoso sumado a su graficas 2D de animación, puede verse como un Plants vs Zombies pero más frenetico por la musica y animación.
3- Variedad y esto lo aplaudo, hay graneros donde solo defendemos oleadas, otros donde tenemos algún Boss y otros donde tenemos que defender desde arriba del granero, esto le da mucha variedad y que no se sienta monotono el juego, un gran merito de los programadores.  Eso sin decir la gran cantidad de zombies diversos que hay. 

Realmente el juego es muy pero muy bueno, eso si algo corto, no vale la pena por 12 dolares, la verdad si lo agarras en descuento grande vale la pena, la verdad entretiene bastante y espero algún nuevo juego de la gente que hizo este, demostro mucha calidad para un juego del que nadie esperaba nada

author: {'steamid': '76561197977904226', 'num_games_owned': 1151, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1440711911}
review:
[i]Changed to recommended due to lowered retail price[/i]

I'll have to agree with the Steam community that this is some Flash-quality game with its defense-based gameplay concept, reminiscent of some other zombie survival games you could play on a browser. As much as that brief description gives away, it's a low standard game with a few redeeming qualities. However, the game mode variations like wave levels, rampage and onslaught don't do well enough to redeem the monotony of shooting down enemies coming from the right and I find myself yearning to get the game beat so I could move on. Its short length seems justified for its limited variety of content, though.

Speaking of contents, the gun upgrades and assists from "lord above" allowed me to have some fun nailing down hordes of zombies; which feature primarily cows (duh), hippies and, overweight goth girls. The gun upgrades can be bought with credits, where your wealth depends on the level's setting and dropped supplies you get. The variety isn't much but enough for trying out, which fits best for certain situations. The upgrades and assists can make you OP at most in regular levels with these features, along with badges to encourage you to take on more challenges.

The soundtrack is nicely varied, which during level playthrough is appropriately pumping for the mood of shooting battleground but none too intrusive nor repetitive enough to an annoyance. I can hear some elements of bluegrass, rock and electronics being mixed in. As for the sound effects, they are relatively lo-fi but mesh well with the cartoon environment. The one-line dialogues add up to the humor, setting a lighter mood on the zombie apocalypse environment, which I find welcome enough.

It's simplistic in gameplay and lacking in variation so, fun for some people, there is a bit of something to be found of value in this repetitive defense shooter.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969036258', 'num_games_owned': 562, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 256, 'last_played': 1440684591}
review: McDonald's uvadi farmare, ktery brani svoji stodolu pred zombie dobytkem a dalsima nakazenema mrtvolama. Jelikoz se jedna o byvaleho marinaka, ktery si zavola vrtulnik, bombarder a dokonce i atomovku na pomoc tak je o zabavu postarano. Prvnich nekolik kol da hraci zabrat vic nez dalsich z tezsi obtiznosti - vetsinou staci zavolat podporu a nemusite ani vystrelit patronu. Pokud si chcete odreagovat, nevadi vam trosku nasili a zbrane namirene proti dobytku urcite si to zkuste zahrat. 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198084674862', 'num_games_owned': 1182, 'num_reviews': 127, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1440608672}
review:
Wymagająca refleksu boczna strzelanka do szarżujących krów zombie. Kicz okrutny, ale już parę razy dostępna była do pobrania za darmo i jako taki groszowy tytuł należy ją traktować. Najważniejszym grzechem gry jest to, że można przeboleć brak regulacji poziomu trudności, ale gdzie jest regulacja klawiatury? Pomimo wprowadzania nowych typów przeciwników, formuła szybko zaczyna nużyć, gdy gra jest niewygodna. Plusem jest komiksowa grafika, bardzo pasująca do rozgrywki oraz wysoki poziom trudności, dla graczy szukających wyzwania. 
Jak będzie za grosze brać śmiało.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086773602', 'num_games_owned': 1140, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 285, 'last_played': 1440519872}
review:
Got the game for free
Sold the cards for $.17
???
Profit

I really did not like the game, its so basic and unpolished that I would not have been surprised to see it on newgrounds. I only played for maybe half an hour, after that I let it idle so that I could get the cards. Apart from my problems with the game itself, there are also:

NO rebindable controls
NO selectable resolution
NO use of the mouse in game; you could have allowed us to click on upgrades, instead of using the number keys.

This just screams "first time game-maker," and if that is the case, keep going buddy! Keep improving and eventually, if you put enough time and effort into it, you will have something that people will want to play and support! It aint this game, though.

The voice acting was surprisingly good, though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011929262', 'num_games_owned': 989, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1440347600}
review: Game has some quirky humor here and there to help rile things up a bit. I also like the overall art style and atmosphere. Neither of these help to save the gameplay though which I found very redundant and at times overly difficult. The main reason I wouldn't recommend this game though is simply because of the small and incosistent hit point of the shotgun. I often miss shots that I feel I should've gotten from this and this gives away the fact that this an indie game. I don't know if this was on purpose to make the game more difficult or this is something that resulted in amateur programming but for me this was a gamebreaker. It's a shame too as I felt the game would've been really fun if it wasn't for the shooting hit points.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032064992', 'num_games_owned': 1380, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1439808047}
review:
생존 및 총게임
Survival and the total game
生存および総ゲーム

플레이어는 할아버지가 되어 좀비를 사냥하고 좀비곰을 잡고 광우병 걸린 소를 사냥하는 클릭 및 키보드게임이다.
Player, it can be a grandfather defeat the zombie is a click or a keyboard game to hunt the cattle that took mad cow disease with a Zonbikuma.
プレイヤーは、祖父がされてゾンビを倒して、ゾンビクマを持って狂牛病かかった牛を狩りするクリックやキーボードのゲームである。

본인의 농장창고를 지키며 좀비로부터의 위협을 막기 위해 총을 쏴야한다.
To protect the identity of the farm warehouse, if you must shoot a gun in order to prevent the threat from the zombie.
本人の農場の倉庫を守り、ゾンビからの脅威を防ぐために銃を撃たなければなら。

총 5개의 도전과제를 가지고 있는 게임있어 빠른 도전과제를 깨고 싶다면 해당 게임을 하면 좋다.
Located game has a total of five issues, if you break the fast problems, it is preferable to the game.
合計5つの課題を持っているゲームあり、高速課題を破る場合は、そのゲームをするとよい。

+ 좀비를 잡고싶다.
+ 도전과제 깨고싶다.
+ I would like to have a zombie.
+ Challenge I want to break.
+ゾンビを持ってしたい。
+課題破りたい。

- 조금 복잡한 컨트롤이 필요하다.
- 시간이 좀 걸린다.
- There is a need for a little complicated control.
- Some of the time-consuming.
- 少し複雑な制御が必要である。
- いくつかの時間かかる。

종합 평점 : 4.0 (5점 만점)
(딱히 돈주고 사기에는 너무 비싼 12.99달러)
Overall rating: 4.0 (out of 5)
(Especially too expensive $ 12.99 To buy pay money)
総合評価：4.0（5点満点）
（特にお金を払って買うにはあまりにも高価12.99ドル）

author: {'steamid': '76561198095749971', 'num_games_owned': 3140, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1438530886}
review:
Описание:
Сегодня я расскажу Вам о такой игре, как The Culling Of The Cows. Игра из себя представляет, что-то вроде Tower Defense, но играете вы за безбашенного дедка Сэмми, который не жалея своей жизни борется с вирусом, который вдруг вспыхнул на близлежайших фермах. Вашей основной задачей является не пустить зомбированных коров и людей дальше амбара.
В игре существует 4 режима игры: "Волны", "Убить всех", "Натиск", "Битва с боссом". Также присутствует 4 различных апгрейда вашего оружия, а ещё более 10 призывов помощи от установки во входе амбара огромной пилы до скидывания тактической боеголовоки на Ваших врагов. Игра ещё порадует Вас обилием уровней (их около 40), а также 4 разлчиными видами патронов для Вашей винтовки.
Сюжета в игре особо нет, и по этому критерию я игру не оцениванию. Графика довольно просто сделана, но всё же красиво, как никак. Музыка в игре довольно неплохая, а звуки очень реалистично записаны, хотя можно было бы ещё чуть-чуть разнообразить их. Что же насчёт геймплея? Здесь он не очень сложный: бегай, стреляй, убивай, боеголовку вызывай, но большие претензии здесь были в плане разброса пуль и дистанции, с которой тебе корова могла распотрашить брюхо. Стоишь ты выше той линии, на которой мчится корова, но она, всё равно, тебя достаёт, так что здесь нужно ещё доработать. Ещё были проблемы в плане перезарядки оружия. Если начнёшь двигаться вовремя перезарядки, то она сбрасывается, то есть тупо стоять и перезаряжать оружие, пока на тебя бегут стадо обезумевших коров. Не, спасибо, я уже наподгорал с этим, и просто решил каждый раз покупать апгрейд, когда дед засовывал сразу 4 патрона в одну камеру. Это было, конечно, лол. Да, забыл упомянуть, что в прошлом обновлении были ещё добавлены ачивки на определённом уровне, типа "Не пропустить никого в амбар" или "Ни разу не промахнуться", но они не обязательны к выполнению, ибо за них просто дают дополнительные деньги, а у меня лично по игре проблемы с ними не было, хоть я и не пытался выполнить все "испытания" на уровне. Решил пожалеть свои нервы с нынешним геймплеем ;D В общем, оценки будут таковы: 
Геймплей: 8
Графика: 8
Музыка и звуки: 8
Сюжет: -
Общая оценка:8 
Я высказал лично своё мнение, если вы думате иначе, то можете откомментировать данный обзор :) 
Рекомендую тем, кто любит различные TF (TowerDefense) и у кого стальные нервы, ибо смотреть как тебя с полуметра разрывает корова, когда ты понимаешь, что у тебя закончились патроны, и ты не успеешь перезарядиться, то это слишком жёстко. Кстати, ни разу за игру не попробывал убивать врагов из-за спины (ПКМ). Да, да, дедок учился стрельбе у американских ковбоев, ибо стрелять из-за спины не каждый умеет х)
Цена:
Игра стоит 289 рублей, но я как обычно получил её на раздаче хD Пока что, игра, думаю, что не стоит своих денег, но, вроде как, к игре выходят обновления. Может, вскоре, она и окупится, но для убийства времени вполне неплоха.  
Ну, а на этом обзор подходит к концу. Всем спасибо, кто не поленился его прочитать, ибо я пытаюсь писать каждый раз граммотнее и понятнее для читателей ;D Так, что спасибо всем кто хотя бы прочитал, а большой поклон, кто ещё оценил его 8)

review: I got this title for free during a big giveaway. Still, I did not enjoy it. So, in a final veredict, I do not recommend this title, as this game should simply be free-to-play or cheaper than it is, because spending 11 euros on it is a waste of money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095917598', 'num_games_owned': 498, 'num_reviews': 1813, 'playtime_forever': 4335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1666598360}
review:
Excelente tower defense, um dos melhores que já joguei, logo após de Plants vs Zombies.O jogo é muito divertido e acaba se tornando viciante,uma mistura de apocalipse zombie com alieníginas, ambos querendo invadir a fazenda do Seu Zé que defende fortemente com sua espingarda e algumas armadilhas do celeiro.É um jogo indie que foi muito bem preparado, porém, aparentemente a overlay não funciona corretamente, embora você conseguia abrir o painel da Steam e conversar com seus amigos, a opção de captura e envio de tela não é habilitada, dessa forma se necessita o envio das prints,terá que fazer isso manualmente.Vale a pena conferir se você é fã do gênero.
The Culling Of The Cows é um game indie bem simples, basicamente você tem que impedir que as criaturas entrem no celeiro, você apenas se movimenta para os lados e atira. Apesar de simples ele tem uma temática até legal e uma trilha sonora que combina, o cenário varia conforme você avança e novos inimigos vão surgindo. O jogo só possui uma arma, uma espingarda que conta com diferentes tipos de munição e vários niveis de upgrade. Enfim, o jogo é legal, mas no meu ver, não compensa comprá-lo no preço que ele está, só tenho ele porque ganhei. 

Obs: Por ser um jogo indie não vou avaliá-lo com o mesmo critério que avalio os jogos de grandes empresas.

Minha nota: 7,9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198143175966', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1437336917}
review:
Dieses Spiel soll 10,99 € kosten! 

Damit habe ich einen der beiden Negativpunkte genannt. Die andere Schwäche ist, dass bei den meisten Tower Defence Spielen man sich schon im Vorfeld auf die kommenden Gegnerwellen strategisch und manchmal auch taktisch vorbereiten kann/muss. Hier wartet man ab, lädt seine Knarre und hofft nicht zu sehr in die Defensive gedrängt zu werden. Was natürlich bei Anfängern, wie mir prompt doch passiert und alles in Hektik ausartet.

Ansonsten unterscheidet sich dieses TD-Spiel von den anderen durch einen ausgesprochenen Mangel an eigener Originalität.  Da hilft das göttliche Eingreifen auch nicht mehr (Monty Python lässt grüßen). Denn alles ist wie gehabt: Brutalität präsentiert mit schwarzem Humor (verrückter, alter, schießwütiger Redneck - fast schon ein Klassiker. Neu ist etwas anderes), stärker werdende Gegner und Waffenupgrades usw, aber nichts dabei, was diesen Preis gerechtfertigt. Ich habe es kostenlos bekommen, gekauft hätte ich es nicht.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996919908', 'num_games_owned': 1532, 'num_reviews': 875, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1436665896}
review:
[h1]Der Schlächter aller Rinder[/h1]

Also, bei Culling of the Cows fällt einem auf, dass Massentierhaltung vielleicht nicht die beste Möglichkeit ist. Insbesondere wenn wir es mit vergifteten,untoten und wütenden Mutantenkühen zu tun haben.

Das [b]Gameplay[/b] ist relativ Simpel: In 2D müssen wir eine Scheune gegen Horden von Kühen und viel schlimmer, Hippies, verteidigen. Dabei spielen wir einen alten Mann, der scheinbar seine Frau retten muss(was ich übrigens erst in der letzten Schlacht kapiert habe) und metzeln wie wahnsinnig mit einer doppeläufigen Schrotflinte alles weg, was nur irgendwie geht. Dabei upgraded man seine Waffe und setzt auch krasse Dinge wie ne Flammenwand, eine sentry gun oder nen göttlichen Meteorschauer(!) ein. Gelegentlich spielen wir dann auch noch einfach nur mit der Maus und müssen mit nem Sturmgewehr oder anderen Spielzeugen die Scheune verteidigen.
Der Anfang ist etwas schwierig, bis man den Dreh raushat und später bekommt man dann auch mehr Assistances zur Unterstützung. Der Trick ist es, bei wenig Assistance, diese dann einzusetzen, wenn man nachladen muss, was recht lange ohne das zuständige Upgrade dauert. Später reicht es dann fast aus, nur die Assistance nacheinander zu spammen.

[b]Fazit: [/b]

The Culling of the Cows ist ein recht kurzes Spiel (etwa 4-5 Stunden für alle Level) und man fragt sich ein wenig, was für Drogen die Entwickler genommen haben. Ich persönlich hatte ein paar "WTF" und "Oh yeah, lets **** them to death" Momente, die dann ordentlich Laune gemacht haben. Jedoch nervt es manchmal, dass man die Gegner nicht erwischt, obwohl man eigentlich denkt, man wäre auf der selben Höhe wie sie.
Aber unterm Strich kann ich das Spiel nur empfehlen, allerdings würde ich auf einen Sale warten, da das Spiel meiner Meinung nicht mehr als 5 € wert ist. 


Hat dir das Review weitergeholfen? Dann folge mir doch in [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Drakeschool] meiner Steamgruppe[/url], wo ich meine Reviews als Kurator verfasse.

its a tower defense game where you move and shoot cows
thats it
cow hits you? insta kill

its random
you get eiter money or a power up
you dont get money from killing enemies in the first place

if i am honest
good concept
made worse with shitty Rng

i wouldn´t actually pay for this
unless its really cheap on sale
i would love to see a sequel witht the concept actually working
did i mention how horrible the voice acting is?

author: {'steamid': '76561198061291431', 'num_games_owned': 555, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1436120373}
review:
Что за упоротая стрельба по линии, когда мы можем не попасть по корове бегущей на нас, но она нас убивает ... когда мы не можем попасть по корове почти подошедшей к нам в упор... когда мы не можем попасть в корову потому, что пуля какого то *** попадает в труп впереди лежащей.

 По началу игра может показать упорото суровой, но потом имея деньги на апы и кучу ассистов уровни кажутся ватными ... Хотя на некоторых уровнях можно привстать со стула.

 Ещё меня смутила нацисткая тарелка спамящая медведей, это надеюсь не очередной намёк.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021806954', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1435884847}
review:
Вкратце так: Ты старый дед с дробашом встречаешь свою старость одновременно с зомби апокалипсисом на своей любимой ферме. Задача не пропустить зомби (преимущественно коров) в дом. Для этого можно покупать 4 вида апгрейдов для своего дробаша, а так же вызывать помощь с воздуха в виде вертолёта, самолёта и даже атомной бомбы!!! В общем игра проходится на одном дыхании, хотя трудно не отметить небольшую сложность в некоторых этапах.

10 из 10, хотя дороже 100 р она не стоит (играл всего 2 часа и 2 часа просто выбивал карточки).

author: {'steamid': '76561198138535845', 'num_games_owned': 2256, 'num_reviews': 389, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1441899576}
review: Отвратительная игра, ну серьезно. Несмотря на легкие ачивки и на то что игра проходится часа за 2, ну не стоит она такого. Уровни однообразные и крайне идиотские, не получаешь никакого удовольствия от игрового процесса, хочется чтобы все это быстрее закончилось. Дело не в графике и даже не в отвратных звуках, просто сам по себе гемплей ужасен, это понимаешь сразу же, как только начинаешь играть.  Я не помню, откуда у меня эта игра, но сейчас она стоит 300р, кошмар, купите лучше что нибудь другое)

author: {'steamid': '76561198010497284', 'num_games_owned': 13314, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 574, 'last_played': 1561735853}
review:
非常不错的小游戏，有一定难度，又不失趣味性，打折的时候值得购买。
如果想要挑战难度的话，通关时间不止10个小时，心得就是所有的弹药里面散弹最重要，所有升级里面装填最重要
有兴趣的人可以尝试

author: {'steamid': '76561198118392184', 'num_games_owned': 3472, 'num_reviews': 355, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1536270044}
review:
Les + :

- Assez fun
- La bande son colle bien avec le jeu
- Bien degueu

Les - :

- Répétitif..
- La bande son tape sur les nerfs à la fin... Sérieusement.
- Même si ce jeu ne se prends pas au sérieux, ils auraient quand même pû pousser un peu plus loin dans le gamplay

Conclusion :
Je ne le recommande pas, ou alors à très bas prix.
Bref, je trouve que pour un jeu à ce prix (10 €), c'est excessivement cher quand on voit le contenu : Des vaches et un fusil à pompe.
Bref, passez votre chemin, même si vous avez de l'argent et du temps à perdre.

7/20

review:
Atirar em vacas zumbis e proteger sua fazenda. O objetivo não poderia ser mais simples.
Mas a maneira de se fazer isso dependerá da sua habilidade como atirador.
Você pode colocar upgrades nas armas e obter suporte para aniquilar todos inimigos. O jogo conta com uma trilha sonora bem interessante e é repleto de piadinhas, que se você entender inglês, vai rachar de rir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047985027', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 767, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1446761278}
review:
Ich habe mir von dem Spiel eine lustige Beschäftigung für zwischendurch erhofft. Ich kann mich nicht an so eine große Enttäuschung erinnern.
Das Spiel hat einen sehr eigenen Humor, nicht unbedingt meiner, aber wem es gefält ╮(─▽─)╭  Dazu gehört einen Teil der Spielerschaft zu beleidigen. Als ich in den optionen auf controller umschalten wollte (ja, das muss man noch manuell machen) hat sich das spiel doch tatsächlich getraut mir eine Beleidung an den Kopf zu werfen. Wie gesagt: SEHR eigener Humor.
Das Spiel ist ein sehr simpler Tower Defense, der an primitivität kaum zu übertreffen ist: Die Mutierten Kühe rennen von rechts nach links und der Spieler schießt die Kühe von der linken Seite aus ab. Lässt er zu viele durch oder wird er überrannt ist die Runde verloren und beginnt erneut. Das ist aber nicht weiter schlimm, würde sich das Spiel nicht so anfühlen, wie eins der kostenlosen Flashgames und nicht Eins von der guten Sorte. Zum vergleich: hier bezahlt man 10,99€ mehr.
Wer wirklich nur ein Spiel für zwischendurch sucht, sollte sich lieber woanders umsehen. Ich kann das Siel leider nur empfehlen, wenn ihr den Humor mögt oder alle Spiele auf Steam besitzen wollt. In dem Fall: Greift zu!

review:
[h1]Definitely not animal activist friendly :p[/h1]

So it's essentially a tower defense game.

Protect your base from an onslaught of enemies. In this case, crazy cows.
You also get to upgrade your weapon and addons as well.

It's cheesy silly and rather satisfying.

Only gripe is that you can't always tell where your shotgun will point at so targeting can be hit and miss (Ha!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198181892639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1451867670}
review:
[h1] The Culling of the Cows Review[/h1]
So one day, I visited a site that I love to go on for game info, RPS. I saw an advert for a free copy of "Culling of the Cows," so I figured I would give it a try. And I am [b]very[/b] glad that I did.

[h1] Part 1:  Storyline and Gameplay [/h1]
In COTC, you are a farmer who encounters everything from zombie cows to Nazi UFOs on his farm. It is your job to shoot the oncoming cattle and other enemies before they can enter your barn. There is a plethora of upgrades for your weapons, barn, and even "God Abilities." It could be considered a sidescroller (but with no scrolling), but this game will appeal to both arcade gamers and retro shoot-em-up gamers alike.

As for the length of the game, COTC has an adequate number of "missions" which provide for plenty of hours of fun gameplay. And if you ever, for some odd reason, get bored of destroying zombie cows with a barn-mounted machine gun, there are cheat codes to get you to the final mission and other such objectives.

[h1] Part 2: Graphics?  [/h1]
There isn't too much to say about the graphics here. The game could have done well as a pixel graphic game, but I believe that the developers made the right decision sticking with non-pixelated cows. You get an arcade feel from the graphics while still being able to make out sharp lines and appropriate detail.

[h1] Part 3: Is it fun?  [/h1]
Of course it's fun! This game is unlike any other arcade-zombie-tower defense game you've played before! Imagine Farming Simulator, but instead of growing crops, you shoot cows, and instead of upgrading your equipment, you upgrade your explosive-bullet extended mag infinite ammo no reload shotgun! This is a game that you can definitely lose track of time while playing and get caught up in the hilarity and epicness of the goals.

[h1] Value [/h1]
As I said before, I got this game as part of a special promotion, however, I would gladly have bought this game. It's well worth the money (At time of writing: $1.94, 85% off)! Let's put it this way - you can get a pack of gum or two which might last just a few days, or you can get COTC and have dozens of fun hours of gameplay! The only thing is that I feel like $12.99 is a little bit much to ask for regular price, I would wait for it to go on sale. Definitely a game that you can casually pick up right where you left off, even if it's been a week or two. Would recommend.

[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Aspect[/th]
        [th]Rating[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Gameplay[/td]
        [td]9[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Graphics[/td]
        [td]8[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Enjoyability[/td]
        [td]10[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Value[/td]
        [td]7[/td]
    [/tr]

[/table]

[h1] Final Points on the Game [/h1]
This game is a definite buy, whether it's 2 bucks or 10. You'll have a great time playing it, and best of all, it has zombies with [b] no early access [/b]! What's not to love about that!

Be sure to check out any of my other reviews on my profile, and please upvote if this helped you, I hope it did! Thanks for reading!

author: {'steamid': '76561198014417122', 'num_games_owned': 832, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 696, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1452430850}
review:
Old arcade type game, overall is a fun game to play while passing some time around. But after awhile it gets a bit repetitive.
The gameplay is pretty straightforward... shoot, shoot and shoot. You have some options for the weapons and skills that you must choose from to help defending your farm, but it's pretty much shooting all way around.
As for the price, not really worth it. There are free flash games that can equal, if not overpass, this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124770841', 'num_games_owned': 2744, 'num_reviews': 555, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1434603666}
review:
激爽射击！狠好玩儿！
画面上我是很讨厌这种色调的游戏，很暗很不饱和的样子，感觉很乱而且很恶心。
成就太少，而且通关应该就能拿全。如果多加点成就，就会增加部分玩家的游戏市场吧，比如好像每关有三星统计，但是没有对应的成就。
最后一关，ufo，一开始可能会觉得很难，之后发现有bug点，前两波尸潮根本不用打，至最后一波小心点就行。还有，最后boss被上帝之手弄死时，好像不要离ufo太近了，反正我第一次是蹭的人被炸飞然后游戏卡住了。。。然后重打了。可能，我电脑太渣带不动吧。。。
“I`m coming ,Maria!”隔壁老王历尽千幸万苦，冒着生命危险终于来到了玛利亚的湖景房，你难道还不能相信爱情吗？

author: {'steamid': '76561198095838902', 'num_games_owned': 708, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1448414644}
review:
缺点和优点都挺明显，就原价来说可能需要斟酌，85off的时候是可以考虑的。
另外这游戏也进过包和免费送过。

+操作看起来按键很多却并不繁琐。游戏模式简单粗暴，横向射击守护谷仓。
+过关并不困难，但全勋章对我这种手残党来说算是蛮有难度的。
+音乐简单而爽快
-中弹判定略奇特
-模式较单一
-满地的牛尸体简直精神污染——当然可能有人正喜欢这样子？

总体来讲似乎有一玩的价值。刚玩了数关，等待进一步挖掘中。

author: {'steamid': '76561198047625879', 'num_games_owned': 366, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1434410379}
review:
Culling of the Cows is a classic base defense shooter upgrade game. However, it really falls short of what one would expect of this type of game. 

-The game has an alright theme which gets a little cliche with the Nazi part and the hands of God.

-The music has little variety in music which gets old quickly.

- The game is far too easy. The enemies don't vary too much and some of the enemies seem pointless or almost to help the player. There is not too much balance and one ammo type is incredibly OP compared to other ones and some of the upgrades are really almost useless. The actives are very very overpowered with a short cooldown. 

-There are three level types aside from the two boss fights and some seem to just drag on.

-There are three medals to each of the levels, but as there are no achievements or rewards that help your gameplay outside of these there's little to no incentive to getting these.

TL:DR - This game is a poor base defense shooter with little variety. There are many of these flash online that are much better. With the exception of maybe the steam cards and an easy perfect game (With a bit of time dragging through it) I would not reccomend paying a cent on this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064592385', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1434312958}
review:
Homemade spghetti sauce
Serves: 8-10
Prep time:  15 mins Cook time:  3 hours Total time:  3 hours 15 mins
Ingredients:
3-4 cans of Crushed Tomatoes (either regular or with basil, oregano and garlic) 28 oz. sized cans OR 12-15 fresh tomatoes (peeled, chopped and blended in a food processor)
4 cloves of garlic
A bunch of dried basil (probably 3-5 Tbsp)
A bunch of black pepper ( probably 1 - 2 tsp)
1 TBSP of Sugar (optional)
2 TSBP olive oil
⅓ cup of grated Parmesan or Romano Cheese
Minced Green Peppers (optional)
Instrucktions:
1.Heat the olive oil in a 5+ qt. pot over medium heat, and add the chopped or pressed garlic.
Heat for one to two minutes, making sure not to burn the garlic, then add all the tomatoes, black pepper, basil and sugar. Stirring often, bring to a low boil.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 2-3 hours stirring often.
For the first half of the simmer time, do so with the pot uncovered, then cover.
Add the cheese, stir in and simmer for an additional 5 minutes or so.
This will make the equivalent to 4-5 jars of sauce, and the cost is probably about half (and it tastes way better).
- See more at: http://www.iamthatlady.com/frugal-pasta-sauce-recipe-using-hunts-crushed-tomatoes/#sthash.GRoGbHuL.dpuf

author: {'steamid': '76561198013287771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1434282861}
review:
Concept is nice, but it's just unplayable.

CONS : Controls are the worst ever, even controller controls suck monkey balls.
If you get hit once, you are dead. You got to restart at the beginning of the level, not even at the start of your wave.
The whole game is based on shooting cows in different lanes, but the 3D is so bad you often don't even see in what lane the cow is. 
And the cows at the bottom run up a little, even more confusing.

PRO'S: Concept is fun, but yeah...

2/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198065367291', 'num_games_owned': 540, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1434242083}
review:
Grafikler: Bazına göre berbat denebilecek grafikler, rahatsız edici dokular fakat bana kalırsa oyunun atmosferi için gayet uygun, çünkü oyun insanı rahatsız etmek için yapılmış. Animasyonlara gelecek olursak 2005 flash oyunlarından daha kötü animasyonlar var 5/10

Sesler: Aşırı Amatörce, mizahi bir oyun olduğunu düşünürsek o kadar rahatsız etmiyor, Müziklere gelecek olursak güzel yapılmış fakat çeşitlilik nerdeyse yok 5/10

Oynanış: Klasik Tower Defence oyunlarına benziyor fakat kendi elementleride var çoğu yenilikçi fakat uygulamaya berbat geçirilmiş.Az ilerledikten sonra oyun tıkanıyor çünkü geliştirmeler çok az ve zor alınıyor hem de düşmanlar aşırı zorlaşıyor. 6/10

Tema: Tema hoşuma gitti ama bir noktaya kadar. Bir dede çiftliğini zombileşmiş ineklerden korumaya çalışıyor, fakat işleniş biraz alaycı fakat ne o komediyi iyi vermişler ne de karanlık atmosferi çok arada kalmış. 6/10

4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198122858094', 'num_games_owned': 1427, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1446185183}
review:
[h1]Nasıl Bir Oyun ?[/h1]
İki boyutlu, maryo tarzı yandan bakış açısına sahibiz. Farklı türde belirli sayıda ardı ardına deli danalar geliyor ve biz hepsini öldürmeye çalışıyoruz. İlk başlarda basit gelsede ilerledikçe zorlaşıyor. Oyun başlar başlamaz bize belirli bir para veriyor, onunla silahlarınızı güçlendirebiliyorsunuz. 5 Adet başarımı mevcut, ilk 4 başarım basit kazanılsada Nazi ufolarını düşürmeyle ilgili son başarımı oyun sonu canavarı galiba bu yüzden o başarımı oyunu bitirince alacağız gibi duruyor. Eğer 5 başarımı da almaya niyetlenirseniz, sizi baya zorlayacaktır. Deli dana çeşitliliğine sahip ve başarımları toplama inadındaysanız sizi uzun süre oyalayacak bir oyun. 2-3 bölüm geçtikten sonra sıkan ama boş zamanlarında da mutlaka tekrar kendini oynatan bir oyun. Kısaca Evlenilecek değil, eğlenilecek oyunlardan :)

[h1]Görselleri:[/h1]
İki boyutlu bir oyun için görsellik pek bir şey ifade etmez. Çizimleri tarayıcı tabanlı oyun gibi dursada oynanışı keyifli.

[h1]Ses:[/h1]
Vuruş sesleri güzel, müziklerde ortalama diyebiliriz.

[h1]Bu oyunu Türk Oyuncuların Satın Almasını Tavsiye edermisin ?[/h1]
Özellikle küçük yaştaki Türk oyuncular bu oyunu sevecektir. Bu yüzden Türklerin özellikle indirimli halde (5TL veya daha düşüğü fiyatlara) almasını tavsiye ederim. Çünkü bu oyuna 21 TL vermeye değmez. Para kolay kazanılmıyor sonuçta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182128331', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1433853749}
review:
The Culling of the Cows is an absurdist gag game that, while it may provide you with all the rampant bovine slaughter you could ever dream of, is as of now not at all worth the price paid for it.

As a lone farmer stranded in rural 'Murica, you must overcome the armies of mutant cows, deranged hippies and obese gothic women that a Nazi UFO sends your way. By reading the previous sentence, it should be quite clear that this game is not taking itself too seriously. However, there is a clear difference between random humor with a purpose and random just for random's sake; this game strictly falls into the latter. Culling is basing its appeal entirely on the fact that the player gets to shoot cows...a lot. All of the other plot points mentioned in the beginning of this paragraph receive no explanation besides a single introduction screen per plot point, and are otherwise meant to serve as comedic masks for generic enemy types.

The game's fundamentals are disappointingly lacking. Gameplay is divided into levels that contain encounters in either standard "Waves" format, a variation of Waves that is only one large wave, or a last-stand turret mode called "Onslaught". The majority of the game's levels occur in the Waves format, with varying numbers and types of enemies and waves for each level. This variety does little to put off the repetition that sets in after a few rounds of slaughtering the same few animals and zombies over and over. The Waves format does allow for some character customization in weapon upgrades, but after a certain amount of experimentation I discovered an order of upgrades that, with moderate skill, could win all the levels. Some incentive in the level design to switch up gameplay styles would have gone a long way. The other gameplay mode, Onslaught, produces some of the most frustrating levels in the game due to sketchy hit detection, though it often provides a refreshing and enjoyable break from the Waves levels as well.

Various other parts of the game fail to stand out. The soundtrack isn't memorable and the art style has this feel to it that so many indie games seem to have, which at worst could be descibed as "one step above MS Paint". Largely, the game isn't bad-looking; it just has a habit of piling hundreds of multicolored cow corpses on the screen at once, which grates on the senses and leaves a lasting impact after seeing it over and over. Some parts of the game seem to be implemented strangely: controller support, despite being labelled as both "partial" and "full", relegates movement solely to the D-Pad, which is an odd choice. Culling's achievements are also strange: there are only five, four can be attained by the third level (two are bugged to only work with the keyboard) and the fifth is for beating the game. More achievements could help boost replayability, a facet which is important in this game considering it can be finished in just over three hours. Though most levels contain medals to earn for winning under certain conditions, the game doesn't offer rewards for earning the medals, which makes them largely meaningless. Perhaps tying some customization unlocks to medals would solve this issue?

Though this game faces significant issues, I must give praise to the spirit of the developers. They've implemented some features like an internal cheat console, the achievements and trading cards by popular demand. Additionally, their desire to not make this game be simply a joke shows throughout the game. The farmer's voiceover has some genuinely unique and funny lines interspersed throughout the game, which work because the lines are not beaten to death in every level. As long as the developers stand by the good-hearted cow hate that is the root of this game, there's hope that this could turn into an indie cult classic in the future.

This game has set off on a mission: to spread the need to shoot cows whenever, wherever. It tries to achieve its goals through a game that has significant flaws. Should the developers focus on the problems that plague the core elements of the game, then this title will definitely deserve a second look. As of now, however, there is no way anyone would feel satisfied paying full price for this game. Save up for a sale, perhaps gift this to a friend in jest. Just...beware the cows. The Culling of the Cows gets a D.

author: {'steamid': '76561198204973504', 'num_games_owned': 1008, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1433852250}
review:
Если вы любите кинотрэш типа Планеты страха, Мачете, Смертельной гонки и небольшие игры эпохи расцвета флэш, то это именно то что вам нужно.
Рэднек защищающий свой амбар от зомби коров, [spoiler]высаживаемых с нацистской летающей тарелки[/spoiler] это прекрасно...
Отлично скрасит вечерок-другой, но как и подавляюще большая часть подобных, развлечение одноразовое - второй раз вы вряд ли к ней вернётесь.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090293241', 'num_games_owned': 955, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1450962349}
review:
Необычная казуальная игрушка, повествующая нам о противостоянии фермера с коровами превратившимися в зомби. Игра проходится на одном дыхании и довольно сильно затягивает.

Плюсы:
1. Большое количество уровней.
2. Удобное управление.
3. Наличие достижений и карточек.
4. Разнообразные виды врагов.
5. Различные модернизации оружия.
6. Виды уровней (одна ошибка* и большая волна, бесконечный пулемёт и много коров, много ошибок* и много волн, битва с босом).
* Ошибка (здесь) - количество упущенных коров.

Минусы:
1. Цена (лучше покупать со скидкой).
2. Отсутствие русского языка.
3. Музыкальное оформление оставляет желать лучшего.

Недостатки:
Отсутствие сюжета (в таких играх он особо и не нужен).

7 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057352929', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1433539171}
review:
KOM OG SKYD EN ZOMBIE-KO!

Du skal ikke tænke det store - bare rende rundt med din shotgun og skyde zombie-køer.
Det er sært vanedannende.
Du kan opgradere din shotgun forskelligt fra level til level, og du får også diverse hjælpemidler gratis. Her kan nævnes maskingevær, atom bombe, flammespor, bombefly mm.
Det ser voldsomt ud med 100 zombie-kohoveder spredt ud over det hele.

10 euro er en latterlig høj pris for dette spil!
Jeg gav 1 euro på tilbud, derfor thumbs up - KUN DERFOR!
Spillet blev gennemført på 4 timer!

Godnat :)
(Læs mine andre anmeldelser på dansk på min profil!

review:

Got it free, it's worth playing to get cards. :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198139920987', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1433144110}
review:
If you're vegan or vegetarian, I do not recommend this game for you. If you're an animal rights activist and are against harming cows, do not play this. If you are any of the above and you decide to play it, don't have a cow about it in the reviews section.

Okay for real though...

I found this game rather amusing. I haven't played much of it but I did get a few little laughs out of it. It's not much of a challenging game but it is a game that let's you kill small amounts of time (and savage cows).

I see that it is currently on sale for $1.29 USD - I think that's a fair price. The asking price of $12.99 is a bit far for a game as simple as this one. I got this in a deal so I was pretty lucky. 

There simply can be no discussion about how 'good' the greaphics are etc, As this just feels like a mobile game. It's been done before (not sure with savage cows...) so it lacks a little creativity but I do like the farmer v cows aspect.

I can see this being a great game for the younger audience though, and that is why I am recommending it. 

It's fairly easy to grasp and it can entertain for a little bit. I assume kids will love it and play it for hours on end. 

Kudos to the developer, I appreciate your hard work. Hope you had fun making it :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197989905894', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 381, 'last_played': 1442629656}
review:
[b]The Culling Of The Cows[/b] is a 2D Shooter.

“Hilarious in its purest essence” 
NerdMaldito 

Yes, it's hilarious. You start the game as an old farmer trying to protect your barn with a shotgun. Then you fight some waves of cows.. [b]Zombie Cows![/b] They will try to pass through you and you must shot them down so they can't enter the barn. In each level, the difficulty increases until the very end when the [b]Nazi UFO[/b] comes to beat you.

[b]Pros:[/b]
- Funny game 
- Easy to understand 
- Challenging (to get all the achievements)

[b]Cons:[/b]
- The price makes no sense
- The game is short
- A co-op would be fun


[b]MY RATING:[/b] 5/10



[i]If you liked this review please consider giving it a thumbs up and if you disliked post in the comments on what you disliked about the review.[/i]
