author: {'steamid': '76561198062813911', 'num_games_owned': 1958, 'num_reviews': 2050, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1433423725}
review:
[h1] DISCLAIMER: This is a full review, and NOT a first impressions review like all my other reviews, if you want a better full review, then please read better reviews then mine [/h1]

[quote] PLEASE NOTE: I recommended this game with some exceptions, overall if the game did not live up to just a tiny expectation, I would not have recommended it at all, so please read the review carefully if you are thinking of buying/playing this game [/quote]

Imagine the famous and disgusting Mad Cow's disease placed together with the cruelty of the videos by PETA and you've got the bloodbath which is The Culling Of The Cows

The game is alright, nor is it horrible, nor is it unplayable. The game follows a farmer who tries to protect his barn/farm from the diseased alien cows and human zombies. The game is like a tower defense game, where you play the farmer shooting your way through hordes of cows, with a little variety here and there. The concept is okay but can get a little repetitious at certain parts.

Although its a fun little game to play, there are a few problems. Firstly, the reloading of the gun. Although I understand that the developers wanted you to take care of not only shooting the enemies right in front of you but also taking care of your gun, however, this can get annoying and when you are in desperate need for ammo, you have to reload, and the reload speed is so slow, you might as well either let the cow into the barn or get yourself ripped apart by the cows themselves.

Another thing which really bugged me was that there was no checkpoint system whatsoever, this can get really frustrating as you immediately die, and if, let's say you were in Wave 7, you would have to begin all the way back to Wave 1! Very annoying!!

Another thing is the farmer himself, he walks too slow and his reload speed is slow too. I can understand they made him the stereotypical old hillbilly farmer, but whenever you are in a tight situation, your kinda stuck.

For the level of difficulty, its not as bad a RADical ROACH Deluxe Edition (which is made by the same people who made this!), however, without the checkpoint system and the slow walk and reload speed, you may need to repeat a stage more than 3 times! A thing which I learnt and really gets you fast running through the wave is to use the powers given to you (ex: A turret, or a meteor shower) wait until its done then shoot until it reloads, simplest way... and it worked for me!

The music can get a bit repetitious and annoying and the sound quality varies from time to time. Reminds me of the sound quality from One Finger Death Punch where the mentor would speak into the microphone that's recording his voice so close.

The story... I have no idea what the story is all about. The game literally throws you into the game without even telling you why the cows are mad as they are and why you are trying to protect your house and barn, [spoiler] SPOILER ALERT! - or why there is a huge Nazi UFO attacking your house! [/spoiler] The game literally does not tell you what's going on, to get a glimpse about the story, I had to go and watch the trailer on their store page!

Now to the recommendation, I have to say that the game was fun to play, however, for the price its asking for... no way would I recommend it, I got this game for free from a giveaway by the way. Its not worth the amount the game company is asking for! For its full price, I would not recommend it, BUT if it is either in a sale, price drop, giveaway, gift or even given to you as a free game like I got it then I would recommend it.

[h1] RECOMMENDED :) [/h1]
[i] Provided it is in a sale, price drop, giveaway, gift or even given to you as a free game, otherwise... [/i]

[h1] NOT RECOMMENDED :( [/h1]
[i] For its full price [/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198027008659', 'num_games_owned': 910, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1436125319}
review:
The Bad
To starts out about 60% of the time this game starts with a white screen forcing me to restart the game
$12.99 is way to much for this game. 
There is a lack of explanation on what upgrades do or how to get them. 
Can become repetitious very fast.

The Good 
It can be fun, there is something about killing zombie cows because God told you to.
The levels are short and in wave format so easy it is to play for 10 minutes and then put it down.

Honestly this game feels like it would be at home on Newgrounds. 
As I type this Culling of the Cows is $1.29 USD which is about the right price to pick it up at as the normal price of 12.99 is way to much for what you get. If you must pick it up do it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074130808', 'num_games_owned': 1067, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1434837993}
review:
You are a redneck farmer and you have got a small problems. Thousands of cows from the vicinity have not gone just mad, they have became zombies. You have to defend your barn with your good ol' rifle and hope zombie hippies and MLB stars won't prove to be too much for you. 

+ Humorous 
+ Nice graphics
+ No problems with controls
+ Has cards & achievements (the devs said they are working on more of them - for now you get 4 of them almost immediately and the last one when you finish the game - easy for now, good for achievement hunters)

- The game tells you can upgrade ammo, weapon and use some assists but does not really explain the types it offers. You have to either try them out yourself or google it.
- You can upgrade stuff but the side-objectives typically suggest you use neither. Come on.... at least leave the player with one of them
- Price (I have got the game for free but I cannot see paying for this 11€... Now it is on sale for about 1€, that is the maximum its worth I would say).
- I played a mission or two and closed the game to play later again. Did this several times and I always had to go to audio settings to lower it (its too damn loud). Always.
- Not really much replayability. 

5/10 do not buy unless heavily discounted

author: {'steamid': '76561198042225625', 'num_games_owned': 6556, 'num_reviews': 448, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1487856090}
review:
I swear the sweet Mother of God's ass, its like 'Postal 1' brutally f*cked 'Plants vs Zombies' and the bastard is this very action-packed blockbuster. Yet I must make a warning: If you are on medications this could seriously compromize all the positive effects!

Клянусь блаженной жёпой Матери твоего Бога, это как если "Почтовый 1" выимел в грубой форме "Растений против мертвецов", и ублюдок вырос в "Отбраковку скота". Короче, если вы когда-то принимали Циклодол(ТМ), и у вас в библиотеке нет этого, значит недостаточно принимали.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079480232', 'num_games_owned': 750, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1433190633}
review: Definitely not worth the original price, or even on sale. I got it for free and it's potential is wasted by bad hitboxes (you sometimes miss a cow and don't understand how), a flawed money/upgrade system and very scripted boss fights. I have played flash games that are of better quality than this. Gets boring extremely quickly, but you can finish the achievements around the same time you get all the card drops, this is one of the only positive sides of this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038233200', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1433166934}
review: Интересная игрушка. Вам надо защищать свой сарай от зомби. Вы играете за фермера дедка по имени Сэмми, который один противостоит зомби, цель деда ни в коем случае не дать захватить свой сарай зомби. В игре около 40 уровней, эти уровни заставят вас напрячь свои пальцы и по потеть как следует, интересная музыка под это всё и дикий хардкор, который сопровождает вас на каждом уровне. Игра интересная, хоть и напряжённая.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098229578', 'num_games_owned': 1849, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1433026583}
review:
Moo!?!?

Not a bad little game to play for a bit, but is repetitive and gets pretty tired pretty quick, so best to play in short bursts. There's a cheat which unlocks all levels and doesn't effect the achievements, so it's possible to get 100% on this game VERY easily... if you don't mind a little cheating that is. 

If you would like some 2D zombie bovine action then I would recommend that you wait until this title is on offer (no matter how specifically this game meets your needs), as £8.99 is a bit steep for what you get. 

5.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197973550056', 'num_games_owned': 948, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1653963750}
review: Can't say enough good things about Culling of the Cows really. A modern side scroller with all the makings of a classic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198149511370', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1433040511}
review: The Culling Of The Cows es muy entretenido, El juego es algo corto, pero muy divertido, si te gustan los juegos de defensa, este sera de tu gusto entonces, Los graficos no estan mal, La musica es buena, Aliens + Zombies + Vacas + Toros ¿Que mas se puede pedir?, Ademas cuentas con diferentes tipos de municion para tu escopeta "Normal, Expanciva, Penetracion y Explosivo", y tambien cuentas con lanza granadas y una Ametralladora... La historia es aceptable y sin embargo puedo decir que este juego vale la pena jugarlo alguna vez, para terminar yo le doy un 8/10 :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198023114147', 'num_games_owned': 1508, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1432974670}
review:
This was a pleasant surprise as I'd gotten it via a giveaway. 

The art is rather good and seeing the bodies of cows you've decimated is rather satisfying to say the least. The levels are well designed with a few that may make things difficult for you; especially the last level. 

Overall, it's a very good game and I really enjoyed completing it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014926595', 'num_games_owned': 775, 'num_reviews': 967, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1569049703}
review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=96ogo6N3stQ

(In case the video gets taken down:  Old people are the GREATEST!  They're full of wisdom and experience!)

Also, old people are filled with Christianity, schizophrenia, and bad-assitude...with a shotgun!   This quest will last you about 2-3 hours.  About 5 hours if you choose to accomplish every challenge there is.  This creepy defense-based game is guarenteed to grant you quite a bit of fun.  :)

Gameplay-wise, it's very similar to Get Off My Lawn...only with differences like "Enemies hitting you results in instant death", "Assists from God", "Gun upgrades" (Both games have ammo upgrades), and it's a side-scroller.   Personally, I found this game to be easier than Get Off My Lawn.

Pros:
Badass chiptune music as you blast away at the undead horde
Silly one-liners
A fair variety of undead enemies to slaughter
Casual with senseless violence.  Great for your down-time.

Cons:
Yet another zombie game (if this doesn't bother you, disregard)
Replayability is a tad limited.


If references to God bother you or if you're a vegetarian, you might wanna avoid this title.

If you're interested in this title, I recommend waiting for a price-drop or a giveaway.  $13 is honestly too high of a price for this particular title.


THANK YOU, PCGAMER!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197988593254', 'num_games_owned': 528, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1432899420}
review:
If you can get this game for free or with a huge discount - then you can go and grab it. Otherwise it's way too expensive for what's inside of it technically and content-wise. Had fun for some hours just because of the game setting and that that the game is (feels?) as a TD'ish game and I absolutely love TD games.

- The hitboxes seem to be a bit off (so does the airdrops) - you have to get used to them and that doesn't really happen in one wave/round.
- Levels are more or less repetitive: once you discover that "6" + "z" + "x" maxed out = ezbash, you don't have much of a thrill to play, since you don't have to aim with it accurately anymore.
- Variety of ... cows (among them also fat goth chicks) and hippies/basballers is poor - you get to meet most of them in first levels already.
- Not much of an explanations on what does each upgrade exactly do (or did I missed that part out?).
- It's definitely not worth 10,99€ price
- No replay value whatsoever
- Sounds and music gets annoying at times

+ Although it has it's (plenty of) minuses, it's still fun (for no reason) to mow down everyone's hated cow-zombies
+ Simplicity of the game mechanics makes it easy to finish (not really rapidly growing difficulty until last boss) in less than 4 hours
+ Somewhat nice visuals (although, as already mentioned in other reviews - looks more as a flash game)
+ Last boss

TL;DR
75% off, fix hitboxes and I'd recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987388969', 'num_games_owned': 1737, 'num_reviews': 235, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1439186908}
review: A simplistic little survival game, where you are armed with a Shotgun and must survive waves of zombie cows. Gun Mods and power ups are available, as you progress level through level; However, the cows also progress from a standard zombie cow to a charging green bull. This gives the game a level of difficulty, necessary to make it a fun challenge and keep you wanting to play more. The graphics are low quality, but that is all part of the simplistic fun of the game. I had a lot of fun with it and would give it a thumbs up, if for nothing else then it is good for a laugh when you get gored by a zombie cow.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051680934', 'num_games_owned': 203, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1433232642}
review:
[b] [h1] Good game [/h1] [/b]
Not exactly the best game ever made, but the artstyle is cool, the game is challenging in the later stages and there is some strategy involved.

This is the kind of game that you play if you have nothing else to play, but it's a unique and fun shoot-em-up game.
The enemies in the game all have different ways of trying to get in, so acctually have to think about what to when trying to take them out

I reccomend this game to someone who would want something else.


The game earns a [h1] 7/10 [/h1] from my pov

author: {'steamid': '76561198081984624', 'num_games_owned': 425, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1679730891}
review:
Although I do love this game and enjoy it, I am not recommending it due to some issues that make it not worth the price of $13. Here are the issues:

Repetitiveness:
Obviously in any tower-defense type of game you are going to see some repetitiveness involving the levels that you play. However, I feel that this game does an okay job when it comes to level variety. There are 3 types of levels that you can play,  but they are all basically the same type of level just with a minor change that doesn't make it stand out to the others.

Lag:
Although I do not usually write about lagging issues in a review due to me playing on a laptop and it usually being on my side of the experience, there is a major issue that needs to fixed ASAP. This has to do with the dead bodies left on the screen. If you notice in any other tower-defense game such as Plants Vs. Zombies for example, the bodies always disappear after a short while of sitting on the ground. This game does not do that, and I found that as I progress on through the waves of enemies, their bodies stay laying on the ground and actually cause the game to slow down and lag making it nearly impossible to successfully complete the level. 

So is the game fun? Yes. I enjoy this game very much cause it does a great job at being a game that is challenging while still being fun. Is it worth $13? As it stands, no. The only reason I got this game was through a key giveaway for the game and I of course enjoy free games. I was shocked however to see that the price of this game to be $13 when stopping by to write a review. The game needs a lot of work before it would be worth that price, but if you don't mind it go ahead and buy it however I will not recommend this game for these reasons.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962402602', 'num_games_owned': 2596, 'num_reviews': 361, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 295, 'last_played': 1432933424}
review:
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FlTkGmj_e3g]The Last Stand[/url] is a free Flash game, and it's much better than this, because it avoided [i]Cows'[/i] glaring design flaws.

The biggest problem is that you can't aim your shotgun freely - it's always pointed straight across the screen, like in an old arcade game. Even though you are clearly firing a spread of pellets from your shotgun, you have to be very careful that you're not too high or too low to hit the stampeding cow (all of which KILL YOU IN ONE HIT). Again, I'm used to this kind of system from old arcade games, but it feels [b]unfair[/b] in this game, especially given the way that cows will run in fast at a diagonal. There's actually a laser sight upgrade for your shotgun, but it doesn't help much.

Your shotgun has a high ammo capacity (especially if you upgrade it) but you have to reload [i]each[/i] shell manually by pressing R. (This is more annoying than it sounds).

You have sentry guns and such that you can activate to kill some cows for you, but you have to activate most of them at just the right time, which is not really practical with the standard mouse+keyboard controls.

...What's that you say? You'll just use a controller with a nice, convenient button for each trap? Nope, sorry, but controller support is [b]AWFUL[/b]. You can only move around with the directional pad (the sticks do nothing!), and there are no dedicated buttons for the traps and upgrades. (The game actually tells you "Controllers are for pussies!" when you select it in the options menu. That's the quite the excuse for terrible support...)

Also, the levels end up covered in so many cow corpses that it becomes difficult to tell which still need shooting (some of the basic enemies stop moving for a second or two, which ends up faking you out) and of course having to climb over dozens of their fallen cow-sisters doesn't slow them down at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091051783', 'num_games_owned': 881, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1673009572}
review:
Настоящий ковбойский трэш.
Стилистика заднего фона напоминает франшизу "техасская резня бензопилой".
Кругом кровь, гнойники и прочая мерзость.
Ну и под конец каждого уровня - горы коровьих трупов.
Несмотря ни на что, меня игра совсем не зацепила. Видимо, из-за однообразности и скудности геймплея.
Имхо, сурово на любителя. Но я жалею о потраченных средствах на данный продукт, несмотря на то, что и плохой игру не назовёшь...

author: {'steamid': '76561198049596411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1684630262}
review:
First let me say that although I recommend this game, it is solely because of the good gameplay. I was able to get this game for free and I enjoy it. Would I pay 13 bucks for a game like this? Absolutely not. 

This game is some old school flash game fun. You're a farmer killing zombie cows and hippies with shotguns while yelling random things about Alex Jones and such. You have ammo and weapon upgrades along with support each level in the form of sentry guns and stealth bombers. It's pretty much your average tower defense shooter. 

All in all it provided me with a good afternoon's worth of entertainment. I enjoyed it, but the price is way too steep. I would only pay 5 dollars tops for a game of this caliber. If you are going to purchase it, then you should wait until a steam sale lowers the price or something, because 13 dollars is a crime for the amount of content you're getting with this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027199558', 'num_games_owned': 1075, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1516945080}
review:
Crappy hit detection kills this game, there is simply no depth of field telling me where I can hit enemies, a simple shadow effect on the ground could have done the game wonders.

On the other hand, the whole 'Standard Issue' challenge that I've yet to see give any reward other then the challenge continues to frustrate me to no end, and otherwise makes all the creative upgrades of the game fly out the window when I'm forced to use the basic shotty on every level or feel like I'm not playing the game to my best.

I wish I could like this game, but it's rather shitty when I have to get shitty over not hitting a shitty cow with my shitty gun thanks to shitty depth perception.

... Shit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094088790', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1432777979}
review:
I got this through a giveaway, absolutely not worth the asking price of $13/€11, or even half of that, due to being very short and easy. This could easily have been a free flash game on Newgrounds and probably would have been a few years ago.

That said, the game is a lot of fun for what it lasts (about 2 hours). Anyone who loved Plants VS Zombies will feel right at home with the general atmosphere and charm that pervade it.

The game could have definitely used a little more playtesting; not because it's broken or anything, but because of how easily exploitable it is: the spread gun (activated by pressing 6 on the keyboard) is incredibly overpowered, and will easily dispatch hordes upon hordes of enemies without any difficulty, completely eliminating the need for accuracy. Couple that with readily accessible upgrades for larger magazine, faster reloading and fire rate, and you will soon put up a barrage of fire that won't let anything through.

Also overpowered are the special "killstreaks", like sentry guns and helicopters, which are fine per se, but have cooldowns that are way too short, making them easy to spam, especially when you get four slots of them.

Extra challenge is available under the form of medals for each level, daring you to play without upgrading your gun or using any special ability, although as far as I could see, the game doesn't seem to offer any reward for completing them.

Definitely get this while it's free or when on sale for under 2 bucks for an evening of quality uncomplicated entertainment, just do not fork out the absurd $13 asking price which, in the end, is the only major flaw of this cool little game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042292886', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1432009757}
review:
[h1]General Thoughts[/h1]
i got this game through a random steam key purchase. It's not exactly worth the value that I put into it, but putting money aside, this game is essentially a 2.5D Tower Defense game featuring Zambie Cows. You're the last living redneck living off the face of some rural area and your belief in God has given you the ability to receive care packages to take more undead cows down. Pretty unique if you ask me.

As far as gameplay mechanics go, I wish it was playtested a bit more. [b]I probably did not play this long enough,[/b] but aiming the cows is just as hard as reloading; you only reload one buckshot each time you press the reload button, and there are times where the bullets go past the cow. There was an upgrade that allows you to have a laser sight on your shotgun, but it's not exactly as helpful as you would expect. [b](The cows are transparent to these laser sights)[/b]

That being said however, it's not a bad game. This game could pass off as a flash game you play online and this would be the "full version" to put it in a different perspective. Since I got this off a random steam key purchase, I'd have to say it was worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119601567', 'num_games_owned': 778, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1429916377}
review:
Bienvenid@s a mi análisis del juego The Culling of The Cows

El juego más parecido que he jugado a este es Plantas vs. Zombies, aunque sin duda alguna, Plantas vs. Zombies es mucho mejor.

[h1]Historia[/h1]

La historia, en caso de poder considerarla historia, nos cuenta la historia de un granjero que es atacado por zombies y se tiene que defender.

[h1]Jugabilidad[/h1]

Nos podemos mover en todas las direcciones y desde la derecha van apareciendo zombies a los que debemos matar.
Tenemos una tecla para recargar y una para disparar. Poco más.
Cada nivel tiene varoas oleadas de enemigos que debemos aniquilar.

[h1]Gráficos[/h1]

El juego utiliza principalmente colores como el amarillo. Las opciones de personalización de los gráficos son casi nulos.
La interfaz de inicio es poco original.

[h1]Audio[/h1]

El audio en la pantalla de inicio es un simplón. Mientras vamos pasándonos niveles siempre escuchamos el mismo sonido irritante de las vacas.

[h1]Conclusión[/h1]

[b]No[/b] recomiendo el juego.

Mi nota para este juego es un [b]suspendido[/b]

El juego en sí no me ha gustado por una razón personal (no lo incluyo en mi nota final) y es que se me hace raro matar vacas porque son zombies. Sé que es un videojuego pero aún así no lo veo muy bien lo de matar vacas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035488848', 'num_games_owned': 155, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1558736843}
review:
[b]The Culling of The Cows[/b] весьма незамысловатая игрушка, представляющая из себя смесь жанров zombie-defence и tower-defence, позволяющая прекрасно провести несколько часов за компьютером.
В игре нам предстоит играть за бородатого фермера, у которого на лицо все признаки белой горячки. Только если словосочетание "белая горячка" у русского человека вызывает ассоциации с белкой, тот тут, по всей видимости запущенная стадия. В игре The Culling of The Cows фермер защищает свою ферму от полчищ зомбоидных коров, которые так и норовят проникнуть в амбар, по пути насадив на рога седого старичка.

Я, честно, не знаю, что употребляли разработчики игры The Culling of The Cows, потому что здравомыслящему человеку до подобного додуматься просто нереально.
В игре довольно забавная озвучка, хорошая прорисовка и несколько видов атакующих нас зомби: обычные зомби коровы, которые медленно и по прямой линии бредут к амбару, быки, которые несутся сломя голову на вдатого фермера. Кроме парнокопытных в игре есть полусгнившие люди, американские футболисты, которых просто так не завалишь и женщины с внушительной броней из съеденных тортиков и печенек, равномерно распределенных по телу.

В игре The Culling of The Cows нам будет доступно несколько видов уровней. В некоторых будет несколько волн нечисти, в других будет одна волна, но длинная. А иногда фермер заберется на второй этаж своего амбара, от куда будет палить нескончаемыми патронами по несущимся к нему коровам-зомби. И почему он так не сделал сразу?

В игре также присутствуют различные улучшения ружья. Можно, например, использовать патроны, которые будут прошибать коров на вылет, а можно использовать рассыпные, что очень удобно, когда на тебя бежит сразу толпа коров, жаждущих твоего мяса.

Пожалуй единственный запоминающийся уровень в The Culling of The Cows приходится на финальную схватку с пришельцами-нацистами.
Резюмируя все выше написанное, можно сказать с уверенностью, что игра The Culling of The Cows позволит вам провести несколько часов вечерком, а может и больше, поскольку является вполне реиграбельной. Однако, покупать игру я бы не советовал за ту стоимость, за которую ее продают. Но потратить 2-3 часа все же можно. Не каждый день выпускаются настолько необычные по содержанию игры.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/297020

author: {'steamid': '76561198120170624', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1434072181}
review:
Buen juego y muy entretenido, cada nivel es un desafío cada vez más dificil.

Básicamente se trata de defender el granero de un grupo de toros zombies, o de personas zombies utilizando una escopeta con distintos tipos de municiones. Cada nivel tiene oleadas de enemigos y se pueden elegir defensas momentaneas cada cierto tiempo. Los enemigos son de distintos tipos y cada uno tiene un comportamiento especial. Eso hace que el juego sea un reto en cada escenario. 

Lo malo del juego: un poco repetitivo y sin dudas el precio. Es un juego para 2 o 3 dolares no más.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119807017', 'num_games_owned': 839, 'num_reviews': 643, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1565205204}
review:
[h1] Коровы-зомби, и нациское НЛО, что ещё надо ?[/h1]

Игра достаточна проста, и проходится всего за 2 часа, ну игра подкупает своей механикой и задумкой. 
Да это трэшАк, но идеально подходит для отдыха и он интересен.

В игре вы умираете с одной встречи с быком, прям как в жизни, Вам предстоит охранять сарай или набивать кол-во врагов, либо какие нибудь другие миссии на локации.
Быки прут, ты остреливаешь, попутно прокачиваешся, убил всех и не умер ? Прошел миссию.
Графика приятная, года так 2008-го.
Музычка заразительная.
Так что с квасом сойдет.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=879234333

author: {'steamid': '76561197994499425', 'num_games_owned': 1043, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1429256430}
review: The Culling of the Cows is kind of like a tower defense game, but not really. It's more like hoard mode or arena mode in various games. Basically, you are a farmer, and you shoot zombie cows. You have to manually reload, so you have to take that into consideration as you shoot. It's interesting, but it's just wave after wave of enemies with no real point but to kill more. The visual style is pixelate and 2D, so it's often hard to judge where the bullets will go. Also, it gets kind of boring and repetative after awhile. It's kind of fun though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074146625', 'num_games_owned': 392, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1428868448}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows é um game indie bem simples, basicamente você tem que impedir que as criaturas entrem no celeiro, você apenas se movimenta para os lados e atira. Apesar de simples ele tem uma temática legal e uma trilha sonora que combina, o cenário varia conforme você avança e novos inimigos vão surgindo. O jogo só possui uma arma, uma espingarda que conta com diferentes tipos de munição e vários níveis de upgrade. 

Obs: Por ser um jogo indie não vou avaliá-lo com o mesmo critério que avalio os jogos de grandes empresas.

Minha nota: 7,9/10

The bad thing here is IT WORTHs $12.99... Seriously?!

I was really shocked when I found this game on steam store. Oh my goat...

review: Um jogo completamente sem-noção, onde deus ajuda o fazendeiro esquizofrênico Sammy a matar vacas e humanos zumbis, sendo esses utilizados por alienígenas nazistas. Apesar de simplista e rápido, algumas fases exigiram paciência (especialmente para conseguir as 3 insígnias de todas as fases). Só acho o preço bem salgado, onde há jogos do mesmo nível a menos de 10 reais (isso no preço normal, claro).

review:
Bem, o que posso dizer... É um típico jogo em que você atira em vacas zumbis mutantes que se explodem. É um jogo bem divertido e a música é bem legal. As conquistas são bem fáceis de se completar, são só cinco. E tem cartas! 

Mas eu aconselho a pegar somente de graça ou se estiver com uma ótima promoção. O preço dele é bem carinho para o que oferece. Eu pagaria, no máximo, uns três reais nele.

Indicado por mim no Evento da Steam na categoria de: melhor uso de animal de fazenda.

author: {'steamid': '76561198189605322', 'num_games_owned': 1306, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1527250270}
review:
The game is a shooter or tower defense game.  It's a has a crazy plot that includes UFOs, Zombies, rednecks and offcourse Cows.  It has several modes to exploit.  The audio is irritating and game is too short.  It will really test your patience.  I bought it cheap so you get waht you pay for.  All in all, is not a very bad game.  Buy it while it is cheap.  

Note:  The farmer reminds me of Hershel Greene of "The Walking Dead" TV Series

Note:  I mominated this game for The "No Apologies" Award during the Steam Autumn Sale 2017

author: {'steamid': '76561198076758074', 'num_games_owned': 785, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1427911747}
review:

review: Ciężko powiedzieć, czy polecam, czy nie. Generalnie, z jednej strony jest to pełna humoru strzelanka na odmóżdżenie. Z innej: całkowicie nie jest warta 5 zł, a co dopiero 10,99€. Gra się miło i przyjemnie. Naszym jedynym celem, jest zabijanie zombiaków: ludzi, zwierząt i ostatecznie UFO. Misje są krótkie, wraz z postępem trudniejsze i na dobrą sprawę całość można przejść w ciągu 2,8h. Więc jeszcze raz: lapa jest w górę, bo dostałem ją za darmo. Kupować nie polecam.

review:
Mini juego bastante original, y con una dificultad bastante alta.

¿Zombies normales? Nooo, mejor vacas. ¿Y si añadimos realismo al juego y con cada disparo tu personaje queda quieto por el retroceso? Buah, obra de arte.

Si no fuera porque es un simple minijuego, seria algo maravilloso.

Eso si, 11€ no lo vale ni en los mejores sueños, como mucho pagaria centimos por algo asi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022820771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 155, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1427073000}
review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8E4_mGM-9c

The Culling of The Cows is a lane defense zombie shoot-em-up festival.  You play as a farmer defending his barn from ever increasing waves of zombies and zombie cows. There is a large variety of what enemies you face as well as various weapons and defense assists that keep the gameplay feeling fresh.

One positive addition to the game is the special achievements, which adds to the ways you can enjoy the game.  The interface is simplistic, as is the gameplay. That being said, it is high paced with a feeling of momentum, and a great threat level. If you find it too easy, there are achievements that add a new layer. It can be repetitive, and I would have liked to see a lot more maps.  The weight of your weapon has impact, and it's satisfying to see your enemies explode.

This game is enjoyable, but has a feeling of 'the same'.  It is a casual game, but it does what it needs to do very well.  I never felt like my time was wasted, or that I wasn't being respected by the game.  If this game looks enjoyable to you, I can easily recommend it.

This is a summary of my review video, which I encourage you to watch
if you are looking for a more in-depth review.

Thanks for your viewership and support; for more videos click here:

http:/www.youtube.com/user/SocioPyscho

author: {'steamid': '76561198018204380', 'num_games_owned': 644, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1426978471}
review:
-May include spoilers but worth it if you are still unsure about the game.
Mixed feelings about this game but here -

At first this game is quite bad, you will probably get frustrated constantly from losing the second or third level. Yes the hitbox is terrible so the only ammo upgrade worth having is the buckshot. Some type of cows are annoying to hit - for example the ones that can't walk straight so even buckshot may miss quite a few times. 

On a normal type game 10 cows may raid your barn [huehuehue] but it only takes one of them to kill you so you'd have to restart quite frequently since you need to stand infront of them to kill them! Besides all of that, the reason I decided to rate it as recommended is: The later levels.

It wasn't particularly fun but I actually enjoyed mass murdering thousands of cows. 
Buckshot + Weapon upgrades (I prefer the reload capacity to be upgraded first because reloading is a pain in the ass (x)) is OP.
You get to fire a machine gun constantly on some levels.
You can call in free perks such as chopper gunners, FIRE! :D, auto-turret, NUKE etc that have short cooldowns (all have the same cooldown timers).
And finally the boss... I'll let you handle that flat piece of ass.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985100593', 'num_games_owned': 2106, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1427578405}
review:
The game is better than Radical Roach (by the same dev). That's not saying much though. DO NOT. I repeat DO NOT buy this at any price above 50 cent. You'll find free flash games better than this. The reason you would pay anything above zero is because at the very least it drop trading cards and there is a mild amusement factor thrown in.

Pros:
-Theme. Okay, I like the zombie cows and old farmer as the protagonist.

Cons:
-Hit box. About the worst thing in the game. It is so inconsistent. You can be hitting cows in the head at one moment and in the next watch bullets zip through like ghosts. This is especially evident when old farmer shooting from the barn window as zombie cows dance around. There's been many times when I get hit by a cow just right after a shot just whiz past. Oh yeah, of course it's a one hit kill.
-Reload speed. You are given a reload button but cannot reload as fast as your thumb pressing on the dang thing. If that's by design it's a really poor choice for a shooter that depends on it. As level progress cows come up faster & faster and in greater numbers. When you have to manage between shooting, reload, inventory purchase, and support from above and you come up blank do to reload response isn't there, it's really frustrating. (FYI, I'm using a 360 controller)
-Spawning at the start of level. This is old school cheap method of making a game longer than it really is.
-Repetition. I have to mention this even though it is expected of this type of game. It's the very least of concern (see above).

Shooters require tight controls and mechanics which this game does not have, making it not only challenging but frustrating. I simply cannot recommend it. Only get this is it's a bundle filler or given free.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155926990', 'num_games_owned': 75, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1430421044}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020720098', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1425140138}
review:
[h1] Análisis: [/h1]
¡Maldita sea! Como engancha este juego.. Quizás podría ser un juego para pasar el rato, pero sin lugar a dudas es un gran reto. Las vacas que se llevaban los ovnis ahora están malditas, zombificadas o como queráis llamarlo y no podéis permitir que entren en vuestra propiedad. Porque se comerán a todo vuestro ganado. 

La jugabilidad con mando es increíble, el juego está absolutamente bien adaptado. Haciéndolo muy cómodo de jugar. Aunque su dificultad será progresiva a medida que iremos pasando niveles aparecerán nuevos enemigos más rápidos y se pondrá más difícil cuando tu munición se acabe y debas recargar.

A nivel gráfico tiene un estilo recreativo que ya no se suele ver muy a menudo. Se trata de un juego simple, que me recuerda a juegos de antaño en maquinas recreativas que eran bastante difíciles de pasar. 

¿La música? Es que la música es tremenda.. puro rock, nada de country, ni algo parecido al ambiente del juego. Esto es rock puro y duro, que le da más euforia al momento.

[h1] Jugabilidad: [/h1] ★★★★✫ 4/5
[h1] Gráficos: [/h1] ★★✫✫✫ 2/5
[h1] Sonido: [/h1] ★★★★✫ 4/5
[h1] Innovación: [/h1] ★★✫✫✫ 2/5

[h1] Conclusión: [/h1]
Ventajas: Engancha muchísimo, una barbaridad.
Desventajas: Interfaz un tanto pobre.
¿Recomendaría su compra?: Si

[h1] Sentencia: [/h1]
"Guau" 6.0/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198049157463', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1590246437}
review:
Pro:
-Sehr Lustiger Tower Defense/Side Scroll Shooter für Zwischendurch
-Wellen von Zombie Kühen müssen abgewehrt werden
-5 Errungenschaften, davon einer Bossgegner
-Verschiedene Waffen und Extras wie Shogun oder Centry Gun
-40 Level mit immer stärker werdenden Gegnern
-geile Soundeffekte (zb Geräusch nach Abschuss einer TNT Kuh :D )

Contra:

author: {'steamid': '76561198099203173', 'num_games_owned': 1110, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 847, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 847, 'last_played': 1424810268}
review: Очень смешной сюжет: зомби-коровы атакуют твой сарай. А ты можешь прокачать пушку, юзнуть пулемет или заказать ковровое бомбометание. А в конце ожидает босс в виде нацистской НЛО! Короче, уровень неадеквата и трэша шкалит. Но, пройдя пару уровней, привыкаешь и становится скучно. Местами игра довольно хардова, и над главным боссом пришлось помучится. Как по мне, на изредка повеселиться - пойдет. Фаньтесь, угорайте, а когда станет скучно - забирайте свои карточки и уходите! 7,5 зомби-коров/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198081044238', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1431980196}
review:
В общем эту игру, я как самый настоящий Б.И.Ч. отхватил на бесплатной раздаче и довольно долго не играл в нее. Но тут подокрался писец моему нормальному интернету ( так как обл.Донецкая) и я перешел на GPRs , что собстенно и позволило мне её скачать. 

Это МЕГА классная убивалка времени с супер затягивающим эффектом. Коровы зомби, баскетболисты, даже жирные готы бабы зомби . 
Есть возможность отхватывать подарки с неба , аппать свой дробовик. 
Да блин, что писать только нужно это ощутить, дед который защищает свою ферму. Да тут слезу пустить можно. 
Ещё плюс ко всему музыка увлекает. 

Минус один , это если ты слоупок , то тогда плохо покупать её за 9 баксов. 
а если отхватил халявную раздачу то качай , постреляй ради фана.

이 게임을 가족 혹은 친구에게 진심으로 추천해줄 수 있을까?

>>>
>>> CALCULATING ... 
>>> 25%...
>>> 50%...
>>> 75%...
>>> 100%
>>>
>>> CONCLUSION: "NO! IT'S IMPOSSIBLE!"

그러므로 이 게임은 비추천.

В целом,игра понравилась. Дюже забавная и не напряжная, играть очень просто и весело,плюс ко всему ачивки очень быстро зарабатываются.
Сам игру получил на халяву,поэтому про цену ничего сказать не могу (хотя кажется довольно высокой).
9 из 10 из-за надоедливых уровней с 5+ волнами.

review: Honestly I've been impressed about this game . It's a nice casual arcade PvZ type of thing where you shoot zombie cows and stuff to progress through the level . author: {'steamid': '76561198061773237', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1423219524}
review:
Más allá del conocimiento exhaustivo de la realidad del sector ganadero que podemos obtener en base a documentaciones y encuestas, The Culling of the Cows nos ofrece la verdadera, y cruda realidad, de los problemas de la ganadería contemporánea.

Que no son otros que animales nacionalsocialistas en proceso de descomponsición que se alzan para entrar en tu granero cual rumanos  en una finca de Salvador Tous Blavi mientras su esposa en sus mejores años posase en bikini en la piscina.


14/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198149212936', 'num_games_owned': 737, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1423375818}
review:
This game is nuts. Zombie cows, gore, a honey badger, hippies, shotgun shooting gun, and zombie cows man. If for some reason the video they put up on the Steam page isnt enough, try some real time gameplay I recorded:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yuca6fUXLFo

My only complaints come in for the aiming. It's not perfect and it certainly feels that way when you're trying to align your shots in the path of a enemy. There are shots that miss that I could have sworn would get me a kill. Other than that, the game is so much damn fun. Great 2D shooter that keeps the action coming. Not sure if casual is the term to use for a game like this as it actually gets pretty intense at times.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050084167', 'num_games_owned': 293, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1590098812}
review: Excelente tower defense, um dos melhores que já joguei, logo após de Plants vs Zombies.O jogo é muito divertido e acaba se tornando viciante,uma mistura de apocalipse zombie com alieníginas, ambos querendo invadir a fazenda do Seu Zé que defende fortemente com sua espingarda e algumas armadilhas do celeiro.É um jogo indie que foi muito bem preparado, porém, aparentemente a overlay não funciona corretamente, embora você conseguia abrir o painel da Steam e conversar com seus amigos, a opção de captura e envio de tela não é habilitada, dessa forma se necessita o envio das prints,terá que fazer isso manualmente.Vale a pena conferir se você é fã do gênero.

review:
The Culling Of The Cows to połączeniem Tower Defence i strzelanki.Gracz wciela się w farmera,który musi chronić farmę,przed apokalipsą krów zombie (zwykłe zombie też są)

+Wciągająca
+Ma swój klimat
+Łatwe osiągnięcia (jest ich 5)

-Gdyby nie to,że ją dostałem,to bym ją nie poznał
-Za taką cenę (11 euro) nie kupiłbym tego nigdy 

Ogólnie polecam,ale jak będzie w przecenie (max 5 euro)

UFFFF! Qué puedo decir? RECOMENDADÍSIMO... review:
It is a fun game. Only issue I have is that it is hard to line up a shot. There were plenty of times that I would shoot at a cow, it would miss, but the cow would still impale me. If the cow was in line with me to impale me, then my shot should not have missed.
Maybe add a reticle? Or laser sight? Or just fix this graphically so it makes sense. Something needs to change.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083605219', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1421417112}
review: Вообще не понравилось. Играем за фермера, который отстреливает зараженных коров. Графика плохенькая лубочная, звук глухой, нечистый, музыка кустарная, коровы постоянно мычат на её фоне - какофония. Непомерная сложность в игре, нужно стрелять перезаряжаться, быстро выбрать нужный апгрейд, запросить помощь, некоторые коровы успевают за секунду добежать до фермера, одно касание и уровень играть заново или в сарай забегут тоже сначала. Почему-то в игре нет возможности сменить управление и выстрелы зачем-то поставили на курки на геймпаде, не все геймпады одинаковы, например у меня очень жесткие курки и буквально через двадцать минут начинают болеть пальцы - не удобно. Стреляй перезаряжайся бегай туда-сюда правильно становись на линию огня ведь один промах может означать конец всему.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001046455', 'num_games_owned': 13201, 'num_reviews': 349, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1421024230}
review:
TL;DR: Simple fast-paced, albeit short, wave defender. I'd advice to get it on discount.

In Culling of the Cows you slaughter hundreds of cows, a couple of badgers and also some hipsters. All of them are zombies though. There's a reason for that revealed at the end but it's totally ridiculous like the whole idea itself. For whatever reason you don't want the monsters in your barn. You got to go through the farm utterly destroying all the undead bovine life forms with your trusty shotgun and (!) the mudafucking airforces.

Perhaps surprisingly, this is rather fun and enjoyable. Voice acting is horrible though but for that matter the game lasts only couple of hours even if you try to ace everything.

Every level you begin with a shotgun shooting slugs. God promises to sell you better weapons and help along the way because he's a such good guy. He also sends you money to pay for all the stuff. Then you proceed to kill all the enemies rampaging towards you. You got to reload manually so proceed with care and precision. This can be annoying as the hitboxes are quite small. This also makes the spread-out ammo upgrade super useful.

Frankly, you can only shoot forward and you're slow at walking, so sometimes you can't prevent a cow from passing or indeed killing you. This is where assists come in: you can call up airforces, bombings, sentry guns, fire walls, all kinds of overpowered defenses that will mostly take care of your job for you, with brief cooldowns in between. Still it often takes another try to ace any level, especially since that means you can't buy some overpowered weapons.

It wouldn't stay fresh for long but fortunately it's also quite short, the 40 levels taking only some 2-3 hours to ace. However, the short length is also a curse: it's not really worth the full price. However, at a decent discount or in a bundle, go for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007989044', 'num_games_owned': 4238, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1421761437}
review:
Вариация на тему tower defence. Башен нет, но есть [strike]бомж[/strike] старичок с дробовиком, защищающий свою ферму от.. эм.. коров-зомби.. с.. кхм.. божьей помощью. И это самый интересный момент в игре, увы.

В наличии три режима: волны, натиск (одна большая волна и нет права на ошибку) и тир. В нашем распоряжении верное ружье с несколькими апгрейдами и видами патронов, а также полдюжины спецспособностей, например, турель, вертолёт или ядерная бомба (да-да). Геймплей предельно аркадный, всё основано лишь на ловкости пальцев и рефлексах, но затягивает – игра пролетает за один вечер. Причём чем дальше, тем проще. Изначально, хоть врагов меньше, но и денег дают соответственно, а спецприемов всего один-два. На поздних же этапах просто чередуем умения, изредка постреливая разрывными патронами.

Картинка лично мне понравилась, а вот звук можно было сделать и посочнее.

Мясо и мычание увлекут на два-три часа до финала, но большего игра предложить не может. Хотя и надо ли? Симулятор реднека под веществами. KILL THEM ALL!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198117198358', 'num_games_owned': 673, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1426274258}
review:
Not really a complete game as such, but more or less a suprisingly good one that also happens to include some pretty f****d up cows, crazy farmers and horribly voice acted god.

Now I have to admit, the voice acting as stated before is horrible. But I think of it still as quite a humorous game and it adds up to how much I like it. The upgrades aren't really original same as abilities but still has some potential... if the devs decide to carry the game on.

Pros

- Pretty stupid, the story and the overall design.
- Horribly voice acted, which I think is a good thing.
- It's fun, as a 5 minute timewaster and nothing more. Expect this to be played for at most 3 hours and then left in your steam library and with the cobwebs growing...

Cons

- Fairly limited gameplay, gets repetitive.
- Not completely original, the upgrades, the style of side scrolling defense and the overall feel, makes me wish this was free as a flash game.
- Not entirely worth $13 USD, but if you have some money lying around when this is on sale. $3.79 (75% off) is quite the interesting deal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073197154', 'num_games_owned': 846, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1439449095}

1) Easy steam achievement (doable in 2 hours)
2) There's steam cards

What I dislike about this
1) seems too oldschool

In summary, do not buy the game at full price.... (or half price) (i got mine for free)

review:
很有趣的休閒產品，塔防類型

優點 : 容易上手，玩起來有樂趣、娛樂性高。

缺點 : 操作不順，常常會不小心死掉，就要重頭來；很容易消磨耐心。

整體來說是一款休閒小品，很容易取得全成就!!

評分 : 5.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198102385608', 'num_games_owned': 2465, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1421572620}
review:
Что будет, если ты станешь единственным, кто может спасти весь мир ?
Старик Сэмми стоит на страже всего мира, истребляя пораженных зомби-вирусом существ.
Это - игра наркомания.
Вооружившись дробовиком, мы отстреливаем стада коров и прочей нечисти, вроде бейсболистов и тучных готов (Серьезно???)
Плюсы:
+ Если вам совсем нечего делать, можете пострелять.
+ Есть возможность покупать предметы на уровне.
+ Дополнительные способы защиты (пулемет, ковровая бомбардировка, ядерная бомба).
+ Ну и отнесем к плюсам карточки и достаточно простые достижения.
Минусы:
- Чтобы поиграть в нее, придется потратиться на вещества (догадайтесь какие).
- Музыка и звуковое сопровождение заставляют плакать ваши уши.
- Разобравшись в игре, уровни проходятся влет.
P.S. Тут есть нацисткая летающая тарелка
Советую брать, если только она вам досталась бесплатно или с огромной скидкой.

review:
It's a decent game.
The gameplay is nothing special, there is only 1 weapon and it gets very repetitive, very fast.
The hitboxes are pretty bad.
The visuals are okay.
The music track is really short and the loop is noticeable.

Is it worth 11€? No. Not at all.
Is it a nice enough game to get from a bundle/for free? Sure.

review:
Actually i would not recommend this game even if you can get it for free.
This game is really bad. I regret the 2 hours i spent to clear it, and i'd really like to have them back to stare a wall. Totally no fun, poor graphic, hitboxes totally random, most upgrades are useless, just pick green shells and bigger reload to face anything anywhere anytime. There are a lot of enemies... but you won't notice any difference (maybe funny colored corpses?) as long as you keep shooting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128685342', 'num_games_owned': 248, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1435250948}
review:
Il gioco si presenta con una grafica "grezza", cartunesca. Il gameplay si basa sul diffendere la nostra fattoria da ondate di vacche/tori con il morbo della muca pazza (?), in pochè parole è un tower defense. Si posso acquistare vari potenziamente grazie al budget trovabile durante la parita (un po' all'inizio, gli altri gli devi trovare nei power-up). Ci sono due modalità : la prima "classica" dove posso entrare soltato 10 vacche nella nostra fatoria, nella seconda non dobbiamo permettere a nessuna vacca di entrare.
Il gioco si è rivelato abbastanza divertente, forse un po' troppo ripetitivo. E 10,99 euro sono tanti, troppi per un gioco di questo genere.

Voto 6.75/10

P.S. Si possono travare le "carte" di steam, per la medaglia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048480941', 'num_games_owned': 2676, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1421171963}
review: Вообще не понравилось. Играем за фермера, который отстреливает зараженных коров. Графика плохенькая лубочная, звук глухой, нечистый, музыка кустарная, коровы постоянно мычат на её фоне - какофония. Непомерная сложность в игре, нужно стрелять перезаряжаться, быстро выбрать нужный апгрейд, запросить помощь, некоторые коровы успевают за секунду добежать до фермера, одно касание и уровень играть заново или в сарай забегут тоже сначала. Почему-то в игре нет возможности сменить управление и выстрелы зачем-то поставили на курки на геймпаде, не все геймпады одинаковы, например у меня очень жесткие курки и буквально через двадцать минут начинают болеть пальцы - не удобно. Стреляй перезаряжайся бегай туда-сюда правильно становись на линию огня ведь один промах может означать конец всему.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047158566', 'num_games_owned': 1113, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1421226111}
review:
-TERRIBLE HITBOXES
Watch as your bullets pass straight through their legs.

-ABYSMAL IN GAME CHALLENGES
Can you imagine a game where our hero never got any upgrades? Imagine how boring megaman would've been if you never got a single upgrade. Some might disagree, but IMO why can't you have challenges that let you utilize the game's mechanics/upgrades. It's why time attack is such a popular challenge; Not "beat the level without using X"

-UI
No tooltip info when you click/hover over an available assist, upgrade, or enemy within a given level. That goes for in battle and on the world map.

-NO STORY ARCH
the game trailer does a better job of telling a story

-only 5 achievements
Great for people looking to add a perfect game to their steam collection. But from a consumer standpoint, it lowers overall replayability

author: {'steamid': '76561198021009654', 'num_games_owned': 2452, 'num_reviews': 266, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1420306329}
review:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Spiel: 

Ein klassisches Tower Defense spiel wie Plants vs Zombies, nur das hier meistens nur Kühe erschossen werden.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Einzelspieler:

Man ballert als alter Farmer mutierte Kühe von der Farm die gerne in die Scheune würden. Man muss immer eine Anzahl an Wellen überstehen um in das nächste Level zu kommen.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Grafik:

Die Grafik ist ok, nicht weltbewegend aber reicht vollkommen aus.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Musik:

Die Musik ist gut und passend zum Spiel, aber dennoch nicht hitverdächtig.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Steuerung:

Funktioniert sehr gut mit XBOX360 Pad. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pro/Contra:

- wie Plants vs. Zombie nur mit Kühen
- wird schnell eintönig 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fazit:

Ich bin keine Fan von Tower Defense spielen, daher fand ichs auch recht schnell sehr langweilig. Für Leute die aber PvsZ gut finden denke ich ist das mal was anderes, aber für den Preis dennoch nicht zu empfehlen.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Zusammengefasst: 

Einzelspieler: 4/10
Grafik: 5/10
Musik: 4/10
Steuerung: 7/10
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Spiel: 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198083264045', 'num_games_owned': 646, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1416769724}
review:
[h1]Всех на забой! [/h1]
Иногда после долгих игр в навороченные стратегии, кровавые шутеры, безбашенные слэшеры, гигантские бродилки хочется просто зависнуть на несколько часов в казуальную, не очень популярную игру. Да, это то, что вы искали. Готовьте ружье, к вам идет стадо зомби-коров!

[h1]Пора запятнать золотую рожь. Сюжет. Графика. [/h1]
Какой-то сюжет в игре присутствует, но это не играет никакой роли. Он абсолютно не нужен. Игра рассчитана только на то, чтобы отстрелять пару сотен коров и просто расслабится. Графика, как и во всех казуальных играх, не требовательна (не значит, что плохая). Радует многокрасочность и яркость на протяжении всей игры. 

[h1]Куча мертвых коров. Дизайн. [/h1]
Давно я не видел, чтобы в современных играх трупы противников оставались лежать до конца уровня. Это добавляет чрезмерное ощущение олдскула и ностальгии. Дизайн разработчики детализировали. Много сменяющихся фонов, которые не надоедают. Враги сделаны оригинально, со вкусом.

[h1]Идеально. Скиллово. Особенности геймплея. [/h1]
Еще одна идеальная игра в вашу коллекцию. 5 элементарных достижений, которые можно выполнить по ходу большого забоя. Игра сделана не однотипно. Есть разные режимы (в прохождении), которые так или иначе порадуют вас своим весельем. Есть множество скиллов, улучшений, дополнительных атак (сбрасывание бомб, вызов вертушки). Приличный ассортимент врагов. 

[i]Проходится на одном дыхании. Стандартная аркада с 5-ю нетрудными ачивками. Позволяет расслабится. Чувствуется дыхание олдскула. [/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561197991750529', 'num_games_owned': 641, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1420567536}
review:
This is a typical wave based 2D shoot em up. It has a funny little gimmic which is basically a nazi ufo turns the cows into zombies. So it's not that serious. 

[h1] Graphics: [/h1] 
The art style is okay, nothing special. Looks like a flash game.

[h1] Sound: [/h1] 
The enemies have good sounds (except that annoying crow) just like the weapons. I think the voice over work is rly cheesy sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't. The music is repetitive as hell you won't stand it longer than like 2,3 levels. The problem is basically there is a 30 sec loop and nothing else except for the menu music. 

[h1] Gameplay: [/h1] 
You have to shoot down cows and other enemies in front of you. There are many types of enemies like super fast cow, 
tank cow, a crazy cow that comes at you in a crisscross and many more. So the enemy variety is good. But the algorithm is easy: Is this guy ahead of the others? -> shoot OR is this guy faster than the others? -> shoot that first.
There are game modes like simple turret sectons, boss fights, 1 big wave, normal wave. You can upgrade your shotgun in the previous 2. There are ammo types like birdshot, buckshot, slug... each is different but I think the buckshot is your bread and butter because it shoots in a cone. And the awkward hit detection (or the sense of position I'm not sure) is really annoying and it puts you out of the mood. You can also upgrade your ammo capacity, reload speed, fire rate, and you can attach a laser pointer on your shotgun. These upgrades can be obtained by your starter and drop money. You can also call for a care packege which contains money or powerups like unlimited ammo, unlimited health, slomo... for a limited time. But I walked through them almost every time because of the awkward sense of position.
You can also call aids like air strike, napalm barrels, nuke and other over the top stuff. 
The game gets really repetitive after 30-60 minutes. There is only one level type (The Farm) but it indicates like there will be other themes but no... just the farm. 

[h1] Replayability: [/h1] 
There are achievements per stage but you mustn't use the upgrade system or the aid system to earn these which defeats the only good thing in the game.

[h1] Overall: [/h1] 
[b] Pros: [/b] 
[list]
 [*]Setting
 [*]Nice upgrade system and air support bonuses
 [*]Gore
 [*]Trading Cards
 [*]Casual fun time for a few hours
 [/list]
[b] Cons: [/b] 
 [*]Only 1 weapon (except for the turret segments)
 [*]Annoying hit detection and sense of position
 [*]Music is bad and repetitive
 [*]Lack of variety in levels
 [*]Questionable game design
 [*]The Extras menu leads you to nowhere...
 [*]HIgh price!
[/list]

[h1] Verdict: [/h1] 
It's not worth 11 euros for sure. If you want some mindless fun for a few hours then buy it on a sale. I had some fun but I had many many frustrated moments as well. It's an average game at best. Won't kill you but won't save you. 
My recomendation is neutral but the actual price lowers it a little bit. Oh and if you want to play it the "fun" way it lasts 2 hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102275691', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1419703887}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows è un videogame di genere Azione - "Tower Defence" sviluppato dalla Decaying Logic e pubblicato dalla KISS ltd nel 2014.
La struttura di gioco è un po' strana:noi interpreteremo un contadino che dovrà difendere la propria fattoria principalmente da mucche zombie.
Saremo a disposizione di un fucile che potremmo potenziare in base al budget che ci sarà dato a inizio stage o che riusciremo a prendere attraverso i power-up.
C'è una buona varietà di nemici,ognuno con una caratteristica diversa.
Ci sono due tipi di livelli:le ondate di nemici,dove potranno entrare nella fattoria massimo 10 nemici oppure "Kill'em All",dove dovremo uccidere tutti i nemici in un unica ondata senza far entrare nessun nemico nella fattoria.
La grafica l'ho apprezzata molto,stile cartoonesco ma anche un po' grezzo,lo scomparto audio è discreto,la longevità corta,la musica molto monotona e un ottima scelta tra i power up.
Questo gioco diverte molto,anche se si poteva fare di meglio rimane comunque un buon titolo.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198134426365', 'num_games_owned': 896, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1436377682}
review: Игра хардкорная , прям жесть. Геймплей прост, как не когда - стреляй по пряиой, передвигайся, успевай перезарядить, пока не сдохнешь. На каждый уровень тебе дают ограниченное число денег, которые тратятся на апгрейд. не правильно проапгрейдишь - умрешь, не ту кнопку нажмешь - умрешь. минусы- дед старенький, медленно храмает, вместо того, чтоб бегать по локации. плюсы - дед против босса, этот режим не даст заскучать никому. Индигала еще раздает эту игру, успевайте забрать бесплатно.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999706674', 'num_games_owned': 1182, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1496831152}
review: The Culling Of The Cows to mini-gierka, w której wcielamy się w rolę sędziwego farmera, którego farma nękana jest przez różnego rodzaju wrogów od krów, przez nawiedzone "przygrubawe" kobieciny (gotki) aż do zombie i kosmitów. Gra mimo swojej prostoty naprawdę mnie wciągłą. Do dyspozycji mamy strzelbę z wymienną amunicją ( wybuchową, penetrującą i wybuchową) oraz w specjalnych poziomach karabin. Mamy także możliwość uzyskania "Pomocy od boga" w postaci chwilowych bonusów np. nieskończonej amunicji bądź nieśmiertelności. Otrzymujemy także jak w każdej grze typu tower-defense wieżyczki, bądź różne ataki np. naloty, atomówki, piły zastawiające wrota naszej stodoły bądź wieżyczki.  W grze wszechobecna jest ironia i czarny humor, Jest ona idealna do "odmóżdżenia" się po pracy, czy też szkole. Może i oprawa audiowizualna nie jest najwyższej jakości i fabuła jest uboga to naprawdę każdemu polecam zagranie w tę grę. Ponadto gra posiada zarówno karty jak i osiągnięcia na steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089245407', 'num_games_owned': 171, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1419721849}

author: {'steamid': '76561198122562742', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 390, 'last_played': 1420311624}
review: Интересная игрушка. Вам надо защищать свой сарай от зомби. Вы играете за фермера дедка по имени Сэмми, который один противостоит зомби, цель деда ни в коем случае не дать захватить свой сарай зомби. В игре около 40 уровней, эти уровни заставят вас напрячь свои пальцы и по потеть как следует, интересная музыка под это всё и дикий хардкор, который сопровождает вас на каждом уровне. Игра интересная, хоть и напряжённая.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153344067', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1439717517}
review:
Очень хардкорная игра после 3-4 уровня вам уже будет полная **** и вам понадобятся крепкие нервы чтобы её пройти.Если быть слабонервным то вас вырвет потому что там много крови,мяса,и тварей которые хотят убить вас и зайти в ваш амбар.

Игра сделана на подобе жанра "Tower Defense" но защитником будет ваш герой с дробовиком и бонусами которые вы будете открывать по многим уровням

P.s.-Рекомендую поставить звук по тише потому что там даже на паузе,меню мычат быки)
На этом мой обзор подошёл к концу,всем пока)

author: {'steamid': '76561198118752633', 'num_games_owned': 2507, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 717, 'last_played': 1419752400}
review:
挺不喜欢这个游戏。
玩法单调射击游戏。关卡设置不合理。各种技能的设置看似多样化，但实际游戏中并没有那种策略考量。使用6号弹无脑射击就好。
游戏战斗机制有两点挺讨厌：1）开枪与移动不能同时进行。2）子弹轨迹没有那种空间上的立体感，很多时候在立体空间中子弹与怪物并不会接触，但因为贴图轨迹擦过怪物贴图，就算击中敌人。这给我带来极大的不适感。
敌人基本上都是各色的牛牛牛。也许有些有特殊爱好的人会喜欢。反正我是看着地上成堆的牛尸体是看吐了。
就连游戏最后带给我的反馈也是糟糕的：最后一关耗费一个小时，各种尝试，最终的纳粹飞碟BOSS被我打得剩下一丝丝血，然后天空伸出一只手指，一下把boss按死。f**k,我忍着反感玩这么久可不是为了看游戏作者给我扮演救世主的。
千万别浪费时间在这游戏上面

author: {'steamid': '76561198104181430', 'num_games_owned': 737, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 556, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1420239511}
review:
Cara, não acredito! O pior é que o jogo até que te distrai um pouco...
Li numa análise: "esse é o jogo mais escroto que já vi!" E eu confirmo: um velho metido a Rambo, que tenta impedir que ondas de vacas-zumbi invandam seus celeiros. E o velho vem tudo! Invoca de helicóptero até chuva de meteoro contra as vaquinhas...
Olha joguei pq ganhei grátis. Mas eu não compraria... Acho que não vale a pena. Mas se você, como eu ganhar, ou pagar bem baratinho, tipo 90% de desconto, você vai ter umas horinhas de diversão.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020705409', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 189, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1419758635}
review:
Juego en plan maquina recreativa estupendo para matar el tiempo.
Tenemos 3 tipos de niveles diferentes, por lo que se acaba volviendo algo repetitivo, pero tampoco es mucho problema ya que la duración total es muy corta.
Algunos niveles son un autentico reto, además, la utilización de habilidades y armas de apoyo dan un extra de diversión.
Compra justificada si está de oferta o viene con un bundle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042373502', 'num_games_owned': 1345, 'num_reviews': 394, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1419782094}
review:
[b]Ты – то, что ты ешь![/b]

В обычном и на первый взгляд непримечательном городишке, где-то на юге Америки проживал обычный и ничем непримечательный старик Сэмми, который не отличался ни кротким нравом, ни любовью к ближнему своему, а уж истории о том как за ним следят агенты ФБР, да маленькие зеленые человечки бродят у его дома по ночам дабы собрать «пробы», старик рассказывал всем кто хочет его слушать, да и кто не хочет тоже. В конечном счете, дробовик – это весомый аргумент и лучше послушать то, что хочет рассказать тебе сумасшедший старик, а уже потом убраться восвояси вместо того, чтобы получить целительный заряд дрови прямиков в копчик. И так могло бы продолжаться долгое время пока бы не приехали «ангелы» и не забрали бы Сэмми в дом с мягкими стенами, но случилось непредвиденное! То о чем говорил Сэм сбылось! Пришельцы таки пришли за анальными пробами? Хуже! Нацисты из открытого космоса распространили зомби-вирус, которому оказались подвержены парнокопытные, в нашем случае – коровы, игроки в бейсбол и не в меру упитанные готессы. И тут Сэм понимает, что он – последняя надежда человечества, а потому хромой старик вооружившись «бумстиком» отправляется нести светлое, доброе и вечное в массы.

Звучит… не то чтобы оригинально, но достаточно свежо и оттого тут же появляется желание ознакомиться с «The Culling Of The Cows» поближе. И что же я увидел? Достаточно симпатичная графика, качественно нарисованные задники, из оружия правда был предоставлен один лишь дробовик, но он имел дополнительных три насадки, которые также можно было проапгрейдить, дабы зомбочью жизнь медом не казалось. Даже были испытания – будь то: пройти уровень без улучшения оружия, помощи союзников или вовсе не пропустить ни одной коровы к амбару со… свежими мозгами? Нет, ну правда, не за сеном же коровки пришли! Да и потом, вы взгляните на героя игры, только взгляните. Такое чувство, что Сэм сошел с картины – «Американская готика», а коли так, то в его сарае преспокойно можно найти с дюжину трупов студентов, что в своё время издевались над «безобидным» стариком. Одним словом игра меня подкупила и я самоотверженно начал играть дальше ожидая интересного, а самое главное разнообразного геймплея. Дождался? Ага, щаз! Я дождался лишь разочарования и чувства, что меня обманули.

Да, безусловно, можно возразить, а чего ты ждешь от игры, где во главе угла стоит отстрел зомби-коров? Ну смотрите, от подобной игры ждешь – разнообразия уровней. Допустим возможности покататься на тракторе и давить мелкую живность, ага – почувствовать себя в шкуре Волка из бессмертного мультика «Ну, погоди!» Уровень на время, где надо будет прорваться через толпу мертвецов, дабы получить… «Золотую малину» и стать Уве Боллом, который будет отвешивать зомби-коровами мощные хуки справа и слева. Но ничего этого в игре нет, а единственное разнообразие что тут присутствует, так это когда нам дают дробовик/пулемет/грантомет с бесконечным боезапасом и говорят – стреляй. Думаете весело? Не тут то было! Прицел в данном случае достаточно кривой и когда пули раз за разом проходили мимо цели я не раз и не два вспомнил игрушку «Duck Hunt», разве что ехидно хихикающей собаки тут не было. 

А как обстоят дела обстоят с реиграбильностью и увлекательным геймплеем в основной кампании? Вы знаете, а никак. Прицела как такового в игре нет и даже если купить лазерную указку погоды это особо не делает, так как благодаря великому рэндому мы можем промахнуться даже находясь на одной линии с врагом в то время как "буренки" никогда не промахиваются и второго шанса нам не дают. Добавим сюда то обстоятельство, что сами по себе апгрейды оружия расположены неудобно и в игре нельзя нажать на паузу, чтобы выбрать что прокачать, отчего в пылу схватки можно нажать ни на ту кнопку и скорей всего зафейлить забег. Ах да, деньги на апгрейд оружия выпадают из ящиков помощи, причем все также рэндомно и по счастливому стечению обстоятельств за всю волну вам может не прийти ни одного вшивого доллара, зато мгновенная перезарядка или ускорения будут приходить с заметной периодичностью. И ладно бы эти мини-бонусы и впрямь давали заметное преимущество в игре, так нет! Бессмертие заканчивается аккурат в тот момент, когда рядом с нами находится разъяренный бык, ускорение вообще никак не помогает, а мгновенная перезарядка выпадает в те моменты, когда дробовик полностью перезаряжен. 

3 из 10 сумасшедших фермера

author: {'steamid': '76561198080547396', 'num_games_owned': 453, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1433786145}
review: I was very unsure what to expect when I got this free X-Mas present of VG24, this is a quite good time a side scrolling, zombie cow, farmhand shooter and is a great time.  Apparently Nazi aliens have breed loads of different kind of zombie cows and you are a farmer who are to  kill those cows and get rid of them from your farm. The game has hilarious sound FX, a 16 bit music, enough of crazy levels, with loads of crazy cows, and tons of upgrades for your weapons. Go and get MOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

review:
Оцениваю эту игру как "средненький инди-экшен". Благо получил её на раздаче, так бы врятле купил. Ну пару слов о ней сказать можно. В The Culling Of The Cows вам предстоит сражаться с зомбированными тварями. Оборонять свой амбар, при этом зачищая землю от этой нечисти и продвигаться дальше и дальше...

4 коровы из 10.
