review:
เกมฆ่าเวลาและเก็บอาชีพเมนต์ชั้นดี
เกมให้เรายิงวัวหรืออะไรก็ตามที่เข้ามาโจมตีโรงนาของคุณด้วยวิธีต่างๆมากมาย หลังๆจะง่ายเพราะมีตัวช่วยเยอะ
เสียงพากษ์ฮาดี เกมจบได้ภายในเวลา 2 ชม.

ปล.เห็นเป็นชาวนาชาวสวนธรรมดา แต่ลุงสามารถเรียกฮ.มาช่วยยิง เรียกฝนดาวตกให้ตกใส่ ไปถึงขั้นเรียกนิวเคลียร์มาลงได้ด้วย!!?

author: {'steamid': '76561198069065539', 'num_games_owned': 2223, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1419580255}
review:
[i]The Culling of the Cows[/i] is an absurdist gag game that, while it may provide you with all the rampant bovine slaughter you could ever dream of, is as of now not at all worth the price paid for it.

As a lone farmer stranded in rural 'Murica, you must overcome the armies of mutant cows, deranged hippies and obese gothic women that a Nazi UFO sends your way. By reading the previous sentence, it should be quite clear that this game is not taking itself too seriously. However, there is a clear difference between random humor with a purpose and random just for random's sake; this game strictly falls into the latter. [i]Culling[/i] is basing its appeal entirely on the fact that the player gets to shoot cows...a lot. All of the other plot points mentioned in the beginning of this paragraph receive no explanation besides a single introduction screen per plot point, and are otherwise meant to serve as comedic masks for generic enemy types.

The game's fundamentals are disappointingly lacking. Gameplay is divided into levels that contain encounters in either standard "Waves" format, a variation of Waves that is only one large wave, or a last-stand turret mode called "Onslaught". The majority of the game's levels occur in the Waves format, with varying numbers and types of enemies and waves for each level. This variety does little to put off the repetition that sets in after a few rounds of slaughtering the same few animals and zombies over and over. The Waves format does allow for some character customization in weapon upgrades, but after a certain amount of experimentation I discovered an order of upgrades that, with moderate skill, could win all the levels. Some incentive in the level design to switch up gameplay styles would have gone a long way. The other gameplay mode, Onslaught, produces some of the most frustrating levels in the game due to sketchy hit detection, though it often provides a refreshing and enjoyable break from the Waves levels as well.

Various other parts of the game fail to stand out. The soundtrack isn't memorable and the art style has this feel to it that so many indie games seem to have, which at worst could be descibed as "one step above MS Paint". Largely, the game isn't bad-looking; it just has a habit of piling hundreds of multicolored cow corpses on the screen at once, which grates on the senses and leaves a lasting impact after seeing it over and over. Some parts of the game seem to be implemented strangely: controller support, despite being labelled as both "partial" and "full", relegates movement solely to the D-Pad, which is an odd choice. [i]Culling[/i]'s achievements are also strange: there are only five, four can be attained by the third level (two are bugged to only work with the keyboard) and the fifth is for beating the game. More achievements could help boost replayability, a facet which is important in this game considering it can be finished in just over three hours. Though most levels contain medals to earn for winning under certain conditions, the game doesn't offer rewards for earning the medals, which makes them largely meaningless. Perhaps tying some customization unlocks to medals would solve this issue?

Though this game faces significant issues, I must give praise to the spirit of the developers. They've implemented some features like an internal cheat console, the achievements and trading cards by popular demand. Additionally, their desire to not make this game be simply a joke shows throughout the game. The farmer's voiceover has some genuinely unique and funny lines interspersed throughout the game, which work because the lines are not beaten to death in every level. As long as the developers stand by the good-hearted cow hate that is the root of this game, there's hope that this could turn into an indie cult classic in the future.

This game has set off on a mission: to spread the need to shoot cows whenever, wherever. It tries to achieve its goals through a game that has significant flaws. Should the developers focus on the problems that plague the core elements of the game, then this title will definitely deserve a second look. As of now, however, there is no way anyone would feel satisfied paying full price for this game. Save up for a sale, perhaps gift this to a friend in jest. Just...beware the cows. [i]The Culling of the Cows[/i] gets a D.

The Culling Of The Cows é um jogo divertido que não te prende por muitas horas, porém valoriza bem o tempo gasto.
Você é um velho fazendeiro que precisa atirar em vacas endemoniadas que gritam de forma bizarra quando morrem, além de hippies e góticas e naves espaciais de ETs nazistas. Precisa de mais algo? 

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198099645157', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1419918197}
review:
The Culling of the Cows es un juego que consiste en defender tu granero de vacas zombies, es un juego sencillo pero es bastante entretenido, acabar con asaltos de zombies y vacas solamente con tu escopeta y algunas ayudas que te ofrecen.
También puedes mejorar tu arma para que pueda recargar mejor o que tenga mira laser, y la dificultad está en los múltiples asaltos de diversas criaturas, y la desventaja es la recarga, que sólo es de uno en uno.

De verdad que divierte mucho este juego pero lo malo es su precio elevado para este tipo de juegos, pero sólo hay que esperar y comprarlo en descuento. ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197990564831', 'num_games_owned': 1256, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1415728222}
review:
The Culling of the Cows is an easy to pick up game that reminds you of flash games.

The game itself is quite mindless, but can be fun for an hour or two, note that you can finish it in 3 hours.
I wouldn't recommend buying it for the full price of 11€ as it's very short and rather repetitive through.

Nevertheless you can find familiar games on sites like kongregate or even games like this for mobile app, so spending your money on this can be a painful experience if you are not into small games like this.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986384496', 'num_games_owned': 301, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1417950997}
review:
_Обзор по сути является ответом на другой обзор, т.к. об этой игре особо нечего сказать.
_Игра сравнивается с Plants vs Zombies, что я считаю неуместный, т.к. та в разы лучше The Culling Of The Cows абсолютно всем. Есть правда урезанная версия Plants vs Zombies, в частности я такую знаю в Origin, полагаю, что порт с мобильных платформ (урезана графика, чуть контента), которую в сравнение не беру. 
_В мире игры происходит очередной зомби-апокалипсис. ГГ - фермер, а значит его данная вмемирная беда настигает немногим позже с соответствующими противниками для сельской местности. В основном противниками являются коровы с различными особенностями. Позже, видимо, из-за удаленности места действия, срези зомби масс появляются человеческие особи - соседи-фермеры, сельские забулдыги, игроки местной футбольной команды и... жирные готессы, напрочь бесполезные. 
_В противостоянии всему этому бестиарию главному герою будет помогать обязательная вещь для каждого фермера - двустволка. Двустволка имеет 4 вида патрона: обычный (самый слабый), дробь (можно убить до 3-х врагов или 1-го жирного за раз, если повезет), проникающий (убивает большую часть противников за раз, пробивает насквозь), разрывной (взрывается, убивает большую часть противников за раз, наносит урон всем рядом со взрывом). Я всю прошел игру с дробью - нет нужды целиться, покупать апгрейд на прицел (3 игровых бакса), меньше ходишь.
_Существую апгреды: емкость магазина, объем перезарядки, скорость стрельбы, прицел. О последнем я уже написал - бесполезная штука. 2-й полезнее всех - на макс. уровне перезаряжает всю начальну обойму. 3-й после 2-го, позволит отстреливаться от быстрых противников.
_Ко всему этому имеется неожиданная вещь - поддержка. А именно, наш герой фермер... стена огня, мясорубка на входе сарая, автоматическая турель на крыше, вертолет, бомбардировщик и ЯДЕРНАЯ бомба!

Мой товарищ упомянул об удобном управлении... Если он имел ввиду верную раскладку кнопок, то тут соглашусь. Много способов убить врагов и разнообразные уровни не особо помогают игре, подробнее в минусах п.2

А ТЕПЕРЬ О МИНУСАХ!
_Никакой сюжет!
_Монотонность! Если вам пофиг на внутриигровые достижения, то любой уровень (кроме отстрела из автомата) проходится так: дробь, ап 2, ап 2, ап 1, поддержка 1, поддержка 2, 3, 4, 1, 2... Отстрел одной большой волны так: зажимаем ЛКМ и водим мышкой по экрану, ожидая, пока к-во врагов опустится до 0.
_Так себе 2D-графика. 
_Очень так себе 2D-анимация (от FPS финального босса вообще волосы дыбом).
_Звуковое сопровождение приедается.
_Баг, когда противники убивают героя, если тот стоит выше линии атаки, с вороном 100% кирдык.

Отсутствие русского языка минусом не считаю, текста и речи тут практически нет. Спасибо, что достижения такие простые, я прошел игру за 1,4 часа, показалось, что вечность. Игра на один раз. Если ищите во что поиграть, то смело проходите мимо. Иное дело, если она вам досталась даром, и вы хотите получить с нее карточки.
Итого 3 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129642943', 'num_games_owned': 1369, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1428574515}
review:
Un giochino d'azione davvero assurdo nell'idea di base. Il giocatore dovrà superare i livelli sparando a mucche, zombie, giocatori di baseball (?) e tanti altri nemici che incontrerà man mano. Nonostante la semplicità con cui questo titolo è realizzato, The Culling Of The Cows è davvero divertente. Perfetto, come si suol dire, per ammazzare il tempo.

Voto: 6.5

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1419089844}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Игра про старого бородатого фермера который решил защитить свое ранчо от нападающих коров мутантов, зомби и инопланетян. Игровой процесс представляет из себя защиту базы при надвигающихся волнами толпах монстров (Если сравнивать с другими играми то похоже на Plants vs Zombies только без строительства и игрой за одного героя. На телефонах подобных игр тысячи)

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
¥ Удобное управление.
¥ Много способов убить врагов.
¥ В игре есть разные уровни в которых задача защиты базы строится по разному (например на одной карте нам надо отразить огромную волну имея только одну жизнь, на другой карте палить из пулемета бесконечными патронами, в третей же просто встречать волны врагов)

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
¥ Музыкальное сопровождение подкачало.
¥ Нельзя изменить разрешение экрана.
¥ Нет русского языка.
¥ Нет сюжета.
¥ Достижения сделаны ужасно. Как будто их просто вкинули чтобы были и все. Три достижения мы получаем на первом-втором уровне. Последнее четвертое на последнем уровне. А ведь тут есть где с ними разогнаться (взять хотя бы задачи которые есть в игре по убийству без промахов и тп)

[h1]Советы:[/h1]
¥ Когда начинается уровень и идет отсчет времени, скидывайте сразу посылку с неба, если в ней нет денег делайте рестарт. Когда падают деньги уровень будет пройти намного и намного легче.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Зашел в игру на 5 минут, в итоге увлекло на 4 часа. Игра неплохая и пройдена была с удовольствием. Рекомендую покупать исключительно по скидкам.

[h1]Оценка: 6/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025674597', 'num_games_owned': 2061, 'num_reviews': 607, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1418253621}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows is a short game, in which you play as a farmer during a zombie apocalypse, only that, instead of human zombies (well, there are some of them), there are cow zombies. Armed only with a shotgun, you must defend your barn from these zombies.

Even though you have a single weapon through most of the game (the aforementioned shotgun), there's two extra weapons that appear in specific levels: a machine gun, and a rocket launcher. Even then, the shotgun can use four different types of ammo, and there's several upgrades for it, that make it even better at killing stuff. You can also get supply drops (like extra cash for upgrading your weapon, invincibility, etc), and use different abilities to kill the zombies, like providing your barn with a machine gun, or a saw, sending a nuke, etc.

Even though the idea of shooting cows might sound dull at first, there's a good variety of enemies: different types of cows (even cows strapped with TNT, helpful for blowing up nearby cows!), and, as already mentioned, a few human enemies. There's also crows falling from the sky.

As far as gameplay goes, all the levels consist of you defending your barn against waves of enemies (or against a single, large wave), with a few changes: in most of the levels, you're in front of your barn, and the cows can kill you, while in a few "Onslaught" levels, you shoot the cows from the safety of your barn's second floor.

Nice game, once you get the hang of it. I recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077118604', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1418170186}
review:
｢Perfect Game Achievements｣ 
Cara... Que jogo divertido sahshahsaha bem melhor que muito jogo de zombie por ai (DayZ) SHAHSHASHAH
o jogo é meio que um "Plants vs Zombie", é bem legalzinho. Pra falar a verdade ele foi tudo aquilo que eu não imaginava, pensei que iria ser mais um daqueles jogos horriveis por ser de 'graça'. Ele tbm é bem difícil, mds. Faz tanto tempo que não tinha jogado um jogo tão difícil (pra mim, é claro). Enfim, o jogo é muito bom, dá pra você jogar quando não tive nada pra fazer. os gráficos... Não,não vamos falar de gráficos em um jogo como esse, né ?!
Você tem que ser muito rápido e pra matar as vacas zombie,humanos zombie, um bixo lá que não sei que diabos é aquilo e por fim mais não menos importante... Um Nazista ET dentro de uma nave espacial. Vale muito a pena comprar, se você não tive pego de graça...

Jogabilidade: 8/10 (estou dando essa nota pq eu ainda estou 'bad' pela quantidade de vez que eu morri u_u)
Dificuldade: '-' Acho que eu morri umas 200 vezes
Gráficos: 10/10 (Por quê sim!!)

Acho que é só isso mesmo. Ahh... Sempre pegue o Update da Arma 6, é a melhor. "NUMLOCK 6" xal..

author: {'steamid': '76561198026633656', 'num_games_owned': 1093, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1418163313}
review: I was a bit hesitant at first to start this game up after reading some of the reviews about it, but I'm glad that I decided to play it since I really enjoyed it. It's a pretty short game, you'll easily play through it all in a couple of hours and it doesn't require much thought. But it's a nice and fun gameplay and in an arcade style setting. I wouldn't buy it all full price though due to it's low content, but if you get the chance to pick it up chep or in a bundle then I'd say go for it. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198115265587', 'num_games_owned': 1323, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1418020756}
review:
这是一个农夫用绳命打牛和僵尸来守卫他的粮仓的游戏！
类似于植物大战僵尸，但是这个要刺激血腥的多！BGM也很带感！画面偏像素风了一点！
我一开始是拿键盘玩了几把，可惜基本都是跪T_T！因为要按的键比较多，手残操作不来！
前几天看了一下商店页面发现是支持控制器的，于是立马接上手柄一战，果然爽起来了~

不同牛速度的速度和跑步路线不一样啊，教练！不多玩几把，真的很难打中！记得买激光瞄准啊~
一边按RT打枪，一边还要按X装子弹啊！按LT还能向背后的，已经冲向粮仓的牛开枪也是炫酷的不行~
你还能用用LB，RB来选择枪支类型，装备，以及支援，真的很考验手速啊有木有！当然这需要积累$！
玩的时候自动机枪的CD好了就用一下吧，防止你没注意被牛冲了分尸了，分尸的画面真的好惨T_T！

之前玩这个游戏的时候成就有BUG，是另外两种枪的使用，成就总是就解锁不了。
结果一直没解决，导致最后作者直接删了成就，所以你现在只能看见使用散弹枪成就了。不过也能让全成就更加简单。

要说优点嘛！喜+1，有卡，有成就，也比较耐玩（话说我还掉了一张闪卡），成就也不坑爹，而且画风音轨很符合设定。
要说缺点嘛！就是游戏的 x 轴速度设置太快了一点，导致牛跑的有点快，每条牛的跑道也不分明，很难判定子弹射出轨道。

如果对这种类塔防游戏感兴趣，建议花几个小时可以玩玩，不过玩家最好有耐心一点，不然绝对会抓狂的！然后来骂什么破游戏！！！还有就是，一次也别玩太久，不然过不去一些关卡真的会怒删游戏的，不过游戏也不是很大，大不了再下载呗！

进过不少慈善包了，所以不建议原件以及打折买！收包，或者散key就好了，不然就是浪费钱！任性的就算了~

review:
No Brasil existem mais bovinos que habitantes, e embora seja uma proposta aterrorizante neste contexto, o jogo acaba sendo um pouco repetitivo, seu objetivo é sobreviver waves de zumbis e proteger teu celeiro. Existe uma lista de jogos em flash disponíveis grátis com este formato que são mais divertidos e recomendaria numa boa.

Rejogabilidade(vontade de jogar de novo): Não
Diversão: Sim
Recomendaria para um amigo: Somente se ele tiver gosto para esse tipo de game, e disposto a gastar uma grana.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982504799', 'num_games_owned': 4250, 'num_reviews': 2871, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1416123057}
review:
Простенькая, но весьма доставляющая по уровню угара аркада.
Есть у меня подозрения что разрабы создали её напившись муншайна (Moonshine - дословно "лунный свет", или самогонка по нашенски), где-то на юге США. Ну да ладно.
Играем мы за эдакого престарелого реднека, который защищает свои амбары, и пастбища от зомби-коров и просто зомби. Наступил зомби-апокалипсис? Люди пытаются выбраться из зараженной местности? Военные защищают свои территории от кровожадных монстров? Оставьте это для Dead Island, настоящему американскому деревенщине на это положить. Главное что-бы ни одна сволочь не тронула [strike] родных скотов	 [/strike]... эээ, родные стада!
Прорисовка в игре вполне приятная, драйв довольно мощный, особенно на последних уровнях. А финальный босс, это апофеоз абстинентного синдрома программистов этой игры.
В целом все простенько: как итог я бы поставил 8 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081545589', 'num_games_owned': 109, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1417890801}
review: Haha esse jogo é muito da hora, gostei muito, o melhor jogo de Tower Defense 2D que eu já joguei, eu peguei ele de graça, mas quem tá querendo comprar não vale a pena pagar os R$ 26, é muito caro para um jogo que você finalizará em poucas horas, eu demorei 6 horas para zerar e olha que eu completei todos os Level Badges, mas caso tenha uma promoção que o jogo estiver bem baratinho, vale a pena.

review:
What a shame!
無料で頂いたものだから気軽にプレイしてみたものの本来の価格設定を見てびっくり。
この価格では到底おすすめする事は出来ません。
淡々と右から迫り来るゾンビ牛をショットする防衛アクションゲームですが
大半の死亡原因は軸がずれてた事によるミスショットでの体当たり死。
プレイヤーの体力という概念は無くワンミスでゲームオーバーとなります。
WAVE単位で進むエリアでは最初のWAVEからやり直し。
シビアな軸ずれからの凡ミスやり直しは結構辛い。
装備切り替えやアップグレード、ショットにリロードとボタン周りはかなり忙しい。
あらゆる点において未消化といった印象を受けました。

細部をしっかりと煮詰めれば光るものも出てくるような可能性は感じただけに
残念としか言いようがありません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198082983415', 'num_games_owned': 276, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 1014, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 739, 'last_played': 1489559765}
review:
一个关于农夫保卫农场拿起他的猎枪（亦或者是霰弹枪？）阻止僵尸牛进攻的游戏...
没有剧情，有的只是PVZ般的防御阵式，而且牛还会动!，给瞄准带来一定的难度...
游戏有四种弹头和四种技能，对应弹匣弹量，一次可填装的子弹数（1,2,4,7增加..),连射以及激光导引..
这里推荐游戏的时候使用6号弹头，可以打三行的僵尸牛，很划算
另外还有自动机枪，直升机支援，轰炸机，火墙，核弹等等乱七八糟的支援类技能，听起来很多对吧
但是用来用去只有自动机枪最好用
游戏的音效，画面什么的比较成功的塑造了一个僵尸（牛）横行的末日世界...
但是我6号弹头+自动机枪杀得对面牛仰牛翻的.....后面基本就杀麻木了....
最后居然出现了纳粹飞碟..最搞笑的是我好不容易防御了三波进攻之后，准备给飞碟最后一击的时候...
新手指导时候的上帝之手一指头点死了飞碟.....（.......）
咳咳，剧透完毕，该说说游戏性了
本身还是有点难度的（难道我不会玩？）
但是我一个6号弹头+自动机枪制霸全图是怎么回事...
而且建议一天只玩几关.....玩多了会产生轻微不适...，反正大家的游戏库里面游戏比较多，我想偶尔玩玩也是不错的
最后，有卡，全成就也很好拿，试着玩一下吧（我反正未来可能还会玩一次的...扶额）

7/10

review:
The Culling of Cows is a rather amusing tower defense game that puts a bit more action into the genre. Moving the main character and personally putting down the undead makes the game stand out among the crowd. However, a poor presentation combined with an overall lack of content makes this a hard game to recommend.

Game: 5.5/10
Graphic: 6.5/10

[b]100% Achievement :[/b] [strike]Easy[/strike] | Medium | Hard | Very Hard

author: {'steamid': '76561198089299679', 'num_games_owned': 7216, 'num_reviews': 392, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1417160169}
review:
ok.. i give this game a score of 51 out of 100. 

It's just good enough for me to give it a thumbs up instead of down. 

The concept is interesting. Graphic is basic. Music is ok. Level is moderately hard. 

My only problem is the game is way to repetitive. I was planning to play a full 3 hours and complete this game but just past the first hour i am getting really sleepy playing this even though i need to pay attention to stay alive and kill cows. 

I believe the level amount should be cut to around half or one third with each level have different insteresting to unlock.
Such as level 1 unlock explosive ammo. level 2 unlock cartage size. level 3 unlock famrer speed. each level you still have to pay to buy ablility everything but with more ability each level it give people more interest to try it out.

I seee promise in this game consider the buget but it could have been improved much more.

psst... just killed the UFO. the boss fight is pretty good wish there are more than 2 boss though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101887130', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1418177460}
review:
At the time of this post (November 25, 2014), there's a 250,000 steam key giveaway still going on that opened on November 9th, 2014 that VG247's website shared. You can find it here: http://www.vg247.com/2014/11/09/free-250000-steam-keys-giveaway
==============================

Culling of the Cows is a 2D sidescrolling Tower of Defense shooter where your job is to fight against zombie cows, bear/badger hybrid thingies and a Nazi UFO.

Other than the occasional assist and being able to buy upgrades that you can earn by killing the zombie animal apocalypse, that's pretty much all you need to know.

The game is mildly enjoyable for a bit, and then quickly gets repetitive afterwards.

There are better tower defense games out there that definitely grab your attention better, and you can play a few out there that are free than buying this game (assuming you don't plan to take advantage of the link above or the link expired by the time you've read this review).

But that doesn't mean this game doesn't hold its own merit either.

Culling of the Cows can definitely be fun for a good portion of tower defense fans, and can probably get a kick out of playing your stereotypical redneck that lost his mind, possibly due to getting probed or losing his mind by wearing foil in the sun to communicate with the "Greenies."

The only thing that stops me from recommending it to people is its price tag. At the time of this post, it's $12.99. I don't know about you, but holy shit that's too much for a game like this.

I'm not sure how long the giveaway will last, but you're better off getting this for free right now. Otherwise, skip this game until it gets a huge price chop.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063990605', 'num_games_owned': 3313, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1416844500}
review:
Seguinte... o jogo é bem bacaninha e curto, ele se baseia em ondas de vacas zumbis e zumbis humano que tentam passar pela sua propriedade e entrar na sua fazenda, seu objetivo é matar todos sem deixa-los passar ou matar a você.
O jogo tem um gráfico 2D bem simples.
Ele não tem nada de especial para ser sincero, é só um velho fazendeiro com uma shotgun que tem 4 tipos diferentes de munição e 4 tipos diferentes de upgrades que podem ser evoluídas e só!
Mas porque estou recomendando positivamente?
Bom... eu ganhei ele de graça e ele é divertidinho sim, mas zerei ele em 2 horas, e vamos ser francos, R$ 25,99 para 2 horas de jogo vale a pena? não!
Por isso APENAS compre-o se ele estiver quase de graça, ou vai ser um dinheiro desperdiçado a toa, valor muito alto para um jogo tão simples.
Mas como falei... Estou recomendando porque ele é divertido e é fácil de conseguir 100% das conquistas(para quem é Achievement Hunter)

author: {'steamid': '76561198010240265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1417446528}
review:
Геноцид корів-зомбі. До пори до часу - веселий і динамічний. Із гарним візуальним стилем і непоганим гумором.

Щоправда, за раунди, в яких сидиш на даху стайні і наводиш на ворогів приціл - хочеться повідбивати комусь руки. Їх проходити дуже складно, особливо на геймпаді.

Хотілося б, аби було трохи більше вдосконалень зброї. Ну і можливість грати бодай у двох за одним компютером - теж, здається, напрошується сама собою. Принаймні за такі, доволі немалі гроші.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042119011', 'num_games_owned': 953, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1527293354}
review:
Outro jogo que ganhei a key, mas da qual valeu muito a pena... jogo muito divertido e extremamente dificil, baseado em hordas de inimigos zumbis que voce "fazendeiro" tem que defender do seu curral com as mais loucas armas e tipos de assistencia que o game oferece, não sei porque é sempre divertido acabar com os zumbis, é uma formula que sempre deu certo e não é diferente aqui nesse jogo, hehe!
Tem um bom toque de humor nisso tudo, e não tem como não deixar de lembrar de plants Vs Zombies e todos os outros jogos que vieram depois dele nesse estilo...

The Culling Of The Cows é mais um desses que continuam fazendo justiça ao nome!

author: {'steamid': '76561198041697487', 'num_games_owned': 2099, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1416774571}
review: Хороший подход с созданию сеттинга, хорошая попытка создать относительно реалистичную модель зомби-апокалипсиса и развитие визуального стиля. И абсолютная неспособность рассказать насколько-нибудь интересую историю в созданном мире. Что было бы намного интереснее и непредсказуемей. Иначе мол засмеют, будет казаться, что они не пытались что-то такое клевое придумать. Нет никаких попыток добавить в мир живости — никакого выживания, никаких нападений, строго инкаутеры и чекпоинты. Для добавления большей бессмысленности и несостоятельности экш- составляющей не хватает только таблички с рангом прохождения схватки — А, Б или С. Не для того медиа взращивала в людях культ зомби-апокалипсиса. Не для того, что бы “лучшая игра кайнозойской эры” наплевательски отнеслась ко всем законам, традициям зомби-сеттинга в угоду игровым условностям, слезам душевно нестабильных геймеров и сборам.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060615441', 'num_games_owned': 674, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1431092986}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows is a 2D Shooter with a Side Scrolling Combat, As an old farmer, you must protect your barn from Zombie Cows and whatever that tries to pass through you. as your partner you've got a badass gun that you can upgrade the power over time, some awesome special supports also a Supply pack to give you a hand to defeat those Zombies Cows and a badass Nazi Ufo.

[b]Pros:[/b]

+Very Fun and addictive game
+Nice visual graphic
+Simple Controls
+Nice Combat System
+Challenging Game
+Enjoyable

[b]Cons:[/b]

- HitBox is kinda messed up I'd say
- The game is kinda short
- only few achievements, (Would be fantastic if this game had some more achievements, just to increase the challenge)
- No Co-op (A Multi-Player mode would make it really Fun to play with friends )
- High Price (I'd recommend buy this game with +85% OFF)

I had this game for free and i really appreciate it and i would recommend buy this one in a steam sale when you can get a +85% OFF it would be a fair enough price !!! 
[spoiler] I wouldn't recommend for my indian friends, that could be offensive or something :( [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198040884867', 'num_games_owned': 2433, 'num_reviews': 901, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1441562074}
review:
Yeah ok this is bad. I mean I paid under $2 and I am actually a littled peeved because this should totally just be a free flash game. $12.99?? Are you kidding me? 

Graphics are meh, sound is bad (voices must have been recorded on a laptop or similiar), and music is really generic. I was hoping for a dumbed down version of PvZ, but nope, nothing even remotely close. Sloppy controls and an non-intuitive interface result in mostly frustrating gameplay. Even when it is not frustrating, it is boring. I played it with a controller BTW. 

Nothing fun at all here for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968166365', 'num_games_owned': 3422, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1425519020}
review:
ต้องบอกว่าเป็นเกมอินดี้ที่ออกทะลุแนว ที่เป็นแบบ 2D Sidescroll ยิงปืนใส่วัวบ้าที่จะพุ่งมากินคุณ
ถ้าซื้อตอนราคาเต็มนี่คงคลั่งเป็นแน่แท้ แต่ถ้าได้มาฟรีจาก Bundle หรือตอนลดเหลือแค่ $1-$2 นี่ยังพอทำเนาได้บ้าง
ความสนุก กับความท้าทายของ Challenge แต่ละด่านนั้นก็ดีเลย
ความน่าเล่นของ Graphic มันบั่นทอน แต่ความสนุกมันเกื้อกูล

โดยรวมให้แต้มคงเป็น 6/10 ไว้แก้เซง

author: {'steamid': '76561198020385919', 'num_games_owned': 1478, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1422085390}
review:
Bom...esse jogo é...BIZARRO apenas digo isso,vc vai sentir que ele é:uma merda,foda,engraçado de mais,uma merda de novo,e desafiador.
eu peguei ele free e dei uma tentativa ,realmente para passar o tempo,ou nao ter oq jogar,The Culling Of The Cows se torna um jogo totalmente otimo.
Matar  vacas zumbis,proteger sua fazenda,e destruir uma nave nazista com milhoes e milhoes de waves?...HORAS BOLAS VAMOS NESSA!!
Nao tenho muito oq falar,é uma experiencia meio unica,recomendo ele para vc jogar?mais ou menos é um bom passatempo,vai deixar vc todo empolgado e tals?nheee nao nem um poco,se puder pegar ele free vale bem a pena vc vai se divertir e rir,mas nao pague por isso,acho que nao vale a pena.

4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198138039688', 'num_games_owned': 195, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1416453331}
review:
Great game, like killing all the zombie cows, pretty fun to play.

Pros:
1. Zombies
2. Cows
3. Now combine them
4. now shoot them up xD
5.UFOs and shit, naice.
6. Got it for free

Cons:
1. Bad voice/music
2. Hitbox is not really there, just sometime comes :v
3. Starting over is pretty bad, won't have fun when you start dying
4. Controls are pretty messed up
5. you can get 80% achievements while playing the first 3 levels lol
6. Some parts of the interface looks like shit
7. There should be a number countdown timer or something, this timer feels random.
8. Waves after waves of cows, tutorial doesn't help you much really

Flash based or not, the idea is cool, its kinda fun, but not that type of fun where you can play it for hours

Should you buy this? - I don't think you should
Should you play this if you get it for free like me - Yeah you should try it out

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198141499183', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 181, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1418380866}
review:
８５％ＯＦＦで購入。
紹介ムービー通りのゲームです。それ以上でもそれ以下でもありません。
タグにタワーディフェンスとありますが、
一般的なＴＤにあるような、プレイヤーが設置して自動で攻撃してくれるタワーはないので、
これタワーディフェンスか？という感じです。

基本的にはジジイのショットガンがメインですが、
セントリーガンや攻撃ヘリなどの支援攻撃が性能が良く、しかもリチャージ速度も速いので、
ミッションによっては支援攻撃を回すだけで、ほぼ片が付いてしまいます。

ここで敵のウェイブを凌ぎ切って・・・みたいなメリハリがなく、単調なので、
飽きる人はすぐに飽きてしまうと思います。
１３００円はちょっと高いかも。セールで５００円以下なら時間潰しとしておすすめできます。

author: {'steamid': '76561197972799416', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1639939846}
review:
Redneck Sammy's farm is being invaded by nasty critters. You will need to massacre wave after wave of uglies. Other than your boomstick and some upgrades, you can call in assistance (machine guns, attack choppers, bombs, ...). The game is fairly easy and progresses quickly as more difficult opponents are put against you. However things get boring quickly as you will be doing the same thing over and over again: surviving waves of opponents thrown at you. This would have been a fairly enjoyable experience if it not were for the non reconfigurable qwerty keyboard controls. On an azerty keyboard this adds a lot of complexity and frustration.

Score: 3/10

Pro:
+ carnage!

Contra:
- can't configure keyboard controls

author: {'steamid': '76561198075998290', 'num_games_owned': 376, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1416168249}
review:
bedavaya gelmişti oyun oynayalım dedik kartlarına bir bakalım diye.

oyun kendi çapında belli nükteleri içeriyor. ama bir flash oyun sitesinde olabilecek kadar da düşük seviye bir oyun. genel olarak tekdüze bölümler. belli yerlerde sonlara doğru falan değişik aksiyonlar oluyor. bu kadar tekdüze yapıp oyunu atmak yerine bölümleri zenginleştirebilirlerdi gayet. flash oyundan bir farkı olurdu.

bu durumda değil 18 lira değil 3 lira değil 1 lira şahsen 25 kuruş bile verilmez ki bir ekmek parası. bu oyun için o kadar emek verilmemiş şahsen. bir iki kişilik bir ekip bile 1 hafta gibi sürede böyle bir flash tarzı oyunu çıkarabilir.

kısacası bu tür oyunu çıkartıp karttır achievementır carrtur curttur koymak abes. oyuna kötü de demiyorum kendi çağında eğlendiriyor ama flash oyun yani bu.

sonuç olarak tavsiye etmiyorum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051152053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1415838684}
review:
Culling of the Cows is a lot like liquorice: you either love it or hate it.

The game is a very simple, 2d classic arcade kind of game. The day I got it, me and my friend spent quite a while chilling and playing it, all the while laughing our heads off over the hilarious mistakes we made and the little funny things in the game and of course the absurdity of the concept of the game. This is a good thing mind you!!


Overall, I believe the game could use more dialogue, more plot would be an interesting addition that I wouldn't mind and it would be absolutely great if I could change the control mapping on the controller; as they aren't easy to use for the later levels at all. 

I would also recommend a multiplayer for this game, so something like an endless mode where you get highscores and can compete locally or online.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158894130', 'num_games_owned': 956, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1417525145}

review: 9$ Да вы наверное шутите?! Это игра уровня средней флэшки armorgames. Играя дедом с дробовиком цель защитить сарай от зомби коров. Единтсвенный плюс игры, которым многим покажется минусом - легкость зарабатывания 100% ачивок(просто прохождения игры будет достаточно). Игру покупать настоятельно не рекомендую, да даже если досталась бесплатно тратить время на нее не стоит.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031725194', 'num_games_owned': 1271, 'num_reviews': 309, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1416142435}
review:
The Culling of the Cows stands between Plants Versus Zombies (Or old farmer vs zombie cows -- and possibly nazi aliens) and a sidescrolling shooter.
   This is made by Decaying Logic, the same developers that brought us Radical Roach, which I reviewed a while ago (and was not impressed at all).

   While I believe this is definitely an improvement over Radical Roach, many of the same flaws and design choices are present in this game, just to a lesser extent. 


   As usual, I'll start with [b]presentation[/b].
   Not unlike their previous game, the [b]Artstyle[/b] is probably one of the defining points. While it feels like flash, the animations are pretty good, although a bit too limited (there is only one animation for each enemy, it seems, as well as the carcass sprite, which makes the field end up looking a bit too monotonous). 
   The interface templates don't really seem to fit the theme, but it's not too bad. Other visuals effects are also subpar, against the cartoony style they were mostly going for.
   There are a few different areas that slightly change the look of the map, but don't be fooled, as the map doesn't change at all, except for the visuals.
   One problem I've had with it, is that the dead bodies cover up the screen by the end of the levels, to the point that you can't see new enemies arrive very clearly. That should definitely be changed. Other than that, it's fine.

   The [b]Music[/b] is also very similar to Radical Roach. It's not awful, and it has some good moments, but it's very repetitive, and doesn't loop very well, which is unfortunate. It's upbeat, and a mixture between some rock/metal and electronic music which goes for the more arcade vibe than atmosphere. There are some old sci-fi melodies though, which is a nice addition. 
   One improvement that I want to stress is that the music no longer restarts whenever you fail a level! It's a weird aspect to consider, but I think it's very important. It didn't happen in RR, and it was really annoying to listen the song start over and over again. Now, it doesn't happen, and it's a subtle but important improvement, in my opinion!



   So, let's talk about the [b]Mechanics[/b].
   As I said, it's has a bit of PvZ in it. Essentially, you have a large lane to defend agains the zombies. There are no specific lanes as in PvZ, you can freely walk around, and so can the enemies. You have a shotgun, different ammo types, upgrades, and assists. You'll also, periodically, be able to call for a crate with a random power-up.
   Your job is to stop zombies from entering the barn, and also avoid being killed by them (if they hit you). Pretty straightforward.

   You have a world map with the levels spread around (unlocking more as you go) with a couple of spreading paths, somewhat like One Finger Death Punch, only much smaller. These levels include a few different modes. There's [b]Waves[/b], in which, well, you fight waves of enemies, and there's a limit number of zombies that can enter the barn; [b]Kill 'Em All[/b], in which there's only one long wave and you can't let any zombie pass; [b]Onslaught[/b], in which
some zombies can go through, but you have a machine gun (or a bazooka in one level) and shoot from the top of the barn, not worrying about dodging. And then, there's a couple of Boss levels.
   The first two play essentially the same, with the exception that you can a few seconds to "rest" between waves. It had very, very little to the overall experience, but hey.

   There's a significant number of different enemies, although a bunch of them are just faster or healthier versions of the previous. Still, it keeps the game interesting when starting out, since you need to change up your play a bit. Later on, new enemies stop coming, and every level becomes waay too similar (which is a feat in a 3 hour game).
   There are also 3 badges to unlock in most levels -- these make the game harder, but they're barely there to reward you. There are some not to let any zombies pass, or not to miss any shot, but the others are simply about not upgrading your weapon, not using assists, etc. These do NOT make the game more fun at all. On the contrary, you're just shooting yourselves on the foot by limiting variety. It would certainly add challenge, but it's not very interesting challenge, in my opinion. But they're all optional, so it's fine. If you're into that, it exists. Overall, I'd say rethink your design on that.

   Weapon upgrades are only on a level to level basis, and not persistent. You can increase the number of bullets, the number of bullets you reload at a time, add a laser to increase accuracy, or do something else that I'm not entirely sure of. I assumed it's reload speed. 
   Regarding ammo, you have Spread Shot, Explosive Shot, and Penetrating Shot. These do not stack, much to my disappointment. It could be really fun to have Spread Explosive Shots and just explode everything! But no... there are no synergies. If you purchase both, they'll alternate between them, from what I could tell.
   Assists go from a chainsaw in the barn entrance to an AirStrike, or an Auto Machine Gun, for a few seconds. There are more to these, and they have a cooldown associated. I didn't use any of them, most of the time, because they weren't needed, nor particularly fun to use. You just press the button, and have the game made easier... But it's good that it's there, there's certainly room for different playstyles! Maybe you'd prefer not to upgrade your weapon as much, and focus on "traps", that's totally fine!

   Ammo and Upgrades in-game cost money. And here's the big issue I have with it: You start each level with a certain amount. Then, by calling the random power-up, there's a chance you'll get a bit more, but it's generally not significant. So, you'll mostly upgrade your weapon at the start of the level, and then play with that. It's not dynamic at all, as every level played out pretty much the same to me. Sure, I could have forced myself to use different "loadouts", but the one I had worked for me, and the enemies didn't really require different tactics to be beaten. It would have been better to gain money over time, having waves get progressively more difficult, scaling with the upgrades you were able to buy!
   Pacing is pretty much unexistant, unfortunately.

   Well, maybe I'm being a bit too negative. The fact of the matter is that the game didn't do anything interesting to me. However, it was still somewhat fun for a bit. The kind of mindless fun you need to just pass time. You'll fight dozens of enemies per level, making each field become just a bunch of bloody cows on the ground. It's dumb, but it's somewhat enjoyable. Just not very interesting... Take One Finger Death Punch, for instance. That game is totally mindless fun! But it's far more interesting. First, it's very rhythmical, and you need to be in the "zone" to identify which enemies require which clicks to perfectly complete a level. And there are many different weapon that actually *feel* different, and make you look like a badass, cutting everyone up. I realize that these are two different games, but they both go for a similar feeling, that's why I'm bringing it up.

   One aspect I enjoyed quite a lot was the last Boss. That was a pretty fun fight. Even though it had no upgrades or anything, the 3 phases complemented each other pretty well, and while challenging, it didn't feel frustrating to me. It should have had a few more boss fights, would definitely make the game more interesting.

That's enough rambling. For the price, I can't recommend it at all. But if this seems appealing to you, give it a shot if the price drops. While I've beaten it in 3 hours, you can get a bit more out of it, if you go for the badges. And the developers seem to update the game from time to time, so it may get better. 
Overall, not awful, but not particularly good either.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105979486', 'num_games_owned': 727, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1416153727}
review:
[h1] Быть фермером - скучно [/h1]

Всё очень, очень, очень однообразно... А ведь поначалу эта "зомби-коровья ферма" казалась весьма забавной, но спустя буквально 5 уровней, от псевдо-веселья не осталось и следа. 

[*] [i] К [/i] ровище!! Пожалуй единственный плюс в игре - это трупы супостатов, остающихся покорно лежать на поле боя.

[*] [i] О [/i] днообразие уровней. Волна врагов за волной, ничем не отличающаяся от предыдушей волны. Даже попытки разбавить игру уровнями "оборона амбара со второго этажа" никак не спасает положение дел.

[*] [i] Р [/i] азнообразие арсенала сведена к минимуму, хотя на мой взгляд в игре присутствует одна весьма имбовая пушка.

[*] [i] О [/i] чень скудная классификация врагов, которые по большому счёту отличаются только скоростью передвижения и живучестью.

[*] [i] В [/i] есьма неплохая графическая составляющая. Приятные "задники", но их к сожалению также можно пересчитать по пальцам одной руки.

[*] [i] А [/i] бсолютно бестолковый, дурацкий, унылый финальный БОСС. А также присутствие совершенно бесполезных бонусов.

[h1] P.S. [/h1] "The Culling Of The Cows" досталась мне за даром, т.е. бесплатно. Покупать же игру вообще за какие-либо деньги я не посоветую никому. 

[i] Моя оценка: 4.7 из 10 [/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198060041941', 'num_games_owned': 1091, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1416131413}
review: Oyunu para ile almadım. Açıkcası oyunu oynamak gibi bir niyetim de yoktu. Amaç kolleksiyon kartlarını alıb satmaktı. Oyunu yükledikten sonra kartları vermesi için oyuna girdim ve oyunu bir test ediyim dedim. Oyunun başarımları çok kolay bide beni çoçukluğuma götürdü. Hani ilk sinifların bilgisayar derslerınde flash oyunları oynardık ya :) Dedim ulan ben bu oyunu bitiririm. Zaten 1.5 saate oyun biter. Ben 3 saat oynadım ama 1.5 saatı kartlar için girib uni ye gittiyim zaman :D Yani oyun güzel bazen sıkıyor ama en iyi oyunlar bile bazen sıka biliyor insanı.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077628582', 'num_games_owned': 1719, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1416106067}
review:
This is not worth a purchase, and if, like me, you got this for free, I'll give you a guide if you want to give it a quick two hour playthrough for cards and achievements and then uninstall it.

Buy buckshot (6), reload speed(x), then whatever else you want because that's all you need. Use assists when you want because they'll last about 50% of their cooldown so spamming them works and lets nothing past.

It's bad for so many reasons, terrible hitboxes, difficulty decreases as you progress, general overpoweredness of the player, incredibly repetitive. The music and voice acting aren't terrible but get really repetitive and the rest of the sound is an auditory nightmare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011744879', 'num_games_owned': 363, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1415998819}
review: The Culling Of The Cows чем-то напоминает старые flash-игры: то ли оголтелой примитивностью геймплея, то ли анимацией и дизайном, хотя скорее всего, и тем и другим. В какой-то момент мне вспомнилась Crazy Shuttle, несмотря на то, что смыслы игр заметно различаются. И даже на фоне настоящей цены в $9 недавняя раздача игры не выглядит как приятный подарок, потому что циклично отстреливать коров на протяжении часа-двух вообще не стоит никаких денег. Ведь это настолько легко, что если вы просто закроете глаза и представите, как дед палит из двустволки по зомби-коровам, вы получите не меньше удовольствия и сложность будет та же. Зато деньги сэкономите, если не успели обзавестись бесплатно.

review:
Liked it. For me, is the classic stereotype of a simple indie game. Gameplay is pretty simple (normal in this kind of games) and remind me some games i played in Internet before.  Music combines well so its was good. Personally, i liked character design because it combines well with gameplay.

Definitely, not a Master Piece, but a good game for which it wants.

Overall, good, funny and, again, simple. 7,5/10

P.S: liked  the TLotR references.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079877212', 'num_games_owned': 670, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1415851177}
review:
[h1]Лирическое отступление[/h1]
Все боевые вирусы (включая зомби вирус) испытываются в лабораториях на животных. В основном свиньи и собаки.

[h1]Сюжет просто как 3 рубля[/h1]
Вы владелец фермы, и в один из дней, выяснили, что милые дядечьки и тетечки, взявшие ваш коровник в аренду, на самом деле ученые из ЦРУ, работающие над зомби вирусом. 
Плохие новости: Вирус этот вырвался наружу и заразил всех... ваших коров (! наверное авторы игры сочли это оригинальным). Вы последняя линия обороны ваших амбаров. За вами остальной мир... Все коровы мира.
Хорошая новость: У вас есть дробовик и голос с неба, готовый продать вам патроны к нему. (Мы все помним, кто на небе и какой он национальности...)

[h1]Выводы и рекомендации[/h1]
Ну собственно... как бы помягче то это сказать... Играть можно нюхнув кислорода. С момента как пробьет на "хихи", игра становится экшеном. Особо одаренные любители кислорода, смогут даже стелсит (:

Серьезно. Мини инди недоплатформер убивалка рабочего времени бессмысленным занятием.

[u]Покупать со скидкой в 99%.[/u]

Моя оценка: [b]3[/b] из [b]10[/b]

review: Arkadaşlar oyunu kesinlikle tavsiye ederim yalnız şuan fiyatına 21 TL Diyor değmez. İndirim gibi birşeyde 5 lira gibiye alınabilecek flash oyun tarzında bir oyun. Böyle şeyleri sevenlere çok eylenceli :) Olayı anlatmak gerekirse. Oyunda karşıda zombiler, zombi hayvanatlar, ufolar var bunları yenerek çifliğinizi temizlemeye çalışıyorsunuz her oyun başınca belli bir para veriyor bu parayı o el içinde artırıp harcıyabilrisiniz bitince el sıfırlanıyor para.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987596512', 'num_games_owned': 3333, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1415803906}
review:
Pois é gente, e não é que o jogo é legal? Quebrei minha cara '-'

Estavam dando o jogo de graça e eu nem ia pegar mas por fim decidi pegar
Instalei o jogo só para pegar os cards e fui jogar só para ver e então só parei quando zerei

O jogo é bem simples, você faz alguns updates na arma bem básico e chama por reforços a cada partida
mata todas as vacas zumbis e assim vai, até que no fim derrota o inimigo alienígena com ajuda da mão divina

Para quem quer passar o tempo, quer um jogo casual, esse jogo das vaquinha é uma boa dica
E para quem quer upar na Steam os cards custam em torno de 10 centavos *-*

Vamos todos para o matadouro?! =D

author: {'steamid': '76561198052748802', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1527364333}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows - วัวบ้าสะท้านโลก

เกมไม่มีอะไรมากแค่ยิงวัวติดเชื้อที่จะมาเป็น Wave เป็นชุด ๆ ไป แต่ในความที่ไม่มีอะไรนี่แหละทำให้เกมนี้แลดูสนุกพิลึก เพราะไม่ใช่ว่าคุณจะสาดกระสุนใส่วัวบ้าเหล่านี้ได้แบบไม่จำกัด (ไม่แน่ใจว่าไปเรื่อย ๆ จะมีศัตรูใหม่มาเพิ่มไหม) เพราะคุณจะมีกระสุนจำกัดที่เมื่อยิงแล้วต้องทำการ Reload และศัตรูวัวบ้านั้น จะมีหลากหลายประเภทตั้งแต่ประเภทเฉื่อยชาชันซัลโวถึงตัวในไม่กี่วิ ซึ่งหากจัดสรรกระสุนในตัวไม่ทันล่ะก็มีตายอนาถแน่นอน

สรุปแล้วให้ 8/10 แล้วกัน

author: {'steamid': '76561198013271357', 'num_games_owned': 623, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1415711354}
review: Gra dosyć trudna w późniejszych etapach. Ma dosyć specyficzny humor. Dropią karty co jest dużą zaletą przynajmniej dla mnie. Nie jest to nic wspaniałego ale gdy macie grę za darmo lub w bundlu to warto się nią zainteresować. Jednak gdybyś chciał ją kupić w sklpie steam za WOW 11Eur to odradzam nie jest tyle warta, podobne gry można znaleśc w przeglądarce za darmo. Pozytywna ocena wynika z faktu iż grę dostałem za darmo, gdybym ją kupił ocena byłaby negatywna, ponieważ tak jak napisałem powyżej nie jest warta swej ceny. Pozdrawiam ~KamilBerys

author: {'steamid': '76561198030518958', 'num_games_owned': 437, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1415710840}
review:
Прошел игру игру и решил написать отзыв :)

Игра очень веселая . Главный герой-это харизматичный сельский дедок,который будь убивать зомби-коров ;) Да,звучит слегка странно,по поверьте,когда вы начнете,вам будет трудно остановиться. Также в игре есть и простые зомби,а еще,там есть выдра.
Честно говоря,когда я проходил игру я просто рыдал от того,что кончаются патроны а на тебя летит бык и сносит тебя на последней волне. Я перепроходил и снова рыдал,но потом собирался с силами и проходил. В начале вам будет трудно,ну а потом все становится легко.
В этой игре меня бесили лишь изумрудные быки и если вы начнете играть,вы поймете,почему :)
Я прошел игру за 2 с лишним часа и игра мне понравилась :)

В игре у вас будет несколько функций,которые заметно упростят прохождение. Это 4 вида патронов,4 вида помощи вам,ящик с рандомным скиллом/модификацией на дробовик и собственно его прокачка,там тоже 4 вида (размер магазина,количество патронов,которые мы засунем за раз (сначала один,потом 2,3,4 и 5.Советую максовать именно эту модификаицю и первую),скорость выстрела и лазер).

В игре присутсвует несколько красивых локаций,на которых нам нужно будет уничтожать коров .
Мне очень понравилась функции выстрела через плечо.Это действительно круто и полезно,особенно в тот момент,когда бык вас обогнал и вот уже почти зашел в амбар,но не тут-то было. Дедок умело стреляет через свою голову и убивает его :)
Единственный минус,так эта цена.Советую покупать эту игру только по скидке.

В общем,игра очень интересная и может увлечь вас на пару часов,моя оцена 7/10,так как я никогда не играл в такие веселые игры :D
Надеюсь,мой отзыв оказался полезным :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198032273592', 'num_games_owned': 581, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1591163025}
review:
The game is simple, and rather crazy.  It is also a lot of fun.  You play an old, schizophrenic farmer during a zombie apocalypse, which spreads to both cows and hippies, and you have to hold them off with nothing but your old shotgun.  And maybe some help from above.  And a barn door that turns into a chainsaw.  And so on. 

The game is not worth $13 though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993900804', 'num_games_owned': 992, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1415691194}
review:
The good:

Almost original spin on zombie theme, but not really

The bad:

Aweful music
Terrible hit-detection
Feels really dated even though its released in 2014
Difficult to play if you have more than one screen plugged in due to invisible mouse and no gamelocking will tab down the game (would just be a minor annoyance if the game would pause when that happened)

Conclusion:

I did not enjoy this game due to reasons stated above.

I am glad i got a free key for this since 11€ is a really high price for a game
that feels like close to no effort was put into.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027251359', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1415640848}
review:
Ich will es kurz halten, mit einer durchdachten Reihenfolge, da es hierbei nicht viel zu erzählen gibt:
- Ein Defense Spiel, Level für Level, haltet die heranstürmende Horde mit eurer Shotgun auf!
- Nur 5 Errungenschaften, bei der letzten muss der Endboss besiegt werden!
- Der Endboss befindet sich ganz rechts auf der Karte, es ist nicht nötig alle Level durchzuspielen.
- Der Schwierigkeitsgrad steigt, ohne das Frust aufkommt oder Spielspaß verloren geht.
- Es ist möglich mit einer Spielzeit von ca. 1 Stunde ALLE Errungenschaften zu erreichen!
(- Realistisch sind bis zu 2h: paar Level mehr gespielt als nötig, die Level nicht immer beim ersten Anlauf geschaft und der ein oder andere Anlauf mehr beim Endboss!)

---> Wer gerne Errungenschaften sammelt wird hier auf seine Kosten kommen!

---> Der Preis von 11€ ist eindeutig überzogen! Beobachtetet lieber Steam Bundle Aktionen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055169002', 'num_games_owned': 289, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1415586707}
review: Me divertí bastante matando vacas, pensé que perdería mi tiempo con un juego tan corto y no conocido (por lo menos por mi), pero la verdad es que es muy entretenido y hasta difícil, fueron dos horas llenas de ordas de vacas zombies que no me aburrieron y un final inesperado, es un muy buen juego, recomendado para todo aquel que busque completar todos los logros de un juego en tan poco tiempo.

review:
Way too expensive for what is just a flash sidescroller. Got it for free, but really not worth playing.
That said, I did finish it, even though it wasn't really enjoyable. The controls are lazy, there are glitches in the game, some levels are particularly poorly designed. The sound effects, music, and voice commentary are annoying, and you have to disable them every time you open the game.

review:
I got this for free and I feel like I paid too much.
Also, seriously, who would pay $12.99 for this... Thing?

author: {'steamid': '76561198092665992', 'num_games_owned': 830, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1415657624}
review:
I would recommend this game for 3$ only, there are way much more better games for 12.99$. I got it for free so I'm not complaining, It's a bit fun game that kept me busy for almost 3 hours.

Good:
- Zombies!
- Gore!
- Awesome funny powerups
- A bit funny

Bad:
- Unforgiving... one fail and you die and start over! And the hit collider isn't making it any easier. Especialy in the last level, you shoot at a cow in front of you but the bullet doesn't hit the cow... then the cow kills you and you start the whole level again, the last boss needs 20 bullets to die but you have to start all over just cause you failed to hit the cow in the invisible small collider!!
- Repetitive.
- No permanent upgrades to buy??!
- Doesn't explain what upgrades do... you have to guess

Overall: 6/10. I repeat... DO NOT BUY IT FOR 12.99$! THAT'S A REDICULOUS PRICE FOR THIS GAME!

author: {'steamid': '76561198117014966', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 476, 'last_played': 1429962336}
review:
Vaši farmu napadli šílené zombie krávy a vy je musíte do jedné povraždit. K tomuto úkolu máte brokovnici, kterou si můžete vylepšoivat a také nějaké ty asistence, které můžete po nabití použít a jsou neocenitelné. Je to zábavné, návykové, ale těžké jako kráva! Super oddychovka, ale pokud nejste ostřílení hardcore pařani podobných her, musíte se obrnit velkou dávkou trpělivosti. Vysoká obtížnost však není na škodu, jelikož dnes už moc her nepřínáší takovou výzvu jako tomu bylo dřív a hra aspoň vydrží na delší dobu. Grafika docela pěkná.
EDIT: Za nějakou dobu jsem si na obtížnost zvykl a dá se to a dokonce jsem se hecl a získal všude všechny odznaky (samozřejmě postupně naráz je to naprostá sebevražda). Po dohrání musím říct, že později objeví i jiní nepřátelé než jen krávy a poslední kolo to je teprve pravá výzva. Chcu dvojku z náckama :-D.
Hodnocení: 85/100.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040860015', 'num_games_owned': 1308, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1416005264}
review:
[h1]Summary:[/h1]	[i](longer version below)[/i]
A pretty good wave defense game, worth buying on sale for the achievements and cards.

[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Achievements:[/th]
        [th]Cloud Saving:[/th]
        [th]Trading Cards:[/th]
        [th]Workshop:[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]YES[/td]
        [td]YES[/td]
        [td]YES[/td]
        [td]NO[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

Click [u][url=steamcommunity.com/id/neon_cacti/recommended/] here[/url][/u] to see my other Reviews or follow my [u][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33254425/]Curator Page[/url][/u] for more recommendations.


[h1]In-Depth:[/h1]
Culling of the Cows is a 2D tower defense game where you defend your farm from ravenous zombie cows and what nots. The pricetag isn't too high but it is often on sale for a much cheaper price. The graphics aren't very impressive and the gameplay relies on you managing your funds effectively at the start of the wave.


Tip: When starting a level instantly buy your upgrades and try to get a 3$ bonus from the Care Package. Try to go with 1 level in your Z, 2 in your X, 1 in your C and finally get buckshots. Keep restarting until you get a +3$ and you're in for an easy game. Try focusing your earnings on the X and Z first.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982721534', 'num_games_owned': 2232, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1415537048}
review:
Me salio gratis, y no deberia de quejarme mucho.
No voy a masacrar al juego, pero parece un intento fallido de PVZ "Plants vs Zombies", solo que aqui tienes mas movilidad con el personaje.... es suficiente? No.
Apenas jugue 15 minutos y luego lo deje, sacando los cromos de Steam. Ni el añadido de logros lo salva, de hecho, solo son 5, y cutrisimos, ni eso se han currado.
En fin, juego olvidable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061381336', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1415536110}
review:
The Culling of cows is a pretty nice game actually.
Good:
-Challenging.
-Unique combat.
-Unique upgrade system.
-God is a badass.
-Old man is a badass.
-New enemies almost every level.
-Boss fights.
-Trading cards.
-Sounds.
-Different game modes.
-Requires quick thinking sometimes.
Bad:
-Price (A whooping 11 euros!)
-Repetitive.
-Anooying at times. (Damn you turquoise cow!)
-Level badges are sometimes impossible (But you don't need to do them.)
-Graphics could have been better...

I would recommend this game to people that like hard games, and don't get angry easily.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095842585', 'num_games_owned': 267, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1418863669}
review:
Love:
Zombies. Cows. UFOs.
How badass Sammy is.

Hate:
Wave 100, dead. Start over.
(Note: Exaggeration may included)

author: {'steamid': '76561197972855053', 'num_games_owned': 750, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1415495818}
review:
Der Preis ist mit 11€ zu hoch für ein "stupides" Spiel wie dieses.
Es ist nicht schlecht, aber mehr was für 2-3 Mittagspausen und dann hat man eigentlich genug.

Doch Errungenschaften (Fünf sind es) sind hier nach spätestens einer Stunde zu holen.
Dazu gibt es noch Sammelkarten, auch kleine Aufwertung.

Für den Preis viel zu teuer, selbst bei 2,99€ wäre der Preis zu hoch.
Im Bundle oder als Giveaway aber voll okay.

3/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198034849256', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1415461743}
review:
Такое впечатление, что вся игра, это не что иное, как приход американского деревенщины южанина, после знатной дозы метамфетамина. Этому впечатлению способствует буквально все, что есть в игре: враги, окружение, звук и сам геймплей, который, на самом деле хорош и не плохо затягивает. Не смотря на то, что эта аркада на первых уровнях выглядит довольно сложной, дальше все предельно просто. Игра проходится с ходу, за три с небольшим часа, а после победы над главным боссом, так и хочется не двусмысленно воскликнуть: "Мы, Южане, милостью Божьей!"

8 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044741994', 'num_games_owned': 1546, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1494592840}
review:
For a silly shooter defense type game where you defend your farm from cows and what not... I'd say this is a game worth playing.

Many things were enjoyable such as the following:

Positives:
♦ Almost Each level is unique 
♦ Every level you beat unlocks new enemies 
♦ Every level you beat unlocks new support items
♦ Unique way to upgrade weapons
♦ Breaks between waves
♦ Random Events in the form of a deployable Crate
♦ Hilarious story and voice overs
♦ Achievements for playing the game basically

Now don't get me wrong there are many positives, but still not every game is perfect and this one has the following negative points:

Negatives:
♦ Accuracy of the shots are slightly off
♦ Cheats which can be used to get the achievements
♦ Waves per level are way too long
♦ Can get repetitive quite quickly
♦ Little overpriced as I got mine in a bundle and Indiegala gave it away free

Improvements:
♦ Fix the Accuracy
♦ Make Cheats only usable once finished the game
♦ Lower Waves per round (So it feels less repetitive)

Overall, in my opinion, the game is hillarious, fun and worth playing despite the accuracy of shots being slightly off and the slight repetitiveness. Though if you don't use cheats, enjoy easy to get achievements and love a laugh whilst playing a video game, then I highly recommend this for you.

Overall, I'd rate this 3.5/5!

PS: If you try and get all the stars for every level in the game, you'll be there for a while making this game have very godo replay value!

author: {'steamid': '76561198138846689', 'num_games_owned': 1031, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1443480200}

author: {'steamid': '76561198098229889', 'num_games_owned': 5344, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1415447560}
review:
Engancha bastante, tiene un estilo recreativa que ya no se suele ver muy a menudo.

Las vacas que se llevaban los ovnis ahora están malditas o zombificadas o como queráis llamarlo, y no podéis permitir que entren en vuestra propiedad. Muchos tipos de enemigos, ayudas y objetos que aumentar de nivel, distintos disparos y apoyos, la verdad es que está bastante currado.

En cuanto a logros, podéis sacároslos sobre la marcha menos el último que es acabar la última pantalla.
El juego está chulo, pero creo que su precio no es el adecuado. De todas formas ha estado en varios bundles y ahora mismo lo están regalando (Nov '14), así sí.

___
Los creadores publicaron una guía con todos los trucos que hay, que no impide sacarse los logros así que estáis de enhorabuena.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=267608289

Los que realmente importan son
SHIFT+K y luego:

give me the world [todos los niveles]
billy the old man [todas las mejoras]
slow time [tiempo lento]

NOTA: si hacéis antes una pantalla hasta el final con "billy the old man" activado, en los jefes finales tendréis todas las mejoras ya que dentro de los jefes no se pueden activar trucos. De nada.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153433709', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1415444725}
review:
This game is not worth buying at all for several reasons :
      - The control is clunky, your character stops everytime he reloads or shoots.
      - The music is boring.
      - You can only reload 1 bullet at a time, so you have to press R like crazy @@
      - For me, it always crashes after several levels.

Even though you can get it free now ( indiegala's give away ), it's still not worth playing at all .

author: {'steamid': '76561198003878190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 835, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1415123498}
review:
-: stereotyp a postupná nuda, neprehľadnosť, oneskorene reagujúce ovládanie, zameriavanie, opakujúce sa úrovne, postupná frustrácia, obmedzené možnosti nastavenia, prehnaná obtiažnosť, žiaden multiplayer, hudba a ozvučenie, niektoré zbytočné úrovne a ich náplň

+: menu, herná doba, zbrane, humor, vtipné spracovanie tematiky, pomôcky, vylepšenia a palebná podpora, nemecké UFO

Verdikt: The Culling of the Cows sa snaží vtipne spracovať tematiku nemŕtvych ľudí, nemŕtvých kráv, rôznej lesnej zvery, konšpiráciu o nemeckom UFO a poskytnúť hráčovi dlhodobú zábavu. V tom prvom prípade sa to hre darí, ale v tom druhom už nie. Hra je stereotypná a rýchlo znudí. Negatívom hry je neskoro reagujúce ovládanie, pre ktoré sa The Culling of the Cows skôr frustrujúcou záležitosťou. V boji má hráč k dispozícii rôzne pomôcky, ale aj tak by sa hodil ďalší hráč, no hra multiplayer nepodporuje. Hudba a audio efekty lezú na nervy a najlepšie je ich hneď na začiatku vypnúť. Hra je vtipná a má dobrú hernú dobu, ale to ocení hráč, ktorý sa dokáže vyrovnať s jej negatívami. The Culling of the Cows nie je vhodná hra pre PC, ale skôr pre tablety na prežitie v čakárni u lekára alebo na úradoch.

39%

author: {'steamid': '76561198035285721', 'num_games_owned': 5118, 'num_reviews': 1098, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1449166697}
review:
[H1]"Mad Zombi Cow Hunter" [/H1]

The Culling Of The Cows is a 2D Sidescroll Shooter in the weird world of zombi farming. You are a farmer with a shotgun in your hand and must protect your barn from incoming waves of zombi cows. In each wave another type of obscure zombi creature joins the hordes. There are a bunch of cliches dealing of a typical redneck life and leading towards the grand finale: Fight against a Nazi UFO.

The gameplay is quite challing, yes, but it turns out in higher levels even more repetitive and boring. Although there is a mass of funny elements to discover, nothing remains as necessary remindable. Like a chopper support, nukes or a barn sentry. Wow how interesting.
The biggest lack are the uncomfortable controls like reloading each shell for one key hit or to aim precisely in the isometric playfield. Also some bugs are still included in this game.

So I can just recommend it to players of brute and unstrategical shooters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118371170', 'num_games_owned': 7082, 'num_reviews': 416, 'playtime_forever': 463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1464928738}
review:
I bought this in a bundle, for what amounts to about 40c ...  I enjoyed the other Decaying Logic (DL) titles (Pixel Puzzles) so I was interested to try.  I knew it was short, and I think DL realizes that and doesnt let this game take itself too seriously as a result.  about 3 hours in, I am at the last level and I had to stop and take a break.  Too frustrating.

Again DL to the rescue for people interested in playing different ways, as they offer the console codes here on steam and apparently that wont affect your achievement progress.

Default mode is really tough, and if you try for three badges each level it is even harder.  These challenges are broken up by a handful of carnage levels that you basically spray the undead for a bit...  Like their zombie pixel puzzler almost, but doesnt require 90 minutes at a sitting...

I got my 40 cents worth, and more.  I'd pay a couple of dollars for it.  Don't recommend it at retail or much of 1.99.  Find a bundle and get a good value.

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198041379206', 'num_games_owned': 4599, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1413892552}
review:
[h1] 横シューティングゲーム．日本語未対応．[/h1]
右から疾走してくる狂った牛やゾンビなどから小屋の牛を守るゲーム．40ほどのステージがあり、4種類の戦闘ステージがある．

[b]【システム】[/b]
右から来る敵を射殺して牛小屋に敵が入らないようにする．小屋の牛が全滅したり主人公が死ぬとゲームオーバー．
ステージ開始時に貰うお金で武器を強化したり、弾丸の種類を変更できる．また、ステージごとに支給される支援兵器や支援物資もあり、こちらはお金を消費せず何回でも使用できる．ただしクールタイムがあるので乱発はできない．
戦闘の種類は、指定のWaveを生き残る”WAVES”、小屋の牛が一頭しかおらずミスが許されない”KILL 'EM ALL”、二階から銃を乱射する”ONSLAUGHT”そしてボス戦の4種類ある．

[b]【総評】[/b]
ステージ数はあるものの敵と支援兵器の種類と数が増えるだけなので変わり映えは皆無．敵の当たり判定が小さく、キー配置が独特なので最初は死にまくった．ただ慣れてくるとこのゲームの難易度が結構低いことに気付く．1回全クリするくらいまでなら飽きずにプレイできるし、それなりに面白い．また、実績解除が容易なのも嬉しい．ただ1300円の価値があるかというと首をかしげたくなる．以下個人的な不満点．
・ゲームを再起動する度に設定がリセットされる
・終盤のWAVESは無駄に長いだけでダレる
・敵の種類は多いが耐久値と速度が違うだけ

author: {'steamid': '76561197969307618', 'num_games_owned': 3012, 'num_reviews': 681, 'playtime_forever': 1, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1413677479}
review:
Very enjoyable little defence game.

You play as the stereotypical hillbilly southern redneck wielding a pump action shotgun shooting down zombie(cow)s to protect your barn.

The game offers various upgrades of your shotgun and relies heavy on luck of a cooldown based drop.

I enjoyed the music a lot, also the original artstyle and funny voice acting, too bad it is somewhat short.

review:
Неплохой Tower Defense, немного наркоманский правда. Играем за старого фермера с ружьём и убиваем коров зомби. Но цена на игру сильно завышена, брать на свой страх и риск. И только со скидкой. Для игры которая весит всего то 80+ мегабайт и над которой трудилось всего пять человек вполне неплохо.

review: 太好玩了！玩了3个小时都不腻。最后飞碟boss竟然被作者用手指头戳死了，笑尿了。游戏里面霰弹枪叼炸天啊,其他武器都不好用。优先升级x，然后升级c，最后z只用一级就好了。缺点就是子弹打快了，游戏速度会变慢，降低了难度。各种支援和e基本用不上。作弊码更是没必要，游戏很简单。最后结局也有缺陷，飞碟被作者秒了后，玩家飞上天就没了，没有结局。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198048974498', 'num_games_owned': 2973, 'num_reviews': 812, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1683203379}
review:
Aside from a shi*tingly hard final boss fight which goes on for many, many stages with nary a save or checkpoint, this is one of the flat-out dumbest, funnest games I've ever played. You don't even need to like 2D shooters to dig it. (Lord knows I usually don't!)

   Best wait for a sale, though, as it's a tad steep at thirteen buckeroonies...
 
Verdict: 9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033226884', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1411654537}
review:
Cows are coming - shoot them. Okay, sounds fun.
Reality: cows are coming, but the player is more preoccupied with the clumsy controls than the shooting itself. And it doesn't matter as it's boring anyway. 10 minutes was more than enough for me.

I expected light entertainment - but not as light as the cheapest flash games (which is, by the way, an offence against flash games).

As such, this game would be expensive even if it was free.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975452899', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1411601455}
review:
Do you feel like there aren't enough games out there about shooting cows?
If you answered "F$%& YEAH!!! COWS HAVE HAD IT FAR TOO GOOD FOR FAR TOO LONG!!!"
Then this game, my friend, is definitely for you.

Simply put, this game is a silly time waster. If you are reading this review...BUY THE GAME.
You will get 3 hours of silly gaming and a shiny "Perfect Game."
This game only has 5 achievements as of Sept. 24, 2014 and you can get them all in under 3 hours.
Time waster. Silly fun. Easy achievements. Easy Perfect Game. Easy easy easy.
Plus, you get to shoot cows.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980060825', 'num_games_owned': 1504, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1411329769}
review:
Крутая убивалка времени, затягивет на раз. Здесь прекрасно всё.
Есть охуенный сарай, который нужно защищать, есть охуенный дед с ружьем, который защищает все сараи у себя на районе (деду подчиняется всё: косилки, пулемёты, боевые вертолеты, бомбардировщик B-2, метеоритные дожди и т.п.) и есть зомби... коровы-зомби... большие розовые коровы-зомби...
За душевное здоровье разработчиков переживать, наверное, не стоит.
Игра достаточно простая. Все значки на с условиями выбиваются легко. Звуковое сопровождение не подкачало.
С нетерпением жду развития проекта: новых достижений, новых карт, усложненный режим игры...
ЗЫ: "МэриЭн запили мне чашечку кофе!"

author: {'steamid': '76561198030571379', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1449379240}
review:
The Culling Of The Cows is a pretty fun and challenging little game. Losta difrent ways to upgrade your gun (during waves!) and each of the zombies in this can be a pain in their own way. However i did think that the game was FAR too short, was having alot of fun and then....over... i feel that is the main issue for this game, shortness. So with that said it would be smart to pick this game up during a sale (5o%,75% off). But even though the game is short it was still pretty dang fun for me.

7.5/10 get it during a good sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044217886', 'num_games_owned': 4116, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1446941144}
review: Just doesn't do it for me.  There is potential but not enough to keep me curious.   No Full Controller support is a let down.  Some things a person just likes doing a certain way and I like using my thumb on the stick for moving around and not the pad.  Controller should be redefineable and its not...  Yet.  Come on guys, and add some shock vibration for those with controllers that support it.  Just adds so much more to a shooter.  Also I see someone posted in the forums back in July that there was a freezing issue.  I have had a freezing issue every time I exit and have to Ctrl Alt Del to close the program.  What a drag considering its now Sept and the programmers still havent addressed the freezing issue.  For now those are the 2 things that leave me with no need to play any more.  Bummer because I would have liked to say I have changed my mind now that I have control and the game exits gracefully...

author: {'steamid': '76561198029303909', 'num_games_owned': 3354, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1409658882}
